SA11bsa054_u:3041: nāhamupāle evaṃ kṣatimupahatiṃ ca samanupaśyāmi yathā sabrahmacārī sabrahmacāriṇo 'ntike duṣṭacittamutpādayati /
SA11bsa054_u:3042: tatropāle imāni mahānti kuśalamūlāni tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti /
SA11bsa054_u:3043: tasmāttarhi upāle evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yaddagdhasthūṇāyāmapi cittaṃ na pradūṣayiṣyāmaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:3046: Bca_6.2 na ca dveṣasamaṃ pāpaṃ na ca kṣāntisamaṃ tapaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3048: na ca dveṣeṇa samaṃ pāpamaśubhaṃ puṇyābhibhavaheturasti /
SA11bsa054_u:3049: na ca kṣāntyā titikṣayā samaṃ tulyaṃ tapaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3051: yata evam, tasmāt kṣāntiṃ kṣamāṃ sarvatātparyeṇa bhavayedabhyaset /
SA11bsa054_u:3054: Bca_6.3 manaḥ śamaṃ na gṛhṇāti na prītisukhamaśrute /
SA11bsa054_u:3055: na nidrāṃ na dhṛtiṃ yāti dveṣaśalye hṛdi sthite //
SA11bsa054_u:3058: Bca_6.5 suhṛdo 'pyudvijante 'smād dadāti na ca sevyate /
SA11bsa054_u:3061: anupaśānta eva sadā dveṣānalaprajvalitatvāt na prītisukhaṃ saumanasyasukhamaśnute āpnoti,
SA11bsa054_u:3063: na nidrāṃ na dhṛtiṃ cittasukhaṃ labhate kāyacittasaṃtāpakāriṇi dveṣaśalye hṛdayanivāsini /
SA11bsa054_u:3067: suhṛdo bhitrāṇyapi udvijante uttrasanti asmād dveṣiṇaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3070: idamiha saṃkṣepeṇāvadhāryatām- nāsti tadupaśamakāraṇaṃ kiṃcidyena kopanaḥ sukhaṃ labheta //
SA11bsa054_u:3073: iti anayorbhede 'pi dvayorapi parihartavyatayā abhedenaiva nirdeśaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:3074: evamiha dṛṣṭadharme 'pi dveṣadoṣānavagamya tatparityāgāya yatnavatā bhavitavyamityāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3076: yaḥ krodhaṃ hanti nirbandhāt sa sukhīha paratra ca //
SA11bsa054_u:3077: evaṃ yathoktaprakāreṇa duḥkhāni janayati yasmāt, tasmād yaḥ sukṛtātmā nirbandhāt, gāḍhābhiniveśāt /
SA11bsa054_u:3082: daurmanasyāśanaṃ prāpya dveṣo dṛpto nihanti mām //
SA11bsa054_u:3086: na tu paramārthataḥ kiṃcidiṣṭamaniṣṭaṃ vā saṃbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:3089: tasmāt tatkāriṇi tadvirodhini vā dveṣa utpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:3090: iti daurmanasyameva balabadbhojanaṃ [Bcp_83] labdhasāmarthyaḥ san dveṣo nihanti mām iti niścitya tatpuṣṭikāraṇaṃ ca haniṣyāmi prathamataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3095: yasmāt mama vadhaṃ vihāya rātriṃdivamaparaṃ na kiṃcid dveṣasya vairiṇaḥ karaṇīyamasti //
SA11bsa054_u:3096: evaṃ dveṣadoṣān vibhāvya sarvopāyena tadvipakśabhūtāṃ kṣāntimutpādayet /
SA11bsa054_u:3100: Bca_6.9 atyaniṣṭāgamenāpi na kṣobhyā muditā mayā /
SA11bsa054_u:3109: ato yadi nāma mama śiraśchidyate, tathāpi na kṣobhyā na vikopayitavyā muditā mayā /
SA11bsa054_u:3113: kutaḥ? daurmanasye 'pi kṛte iṣṭavighāte sati nāstīṣṭaṃ nābhilaṣitaṃ setsyati /
SA11bsa054_u:3114: ayaṃ tu viśeṣaḥ syāt- kuśalaṃ punarupahanyate //
SA11bsa054_u:3115: muditā ca āryākśayamatisūtre varṇitā- tatra katamā muditā?
SA11bsa054_u:3116: yā buddhadharmāṇāmanusmaraṇāt prītiḥ prasādaḥ prāmodyaṃ cittasyānavalīnatā anavamṛdyatā aparitarṣaṇatā,
SA11bsa054_u:3124: Bca_6.10 yadyastyeva pratīkāro daurmanasyena tatra kim /
SA11bsa054_u:3125: atha nāsti pratīkāro daurmanasyena tatra kim //
SA11bsa054_u:3126: yadi ca iṣṭavighātanivartanāya aniṣṭopanipātapratiṣedhāya ca pratīkāraḥ upāyāntaramasti,
SA11bsa054_u:3129: atha nāsti, tadāpi daurmanasyena tatra kim? na kiṃcit prayojanam /
SA11bsa054_u:3142: yadi pareṣāṃ śivaṃ nanu? tadarthamāha- priyāṇām /
SA11bsa054_u:3149: mahatā prāyatnena kuśalapakṣamupasevya kadācit karhicit sudurlabhaṃ saṃsāre sāsravaṃ sukhaṃ labhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:3150: duḥkhaṃ tu sarvadā sulabham, ayatnasiddhatvāt, iti tadabhyāso na duṣkaraḥ, sarvadā paricitatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:3154: yata evam, tasmāt he citta, duḥkhānubhavanāya dṛḍhībhava, mā kātaratāmāśrayasva //
SA11bsa054_u:3155: api ca / idaṃ duḥkhaṃ mahārthasādhakatvāt soḍhumucitam, iti manasi kartavyam, ityāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3159: mahānavamīsamayādiṣu trirātramekāhaṃ vā upoṣya gātradāhacchedanabhedanaṃ kurvanto duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ niṣphalamevānubhavanti /
SA11bsa054_u:3160: tathā karṇāṭadeśādisamudbhūtā dākṣiṇātyā uparināmalikhanamātrābhimānataḥ parasparaṃ spardhamānā anekābhiḥ kāraṇābhirduḥkhamanubhavanto jīvitamapyutsṛjanti /
SA11bsa054_u:3161: ahaṃ tu svaparātmanoḥ paramadurlabhabuddhatvasādhanāya kṛtotsāhaḥ duḥkhaiḥ kasmāt kāraṇāt kātarībhavāmi?
SA11bsa054_u:3163: karacaraṇaśiraśchedanādiduḥkhaṃ narakādiduḥkhaṃ vā muktayarthaṃ kathaṃ nu soḍhavyamityatrāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3164: Bca_6.14 na kiṃcidasti tadvastu yadabhyāsasya duṣkaram /
SA11bsa054_u:3166: śāstrābhyāsakalādi kauśalādi mṛdumadhyātimātraduḥkhānubhavanādi vā vastu na tadvidyate kiṃcit yadabhyāsagocaro na bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:3172: evaṃ niṣpandaphalaṃ ca sarvadharmasukhākrāntaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate /
SA11bsa054_u:3175: yasya samādheḥ pratilambhād bodhisattvaḥ sarvārambaṇavastuṣu sukhāmeva vedanāṃ vedayate na duḥkhām, nāduḥkhasukhām /
SA11bsa054_u:3176: tasya nairayikāmapi vedanāṃ kāryamāṇasya sukhasaṃjñaiva pratyupasthitā bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:3180: vetrairapi tāḍyamānasya ardhavetrairapi kaśābhirapi tāḍayamānasya sukhasaṃjñā pravartate /
SA11bsa054_u:3185: tailapradyotikaṃ vā ādīpyamānasya yāvat kārṣāpaṇacchedikāṃ chidyamānasya piṣṭapācanikāṃ vā pācyamānasya,
SA11bsa054_u:3186: hastibhirvā mardyamānasya sukhasaṃjñaiva pravartate // iti vistaraḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:3187: syādevaitad yadi prathamata eva mṛduvyathābhyasaḥ syāt / yāvatā sa eva nāstīti / atrāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3195: sukumārataracittasya hi duḥkhamatitarāṃ bādhakaṃ bhavati, duḥkhe 'pi dṛḍhacittasya viparyayaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:3202: tathāhi- kecidvīrapuruṣāḥ saṃgrāmabhūmau svaśoṇitamapi paśyanto 'dhikataraṃ śauryamābhajante /
SA11bsa054_u:3204: etadubhayamapi cittasya itaretarābhyāsaviparyayāt iti matvā duḥkhaduryodhano nādhigamyo bhavet,
SA11bsa054_u:3208: Bca_6.19 duḥkhe 'pi naiva cittasya prasādaṃ kṣobhayed budhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3209: saṃgrāmo hi saha kleśairyuddhe ca sulabhā vyathā //
SA11bsa054_u:3212: saṃgrāme ca vyathā nāma na bhavediti durlabham, vyathā tu sulamaiva //
SA11bsa054_u:3213: nanu tathāpi duṣkaramidamatīva dṛśyata iti / atrāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3215: te te vijayinaḥ śūrāḥ śeṣāstu mṛtamārakāḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:3217: tatprahārān vakṣaḥsthalena pratīcchanto ye jayanti samare ripūn,
SA11bsa054_u:3218: te te śūrapuruṣāḥ pararipuvijayādiha labdhavijayāḥ praśasyante /
SA11bsa054_u:3220: te ca akiṃcitkaratayā mṛtamārakā jugupsanīyā eva śūraiḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:3228: pāpasya phalamidamiti matvā pāpād bhayamakaraṇacittaṃ ca,
SA11bsa054_u:3229: buddhe ca bhagavati spṛhā bhaktiḥ śraddhā cittaprasādaśca /
SA11bsa054_u:3232: Bca_6.22 pittādiṣu na me kopo mahāduḥkhakareṣvapi /
SA11bsa054_u:3235: te ca tathāvidhāhāravihāravaiguṇyād viṣamāvasthāṃ prāptā vyādhīn janayantaḥ sarvaduḥkhahetavo bhavanti /
SA11bsa054_u:3236: tathāpi na teṣu mama kopaḥ, acetanatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:3237: na te saṃcintya duḥkhadāyakāḥ, kiṃ tarhi svakāraṇasāmagrībalena prakopamupāgatāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3239: kiṃ na syāditi cet, te 'pi pūrvakarmāparādhāt svakāraṇasāmagrīprakopitā duḥkhadāyakā bhavanti /
SA11bsa054_u:3240: iti pittādivat teṣvapi na yujyate mama krodhaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:3247: atha syāt- uktamatra sacetanāḥ saṃcintya tathāvidhāniṣṭakāriṇaḥ, na tu punaritare tathetyāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3248: Bca_6.24 kupyāmīti na saṃcintya kupyati svecchayā janaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3249: utpatsya ityabhipretya krodha utpadyate na ca //
SA11bsa054_u:3250: tatpratyayasāmagrīmantareṇa kupyāmītyevaṃ buddhipūrvakaṃ saṃcintya na janaḥ svairaṃ prakupyati /
SA11bsa054_u:3253: Bca_6.25 ye kecidaparādhāśca pāpāni vividhāni ca /
SA11bsa054_u:3254: sarva tatpratyayabalāt svatantraṃ tu na vidyate //
SA11bsa054_u:3257: Bca_6.26 na ca pratyayasāmagryā janayāmīti cetanā /
SA11bsa054_u:3259: pratyayasāmagryapi na svakāryaṃ janayantī saṃcintya janayati /
SA11bsa054_u:3260: sā hi svahetupariṇāmopanidhidharmatayā tathāvidhaṃ kāryaṃ janayati na tu saṃcintya /
SA11bsa054_u:3261: na cāpi janitasya kāryasyāpi anayā sāmagryā janito 'smīti cetanā manasikāro 'sti /
SA11bsa054_u:3268: syādetat- astyeva svatantraṃ yathā sāṃkhyānāṃ pradhānamātmā ca, naiyāyikānāmākāśādayaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3269: tat kimucyate na kiṃcitsvatantramiha vidyate, ityāśaṅkayāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3275: āha- yasmāttadeva svayameva tadaparakāraṇābhāvād bhavāmi samutpadya iti nābhisaṃdhāya jāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:3277: anutpannaṃ hi tannāsti ka icchedbhavituṃ tadā /
SA11bsa054_u:3280: atha nāsadutpadyate kiṃcit, kevalamavyaktāvasthāto vyaktāvasthāyāṃ pariṇāmamātram /
SA11bsa054_u:3292: anutpannaṃ hi tannāsti ka icchedbhavituṃ tadā /
SA11bsa054_u:3296: tadā ca viṣayopabhogātprāk tadbhoktṛtvamasya nāsīt, paścādutpannaṃ ca tatsvabhāvameva /
SA11bsa054_u:3298: tadutpāde ca tasyāpyutpāda iti kathaṃ nātmana utpāda iṣyata iti / tadevaṃ punaḥ
SA11bsa054_u:3299: anutpannaṃ hi tannāsti ka icchedbhavituṃ tadā /
SA11bsa054_u:3305: atha kathaṃcit pravartate, tadāpi viṣaye vyāpṛtasya nivṛttirna syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:3307: viṣayopabhogānnivartitumapi notsahate, tadā tasya tatsvabhāvatvāt, tasya ca nityatayā anivṛtteḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3325: tathā ca akiṃcitkara evāsau, kvacidapi kārye 'nupayogāt /
SA11bsa054_u:3326: atha aparasahakāripratyayasaṃnidhau niṣkriyasyāpi tasya kriyā[bhyu]pagamyate / yaduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:3332: Bca_6.30 yaḥ pūrvavat kriyākāle kriyāyāstena kiṃ kṛtam /
SA11bsa054_u:3336: yena pratyayāntarasaṅge tasya kriyā vyavasthāpyeta? api ca /
SA11bsa054_u:3337: ubhayasaṃbandhābhāvāt tasya ātmanaḥ kriyeyamiti saṃbandhe katarattadanyanimittam? naivāsti kiṃcit //
SA11bsa054_u:3341: Bca_6.31 evaṃ paravaśaṃ sarvaṃ yadvaśaṃ so 'pi cāvaśaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3343: evamuktanayena paravaśaṃ parāyattaṃ sarvaṃ bāhyādhyātmikaṃ vastujātam /
SA11bsa054_u:3344: tarhi yadvaśe tadaparāyattaṃ bhaviṣyatīti cet, na /
SA11bsa054_u:3346: evaṃ sa heturapi svahetorityanādisaṃsāraparaṃparāyāṃ na svavaśitā kvacidapi saṃbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:3348: kaḥ kasmai druhyati paramārthataḥ yenāparādhini kvacit kasyacidaparādhe tasya dveṣo yuktaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3350: aceṣṭeṣu nirīheṣu sarvadharmeṣu evaṃ satsu kva kupyatām?
SA11bsa054_u:3351: na yujyate prekṣāvatāṃ kvacidapi kopa iti bhāvaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:3352: syādetat- evaṃ hi ekaṃ samarthayato dvitīyaṃ vighaṭate ityāśaṅkayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3353: vāraṇāpi na yuktaivaṃ kaḥ kiṃ vārayatīti cet /
SA11bsa054_u:3354: samarthitanyāyenaiva vāraṇāpi nivartanamapi nirmāṇavadaceṣṭeṣu bhāveṣu na yuktā /
SA11bsa054_u:3355: evamiti yadā kiṃcidapi svatantraṃ na dṛśyate,
SA11bsa054_u:3358: yadi vā- maivam, tathāpi kathaṃ na yuktā?
SA11bsa054_u:3359: ko vārayati, svatantraḥ kartā kiṃ niṣedhyaṃ svatantrapravṛttaṃ vārayatīti cet /
SA11bsa054_u:3360: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- na hi samāne 'pi nyāye kvacit pravṛttiḥ sāmānyatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:3366: idaṃ pratītyedamutpadyate iti pratītyasamutpannatā yasmādasti nirvyāpāreṣvapi bhāveṣu,
SA11bsa054_u:3370: tathāpi pratītyasamutpādavaśāt pāratantryamupadarśitam- evaṃ paravaśaṃ sarvam [6. 31] ityādivacanāt /
SA11bsa054_u:3379: īdṛśāḥ pratyayā asyetyevaṃ matvā sukhī bhavet //
SA11bsa054_u:3383: īdṛśā apakārakaraṇaśīlahetavaḥ asya amitrasya itarasya vā,
SA11bsa054_u:3386: kiṃ ca / duḥkhopanipātena cittakṣobhe 'pi na duḥkhasya nivṛttirastītyupadarśayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3387: Bca_6.34 yadi tu svecchayā siddhiḥ sarveṣāmeva dehinām /
SA11bsa054_u:3389: na hi ātmecchāmātreṇa anavimataṃ nivartate, abhimataṃ copatiṣṭhate hetumantareṇa /
SA11bsa054_u:3390: tathātve sa ti na bhavet kasyacit sattvasya duḥkham /
SA11bsa054_u:3412: yadaivamuktakrameṇa kleśavaśyatvāt kleśaparatantratvāt ete sattvā ātmānamapi priyaṃ vallabhaṃ ghnanti pīḍayanti,
SA11bsa054_u:3413: tadā eṣāṃ parakāyeṣu paraśarīreṣu apakāraviratiḥ kathaṃ syāt?
SA11bsa054_u:3416: na kevalaṃ dayā nāsti krodha utpadyate katham //
SA11bsa054_u:3417: piśācairiva grasteṣu eṣu apakārakāriṣu uktanayena pravṛtteṣu ātmaghātane parāpakāradvāreṇa vā na kevalaṃ na tāvat kṛpā nāsti,
SA11bsa054_u:3419: dveṣa utpadyate kathaṃ kṛpāsthāneṣviti viparyayo mahān //
SA11bsa054_u:3422: teṣu kopo na yukto me yathāgnau dahanātmake //
SA11bsa054_u:3424: bālānāṃ pṛthagjanānāṃ yadi etādṛśa eva svabhāvaḥ paropadravakāritā nāma,
SA11bsa054_u:3425: tadā na khalu svabhāvāḥ paryanuyogamarhanti- kimiti parāpakāraṃ kurvanti te?
SA11bsa054_u:3426: iti paribhāvya teṣu dveṣo na yukto me /
SA11bsa054_u:3432: atha doṣo 'yamāgantuḥ anya eva na tatsvabhāvabhūtaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3434: doṣā hi duṣṭasvabhāvāḥ, na tatsvabhāvāḥ sattvāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3437: na hi kaṭutā nāma nirmalasyākāśasya svabhāvaḥ, api tu dhūmasya /
SA11bsa054_u:3438: ataśca taddoṣeṇa dhūma eva doṣo yujyate, nākāśe prakṛtipariśuddhe /
SA11bsa054_u:3440: [Bcp_92] api ca / yadeva hi pradhānaṃ duḥkhakāraṇam, tatra yukto bhavet kopo nāpradhāne ityāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3441: Bca_6.41 mukhyaṃ daṇḍādikaṃ hitvā prerake yadi kupyate /
SA11bsa054_u:3442: dveṣeṇa preritaḥ so 'pi dveṣe dveṣo 'stu me varam //
SA11bsa054_u:3444: tato daṇḍa eva mukhyaṃ duḥkhakāraṇamiti tatraiva kopo yuktaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3445: atha parapreritasya daṇḍasya ko doṣaḥ? tena preraka eva dveṣyo bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:3446: evaṃ tarhi dveṣeṇa so 'pi daṇḍaprerakaḥ prerita iti dveṣe dveṣo mama yukto na prerake //
SA11bsa054_u:3448: nādattaṃ kiṃcidupabhujyate sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā /
SA11bsa054_u:3449: iti vicintya parāpakāre 'pi na tatra cittaṃ pradūṣayedityāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3450: Bca_6.42 mayāpi pūrvaṃ sattvānāmīdṛśyeva vyathā kṛtā /
SA11bsa054_u:3452: pūrvaṃ janmāntare mayāpi sattvānāmevaṃvidhaiva pīḍā kṛtā yasmāt,
SA11bsa054_u:3455: yadyasya kāraṇaṃ tasmādetadutpadyate nānyasmāditi parāmṛśya parāpakāraṃ marṣayedityupadaśaryannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3456: Bca_6.43 tacchasraṃ mama kāyaśca dvayaṃ duḥkhasya kāraṇam /
SA11bsa054_u:3457: tena śasraṃ mayā kāyo gṛhītaḥ kutra kupyate //
SA11bsa054_u:3460: tathāhi tasyāpakāriṇaḥ śastraṃ khaṅgādi mama kāyaśca, etaddvayaṃ sāmagrīrūpaṃ duḥkhasya kāraṇam /
SA11bsa054_u:3461: iti samarthakāraṇasadbhāve 'pi kāryaṃ kathaṃ notpadyeta? anyathā tattasya kāraṇameva na syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:3466: yataḥ svayamapi duḥkhakāraṇaṃ vahatyupanayati ca bhavān /
SA11bsa054_u:3467: ātmanyakope paratrāpi na yukta iti bhāvaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:3470: tṛṣṇāndhena mayā tatra vyathāyāṃ kutra kupyate //
SA11bsa054_u:3474: duḥkhaparihārāya sukhaprāptaye ca yā tṛṣṇā abhilāṣaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:3475: tadandhena pihitaprajñālocanena tasyāṃ vyathāyāṃ satyāṃ kutra kupyate?
SA11bsa054_u:3476: na hi gaṇḍasya kuḍyādisaṃparkaje duḥkhe kvacidvivekataḥ kopo yuktaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:3478: yaḥ kāryeṇānarthī, tena tatkāraṇameva parihartavyaṃ bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:3480: Bca_6.45 duḥkhaṃ necchāmi duḥkhasya hetumicchāmi bāliśaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3483: tasya punaḥ kāraṇaṃ śarīraṃ pratyapakāriṇaṃ cecchāmi /
SA11bsa054_u:3487: ātmavadhāya svayaṃ saṃskṛtaśastrasyaiva anyatra mama kopo na yukta ityāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3494: vane tasminnivāsino gṛdhrolūkavāyasādayaḥ pakṣiṇo yathā matkarmajanitā eva duḥkhahetavo bhavanti /
SA11bsa054_u:3496: tathā idamapi paraśastrādikaṃ duḥkhaheturmatkarmajanitameva, iti kutra kupyate?
SA11bsa054_u:3500: yena madīyena karmaṇā coditāḥ preritā eva mayi pūrvakṛtāpakāre apakāriṇo jātāḥ santo narakān yāsyanti,
SA11bsa054_u:3504: tadā ete 'pi nāpakāriṇo 'bhaviṣyanniti matkṛtenaiva karmaṇā apakāriṇo bhavanti //
SA11bsa054_u:3506: Bca_6.48 etānāśritya me pāpaṃ kṣīyate kṣamato bahu /
SA11bsa054_u:3510: etānapakāriṇa āśritya nimittīkṛtya mama pāpaṃ pūrvajanmakṛtaparāpakārajanitaṃ kṣīyate tadduḥkhānubhavanavipākena kṣayaṃ yāti /
SA11bsa054_u:3513: māmāśritya matkarmacoditāḥ evamapyapakāraṃ kṛtvā punarete narakān tīvravedanān duḥsahaduḥkhānubhavān yānti /
SA11bsa054_u:3514: ata uktakrameṇa ahameva apakārī eṣāmityādi subodham //
SA11bsa054_u:3515: [Bcp_94] nanu yadyapakārī bhavān, tarhi bhavata eva narakagamanamucitam, na tveṣāmityāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3516: Bca_6.50 bhavenmamāśayaguṇo na yāmi narakān yadi /
SA11bsa054_u:3520: na tu punareṣāṃ durāśayatayā narakeṣu mamāpatanamiti bhāvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3522: ayamatra samudāyārthaḥ- yadyahamapakārī sannapi kenacidupāyakauśalena narakān na yāmi, tadaiṣāmu[ma?
SA11bsa054_u:3525: mayā tāvadekena rakṣitā na bhavantāmanye, rakṣita ātmā ca bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:3526: na caitāvatā kiṃcideṣāṃ nyūnādhikaṃ guṇadoṣeṣu syāt //
SA11bsa054_u:3527: nanu yadi nāma evam, tathāpi bhavato 'pi na yuktamātmarakṣaṇamupakārikṛtajñatayā ityāśaṅkayāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3528: Bca_6.51 atha pratyapakārī syāṃ tathāpyete na rakṣitāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3530: yadi daṇḍādighātaṃ kurvatsu pratyapakārī bhaveyam, tathāpi ete rakṣitā na bhavanti /
SA11bsa054_u:3531: na kaścideṣāṃ pratīkāro narakagamanādiṣu kṛtaḥ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:3533: tathā sarvasattveṣu na maitracittaṃ mayā niści[kṣepta?]tavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:3536: tasmādetarhi pratīkāropāyābhāvāttapasvino varākā rakśitumaśakyatvānnaṣṭā durgatipatitā eva /
SA11bsa054_u:3538: paścāttadupāyamadhigamya tatkariṣyāmi yathaiṣāṃ duḥkhamaṇumātrakamapi na syāt //
SA11bsa054_u:3542: dvividhaṃ duḥkhamavicārato bādhakamupajāyate kāyikaṃ mānasikaṃ ceti /
SA11bsa054_u:3543: tatra manasi na kaściddaṇḍādikaṃ dātuṃ śaktaḥ, amūrtatvānmanasaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3544: iti tadudbhavaṃ duḥkhaṃ paramārthato na saṃbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:3547: mamedaṃ śarīramiti vikalpābhyāsavāsanāvaśāt kāyaduḥkhena cittaṃ vihanyate //
SA11bsa054_u:3550: kāyaṃ na bādhate tena cetaḥ kasmātprakupyasi //
SA11bsa054_u:3552: na hi kāyasyāyaṃ kaṃcidupaghātaṃ karotīti yena, tena cetaḥ kasmāddhetoḥ prakupyasi?
SA11bsa054_u:3553: athāpi syāt- yadi nāma nyakkārādayaḥ kāyasya bādhakā na bhavanti,
SA11bsa054_u:3556: Bca_6.54 mayyaprasādo yo 'nyeṣāṃ sa māṃ kiṃ bhakṣayiṣyati /
SA11bsa054_u:3560: sa kiṃ māṃ bhakṣayiṣyati ihaloke paraloka vā,
SA11bsa054_u:3565: naṅkṣyatīhaiva me lābhaḥ pāpaṃ tu sthāsyati dhruvam //
SA11bsa054_u:3567: tato 'sau nyakkārādigaṇo mamāniṣṭa iti cet, tadayuktam /
SA11bsa054_u:3571: tannimittaṃ nyakkārādikartṛṣu krudhyato yatpāpaṃ tadeva paraṃ sthāsyati paralokānubandhi bhaviṣyati /
SA11bsa054_u:3574: Bca_6.56 varamadyaiva me mṛtyurna mithyājīvitaṃ ciram /
SA11bsa054_u:3576: idameva varaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ yallābhābhāvādasminnevāhani me maraṇamastu,
SA11bsa054_u:3577: na tu punaḥ parāpakāradvāreṇa lābhapratilambhānmithyājīvitaṃ ciraṃ dīrghakālam /
SA11bsa054_u:3579: yasmādvahutarakālamapi jīvitvā maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitam ityavaśyaṃbhāvino mṛtyorduḥkhaṃ tadeva mama /
SA11bsa054_u:3580: yatpaścādvarṣaśatātyaye bhaviṣyati, tadevedānīṃ mama mriyamāṇasya iti cirajīviteṣvaviśeṣaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:3582: Bca_6.57 svapne varṣaśataṃ saukhyaṃ bhuktvā yaśca vibudhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:3584: Bca_6.58 nanu (nūnaṃ?) nivartate saukhyaṃ dvayorapi vibuddhayoḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3589: anayordvayorapi svapnopalabdhopabhuktasukhayoḥ prativibuddhayoḥ satoḥ tadupalabdhaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ sukhaṃ na nivartate,
SA11bsa054_u:3596: Bca_6.59 labdhvāpi ca bahūṃllābhān ciraṃ bhuktvā sukhānyapi /
SA11bsa054_u:3603: kaṭisūtrakamātramapi na pariśeṣitamiti nagnaśca cauraiḥ parimuṣita iva asmāllokātparaṃ lokaṃ yāsyāmi //
SA11bsa054_u:3604: syādetat- astyeva viśeṣo lābhasya cīvarādīnāmanupaghātādāyuḥsaṃskārāṇāmupastambhācciratarakālaṃ jīvitaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:3605: tataśca pūrvakṛtapāpasya vidūṣaṇāsamudācārādinā parikṣayaṃ śikṣāsaṃvaraparirakṣaṇena bodhicittasevanādinā ca kuśalapakṣasya ca vṛddhiṃ kuryām / yaduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:3608: ato lābhāntarāyakāriṇi yukta eva pradveṣa ityāśaṅkayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3609: pāpakṣayaṃ ca puṇyaṃ ca lābhājjīvan karomi cet /
SA11bsa054_u:3610: lābhāduktakrameṇa jīvan dhriyamāṇaḥ pāpakṣayaṃ ca puṇyaṃ ca karomītyādi manyase /
SA11bsa054_u:3611: nanu etaditaḥ samadhikaṃ doṣamapaśyatā abhidhīyata ityāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3612: Bca_6.60 puṇyakṣayaśca pāpaṃ ca lābhārthaṃ krudhyato nanu //
SA11bsa054_u:3613: lābhārthaṃ lābhanimittaṃ tadantarāyakāriṇi dveṣaṃ kurvataḥ sukṛtakṣaya evopajāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:3615: ayaṃ tu viśeṣaḥ- akṣāntisamudbhavasya pāpasya rāśirabhivardhate //
SA11bsa054_u:3616: athāpi syāt- yathākathaṃcit tāvaccirakālaṃ lābhājjīvitaṃ syāt / tāvataiva naḥ prayojanamityāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3617: Bca_6.61 yadarthameva jīvāmi tadeva yadi naśyati /
SA11bsa054_u:3622: tadā kiṃ tena tādṛśena jīvitenāpi kevalāśubhakarmakaraṇaśīlena?
SA11bsa054_u:3637: tadā yo 'pi pareṣāmanyasattvānāmayaśaḥ prakāśayati, tatrāpi kopaste kiṃ na jāyate?
SA11bsa054_u:3645: parāśritāprasādattvādaprasādiṣu aprasannacitteṣu avarṇavādiṣu tava kṣamā kṣāntirūtpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:3648: yadi yaḥ parāyattāprasādaḥ tatra kṣamā bhavato bhavati, tadā svasminnavarṇavādini kiṃ na kṣamā?
SA11bsa054_u:3654: na yujyate mama dveṣo buddhādīnāṃ na hi vyathā //
SA11bsa054_u:3659: yasmādbuddhādīnāṃ bodhisattvāryaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ vitathābhiniveśaprasūtātmagrāhanivṛtterabhiṣvaṅgābhāvānna vyathā cittapīḍālakṣaṇaṃ daurmanasyaṃ nāsti /
SA11bsa054_u:3662: tathā viruddhadharmakāriṣu karuṇaiva tu yujyate teṣu sādhūnām /
SA11bsa054_u:3664: yadi punardharmato nivārayituṃ śakyate, tadā na doṣaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:3673: tathā priyāṇāṃ premasthānānāṃ cāpakāriṣu kopaṃ nivārayediti saṃbandhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3678: tadanena yathā aparasamaye devagurudvijātimātāpitṛprabhṛtīnāmarthe pāpaṃ kurvato 'pi na doṣa iti matam,
SA11bsa054_u:3680: kiṃ ca / idamapi vastutattvaṃ manasi kurvatā na sattveṣu cittaṃ dūṣayitavyamityāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3682: sā vyathā cetane dṛṣṭā kṣamasvaināṃ vyathāmataḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:3684: sā ca sāmagrī vastudharmatayā kācit kvacit samarthasvabhāvā /
SA11bsa054_u:3689: svayameva yadṛcchayā vā loṣṭakuḍyādyabhighātajanitā vā dehināṃ śarīriṇāṃ niyatā vyathā niyamena samutpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:3691: sā caivaṃ dvividhakāraṇasāmagrīprasūtāpi cetane savijñānake kāye dṛṣṭā pramāṇapariniścitā /
SA11bsa054_u:3695: tato yad yasyotpattisthānaṃ tat tatraiva bhavati nānyatra, yathā paṅke paṅkajaṃ na sthale /
SA11bsa054_u:3696: ataḥ asmānyāyāt kṣamasva sahasva enāmanantarakathitobhayarūpāṃ vyathām //
SA11bsa054_u:3698: brūmaḥ kameṣu nirdoṣaṃ kaṃ vā brūmo 'parādhinam //
SA11bsa054_u:3704: itthaṃ brūmaḥ- kam eṣu kleśarākṣasāveśavaśīkṛteṣu nirdoṣam, kaṃ vā brūmo 'parādhinam?
SA11bsa054_u:3706: [Bcp_99] idamapi ca ātmagatameva cintayatā pratighacittaṃ nivartayitavyamityāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3707: Bca_6.68 kasmādevaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ yenaivaṃ bādhyase paraiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3714: nanu yadi nāma evam, tathāpi pratīkāro yukta ityāha- sarva ityādi /
SA11bsa054_u:3715: sarve duḥkhahetavaḥ karmapratyayopajanitapravṛttayaḥ iti ko 'hamatra anyathākṛtau tatphalanivartanāya? na kaścit /
SA11bsa054_u:3718: Bca_6.69 evaṃ buddhvā tu puṇyeṣu tathā yatnaṃ karomyaham /
SA11bsa054_u:3720: ete sattvāḥ karmakleśaparāyattāḥ parasparamasamañjasakarmakāriṇo nivartayitumaśakyā iti /
SA11bsa054_u:3721: evaṃ buddhvā jñātvā punaḥ puṇyeṣu kuśaleṣu karmasu tathā yatnaṃ karomyaham,
SA11bsa054_u:3723: yena tathāvidhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ pratilabhya sanmārge pravartitāḥ santaḥ sarve maitracittā hitasukhavidhānatatparāḥ parasparamanyonyaṃ bhaviṣyanti //
SA11bsa054_u:3724: drohacittaṃ vinivartya priyavastūpaghātakāriṇi laukikodāharaṇena dveṣaṃ nivartayediti ślokadvayamupadarśayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3729: ekasmin gṛhe 'gninā dahyamāne yathā tasmād gṛhādanyad gṛhaṃ gṛhāntaraṃ gatvā /
SA11bsa054_u:3731: tadantargatamanyadapi vastu mā dhākṣīditi śaṅkayā tadākṛṣyāpanīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:3734_0: evamuktodāharaṇanyāyena cittaṃ mano yasya vastuna āsaṅgādāsakto dahyate paritapyate
SA11bsa054_u:3734_1: dveṣavahninā pratighānalena tadāsaṅgasthānaṃ vastu tatkṣaṇaṃ na kālāntarapalimbena
SA11bsa054_u:3737: tasya uktakrameṇa uddāhaḥ parikṣayo mā bhūt /
SA11bsa054_u:3739: api ca / lābha evāyaṃ labdhaḥ, yanmanuṣyaduḥkhairnarakaphalaṃ karma vipacyate iti pratipādayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3742: [Bcp_100] yo hi māraṇamarhati, sa yadi hastamātraṃ chittvā mucyate, tadā na kācit kṣatirasya /
SA11bsa054_u:3743: pratyuta labdhalābhamātmānaṃ manyate atyalpamidaṃ maraṇaduḥkhāt karacchedanaduḥkhamiti /
SA11bsa054_u:3744: tathā yo 'pi manuṣyaduḥkhaṃ tāḍanabandhanatiraskārādikṛtamanubhūya narakaduḥkhādvimukto bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:3746: na kiṃcididaṃ duḥkhaṃ narakaduḥkhāt, sukhameva tat /
SA11bsa054_u:3747: tato yadi vicakṣaṇaḥ syāt, tadā saumanasyamevātra yuktamasya //
SA11bsa054_u:3748: athāpi syāt- na mayā svalpamātre 'pi duḥkhe kṣamā kartuṃ śakyata iti, atrāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3749: Bca_6.73 yadyetanmātramevādya duḥkhaṃ soḍhuṃ na pāryate /
SA11bsa054_u:3751: khaṭacapeṭaloṣṭādiprahārakṛtamīṣanmātramapi duḥkhamidānīṃ soḍhuṃ marṣituṃ na pāryate na śakyate /
SA11bsa054_u:3753: tadayaṃ nārakaduḥkhasaṃvartanīyaḥ krodhaḥ kopaḥ kasmātkāraṇānna vāryate?
SA11bsa054_u:3754: ayameva hi atitarāṃ narakeṣu duḥkhadāyaka iti duḥkhabhīrūṇāmeva krodhaṃ nivartayituṃ yuktaṃ syāt //
SA11bsa054_u:3759: marṣaṇāt punastasya mahārthalābho bhaviṣyatīti vṛttadvayena śikṣayitumāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3761: Bca_6.74 kārito 'smi na cātmārthaḥ parārtho vā kṛto mayā //
SA11bsa054_u:3762: Bca_6.75 na cedaṃ tādṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ mahārthaṃ ca kariṣyati /
SA11bsa054_u:3769: evaṃ duḥkhamanubhavatāpi mayā na ca naiva ātmārthaḥ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaphalasādhanaḥ kṛto niṣpāditaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3772: tadadyāpi na tathaiva mamāsahiṣṇutā yuktetyāha- idaṃ duḥkhaṃ naiva tādṛśaṃ yādṛśaṃ narakasamudbhavam /
SA11bsa054_u:3773: atha ca mahārthaṃ sarvasattvahitasukhavidhānabhūtaṃ buddhatvaṃ sādhayiṣyati /
SA11bsa054_u:3774: ato jagato duḥkhahare trijagatparyāpannasarvasattvaduḥkhapraśamanakare duḥkhe prītirevātra yujyate nāruciriti bhāvaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:3776: Bca_6.76 yadi prītisukhaṃ prāptamanyaiḥ stutvā guṇorjitam /
SA11bsa054_u:3777: manastvamapi taṃ stutvā kasmādevaṃ na hṛṣyasi //
SA11bsa054_u:3778: guṇādhikaṃ stutvā yadi prītisukhaṃ kaiścit prāptam,
SA11bsa054_u:3779: tadā he manaḥ tvamapi tadguṇasaṃvarṇanena kimiti harṣasukhaṃ nānubhavasi?
SA11bsa054_u:3782: tataḥ ahaṃ sarvasukhavaimukhyādidamapi nopādade / vakṣyati hi-
SA11bsa054_u:3783: yatra yatra ratiṃ yāti manaḥ sukhavimohitam /
SA11bsa054_u:3788: Bca_6.77 idaṃ ca te hṛṣṭisukhaṃ niravadyaṃ sukhodayam /
SA11bsa054_u:3790: na hi sarvaṃ hṛṣṭisukhamapākṛtam, api tu yat sāvadyamakuśalahetuḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3791: idaṃ ca paraguṇāśrayaṃ hṛṣṭisukhaṃ niravadyaṃ tava, na ca akuśalahetuḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3793: ata eva na vāritaṃ ca guṇibhirbhagavacchāsanavidhijñaiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3794: ayamaparo 'sya guṇaḥ, yat parāvarjanamuttamaṃ paraguṇeṣu prītyā /
SA11bsa054_u:3795: guṇeṣu evamayaṃ matsarīti manyamānā anye 'pi sattvā āvarjitā bhavanti,
SA11bsa054_u:3798: kiṃ tarhi tāvattasyaiva sukhametaditi mayā soḍhumaśakyamiti / atrāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3799: Bca_6.78 tasyaiva sukhamityevaṃ tavedaṃ yadi na priyam /
SA11bsa054_u:3801: tasyaiva stutikartuḥ sukhamiti evamanenābhiprāyeṇa bhavato yadi idaṃ paraguṇastutipratisamudbhavaṃ sukhaṃ na priyam,
SA11bsa054_u:3804: yadapi ca bhavataḥ svātmasukhanimittaṃ svabhṛtyādiṣu bhṛtidānaṃ karmamūlyadānam,
SA11bsa054_u:3806: ityāderviratervaimukhyāt, tadapi na kartavyameva syāt parasukhavidveṣiṇā /
SA11bsa054_u:3810: kiṃ ca / mithyottaramevedaṃ bhavata iti pratipādayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3813: yadi kaścidbhavato guṇamudīrayati, tadā tasya parasyāniṣṭamapi saukhyamicchasi /
SA11bsa054_u:3819: tasyaiva sukhamityevaṃ tavedaṃ yadi na priyam /
SA11bsa054_u:3825: idamatigarhitameva viśeṣeṇa samutpāditabodhicittasya, yat parasukhasaṃpadasahiṣṇutā nāma /
SA11bsa054_u:3826: yataḥ sarvasattvāḥ triadhātukāntaścarāḥ samastasukhasaṃpattisaṃtarpitā buddhatvamadhigamya mayā kartavyāḥ iti manasikāreṇa bodhicittamutpādyate /
SA11bsa054_u:3827: tadutpādya kasmāt sattveṣu kupyate? adya idānīm /
SA11bsa054_u:3829: iti akaraṇīyameva tat parasukhavaimukhyacittaṃ bodhisattvasyeti bhāvaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:3830: yaḥ punarutpāditabodhicitto 'pi parasya lābhasatkārasaṃpattimabhisamīkṣya tadīrṣyākaṣāyitahṛdayaḥ tenaiva śokena dahyate,
SA11bsa054_u:3832: Bca_6.81 trailokyapūjyaṃ buddhatvaṃ sattvānāṃ kila vāñchasi /
SA11bsa054_u:3834: athavā syādetat- na khalu mayā tatsukhameva na mṛṣyate,
SA11bsa054_u:3836: trayo lokāeva kāmarūpārūpyadhātulakṣaṇāḥ lokaprasiddhayā vā svargādisvabhāvāḥ trailokyam, tatsamudāyo vā /
SA11bsa054_u:3844: Bca_6.82 puṣṇāti yastvayā poṣyaṃ tubhyameva dadāti saḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3846: tvayā poṣaṇīyaṃ priyaputrakādikaṃ tvadīyaṃ yaḥ puṣṇāti, sa tubhyameva dadāti /
SA11bsa054_u:3848: ataḥ tvatkuṭumbajīvinaṃ tvadīyaṃ kuṭumbaṃ jīvayati yaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:3849: taṃ tathāvidhaṃ puruṣaṃ labdhvā prāpya prahṛṣyasi na?
SA11bsa054_u:3850: kākvā pṛcchati- prakupyasi, na prahṛṣyase cetyarthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3851: tathā prakṛte 'pi yena sarvasattvā ātmīyatvena gṛhītāḥ, tasya tatsukhaiḥ sukhamevocitamiti //
SA11bsa054_u:3852: syādetat- buddhatvameva tvayā teṣāṃ pratijñātam, na tu punaranyasukhamityāśaṅkayāha-

SA11bsa054_u:3868: tatkimakāraṇameva tadvidveṣiṇā ātmaghātāya yatnaḥ kriyate iti pratipādayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3869: Bca_6.84 yadi tena na tallabdhaṃ sthitaṃ dānapatergṛhe /

SA11bsa054_u:3873: bhavatastu kiṃ tasmājjātam? sarvathāpi tena labdhena gṛhāvasthitena vā na tadvastu tavāsti /

SA11bsa054_u:3878: labhamāno na gṛhṇātu vada kena na kupyasi //
SA11bsa054_u:3880: sa kiṃ vārayatu puṇyāni pūrvajanmakṛtāni vipākonmukhāni,
SA11bsa054_u:3882: uta prasannān dāyakadānapatīn vārayatu, atha svaguṇān vārayatu, yānāśritya eṣāṃ prasādo jātaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3886: brūhi kena prakāreṇa atra na bhavato 'paritoṣaḥ syāt /

SA11bsa054_u:3888: athāpi syāt- parasyaiva lābhasatkārasaṃpattirasti, na mama /

SA11bsa054_u:3895: yadapi paryeṣamāṇo na labhate, tadapi duḥkham" iti vacanāt // yadvakṣyati-
SA11bsa054_u:3899: [Bcp_104] yat kiṃcit sukhaṃ tat sarvaṃ puṇyaprasūtam /
SA11bsa054_u:3900: iti sukhābhilāṣiṇā śubhe karmaṇi udyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ / yadvakṣyati-

SA11bsa054_u:3907: tava śatrordveṣaviṣayasya tvadabhilāṣamātreṇa apriyamaniṣṭaṃ jātamutpannaṃ ced yadi,
SA11bsa054_u:3909: bhavatu tāvat tasyāniṣṭam, anyasya tu bhavatu, mā vā /

SA11bsa054_u:3916: atha tvadicchayā siddhaṃ tadduḥkhe kiṃ sukhaṃ tava /

SA11bsa054_u:3918: tathāpi tasya duḥkhe samutpanne kiṃ sukhaṃ tava? na kiṃcit /

SA11bsa054_u:3922: evamapi paraduḥkhaparitoṣe yadi arthaḥ prayojanaṃ bhavet,
SA11bsa054_u:3923: tadā ataḥ paraḥ anarthaḥ ko nu? nurityatiśaye /
SA11bsa054_u:3930: kleśā eva baḍiśena carantīti bāḍiśikāḥ tairarpitamādattam /

SA11bsa054_u:3939: na balārthaṃ na cārogye na ca kāyasukhāya me //
SA11bsa054_u:3942: tadyathā- puṇyam, āyurvṛddhiḥ, balavṛddhiḥ, ārogyalābhaḥ, kāyasukhaṃ ceti /
SA11bsa054_u:3944: iyāneva hi svārtho bhavato bhavet prajñāvataḥ svārthavedinaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3945: anyasya punaranyathāpi bhavet, iti ātmani parāmṛśati /

SA11bsa054_u:3951: tadicchatā madyaṃ dyūtaṃ gaṇikā pāradārikaṃ sevanīyaṃ syāt /

SA11bsa054_u:3957: tathā taireva guṇaiḥ saṃbhāvitātmanāmapi śakravat śatruvijayasamudbhūtaṃ yaśo mama jagati vipulatāṃ gamiṣyati,
SA11bsa054_u:3959: na cātra paramārthataḥ kiṃcit prayojanam, anyatra mithyāvikalpāditi pratipādayannāha-

SA11bsa054_u:3967: Bca_6.93 tathā stutiyaśohānau svacittaṃ pratibhāti me //

SA11bsa054_u:3986: tasyaiva tatprītisukhaṃ bhāgo nālpo 'pi me tataḥ //

SA11bsa054_u:3988: kutaḥ? tasyaiva tato ya eva prītaḥ stutikartā, tat prītisukhaṃ nānyasya /
SA11bsa054_u:3989: ato bhāgo nālpo 'pi īṣadapi mama tataḥ parasaṃtānavartinaḥ prītisukhāt //
SA11bsa054_u:3990: syādetat- parasukhenaiva sukhitvaṃ bodhisattvānām / tat kimiti tato bhāgo nāstīti? atrāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3991: Bca_6.96 tatsukhena sukhitvaṃ cetsarvatraiva mamāstu tat /
SA11bsa054_u:3994: tadā tasminnanyatra prasādena sukhite 'pi mamāstu tatsukhitvam /

SA11bsa054_u:4003: [Bcp_107] api ca / stutyādayo mama apacayameva dadhatītyupadarśayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4004: Bca_6.98 stutyādayaśca me kṣemaṃ saṃvegaṃ nāśayantyamī /

SA11bsa054_u:4013: ahameva guṇādhikaḥ, mamaiva sarvā saṃpattirucitā nānyeṣāmiti matvā //
SA11bsa054_u:4018: stutyādighātāya virodhāya ye sattvā mama pratyupasthitā udyatāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4020: tato rakṣārthaṃ trāṇārthaṃ rakṣaṇanimittaṃ pravṛttā udyuktā nanu te mama /

SA11bsa054_u:4026: kalyāṇamitrakṛtyakāriṇaḥ śatrutvenābhimatā vimocayanti viyojayanti māṃ bandhāt saṃsāraduḥkhalakṣaṇāt lābhādisvabhāvādvā /
SA11bsa054_u:4027: dveṣasteṣu paramopakāriṣu prītisthāneṣu kathaṃ mama? na yukta ityabhiprāyaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:4035: Bca_6.102 puṇyavighnaḥ kṛto 'nenetyatra kopo na yujyate /

SA11bsa054_u:4057: evaṃ prakṛte 'pi sa janaka eva kathaṃ tasya janyasya vighna ucyate vighātaheturabhidhīyate?

SA11bsa054_u:4093: tatra kāraṇamāha- yasmādetatpūrvā, eṣa eva pūrvaṃ kāraṇaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathoktā /
SA11bsa054_u:4095: yuktamevaitad yadi tenaivābhiprāyeṇa asau pravartate, kevalamapakārāśaya evāyamityāśaṅkayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4096: Bca_6.109 kṣamāsiddhayāśayo nāsya tena pūjyo na cedariḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4098: kṣamā asya bodhisattvasya niṣpadyatām, ityāśayo nāsya apakārodyatasya /

SA11bsa054_u:4100: evaṃ tarhi kuśalaniṣpattihetuḥ nirabhiprāyo 'pi saddharmaḥ pravacanalakṣaṇaḥ kathaṃ pūjyate?
SA11bsa054_u:4101: so 'pi tadāśayaśūnyatvāt pūjanīyo na syāt, iti bhāvaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:4102: atha saddharmasya nirabhiprāyatayā apakārāśayo 'pi nāsti, asya punastadviparyayo dṛśyate, ityāha-

SA11bsa054_u:4106: anyatheti apakāriṇi dveṣacittamanivārayataḥ kathaṃ mama kṣāntiḥ?

SA11bsa054_u:4120: ataḥ asmāt sa eva yasyāśayaṃ pratītyotpadyate kṣamā kṣamāhetuḥ, na tu punaryo vaidyavadaduṣṭāśayaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4122: etaduktaṃ bhavati- kiṃ mamānena āśayavicāreṇa prayojanam?

SA11bsa054_u:4135: yato yasmādetān sattvān jināṃśca ārādhya ānukūlyānuṣṭhānena bahavo buddhatvamadhigamya sarvalaukikalokottarasarvasaṃpattiparyantaṃ prāptāḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:4136: syādetat- yadi nāma sattvā api sarvasaṃpattihetavaḥ,

SA11bsa054_u:4140: ubhayebhyo 'pi buddhadharmāṇāṃ balavaiśāradyādīnāmāgame pratilambhe tulye aviśiṣṭe /

SA11bsa054_u:4143: ityevaṃ kaḥkramaḥ paripāṭiḥ prekṣāvatām? naiva yuktetyarthaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:4144: nanu ca sattvānāṃ rāgādimalairhīnāśayatvāt kāraṇatve 'pi kathaṃ bhagavatsamānatā yujyate ityāśaṅkayāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4145: Bca_6.114 āśayasya ca māhātmyaṃ na svataḥ kiṃ tu kāryataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4146: samaṃ ca tena māhātmyaṃ sattvānāṃ tena te samāḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:4148: tathāpi upayuktopayogitvena hetubhāvasya tulyatvāt samaṃ māhātmyamucyate /

SA11bsa054_u:4162: paramārthatastu na buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ samāḥ kecit sattvāḥ santi /
SA11bsa054_u:4163: yadi bhaveyustathāvidhāḥ, tadā te 'pi buddhā eva syuḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4167: anantaḥ aparyantaḥ aṃśaḥ, ekadeśo 'pi yeṣāṃ guṇārṇavānām, te tathā, taiḥ //

SA11bsa054_u:4174: tasya tadguṇādhārasya pūjānimittaṃ trailokyamapi na kṣamam /
SA11bsa054_u:4184: aparyantopakāriṇāṃ niṣkṛtiḥ tatkṛtāpakārasya niṣkrayaṇaṃ pariśodhanamiti yāvat /
SA11bsa054_u:4187: prabhucittānukūlavartina eva bhṛtyasya vāñchitaṃ sidhyatītyavagamya sattvārādhanamevopādeyamiti pratipādayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4188: Bca_6.120 bhindanti dehaṃ praviśantyavīciṃ yeṣāṃ kṛte tatra kṛte kṛtaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:4190: karacaraṇaśironayanasvamāṃsāni chittvā chittvā pradattāni yeṣāṃ hitasukhavidhānāya,
SA11bsa054_u:4191: tathā avīcīmapi paraduḥkhaduḥkhino yeṣāṃ kṛte praviśanti tatsamuddharaṇāya /
SA11bsa054_u:4193: tatra teṣu sattveṣu kṛte kṛtaṃ syāt /

SA11bsa054_u:4209: ito 'pi ca sattvāpakāraṃ parityajya tadārādhanameva kartavyamityāha-

SA11bsa054_u:4296: tadevaṃ vipakṣapratiṣedhena tridhā kṣāntiṃ pratipādya vīryaṃ pratipādayitumāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4297: Bca_7.1 evaṃ kṣamo bhajedvīryaṃ vīrye bodhiryataḥ sthitā /

SA11bsa054_u:4310: Bca_7.2 kiṃ vīryaṃ kuśalotsāhastadvipakṣaḥ ka ucyate /

SA11bsa054_u:4360: tena tāvatkālaṃ sukhānubhavanameva mama yuktamityatrāha- yadi nāmaivam,

SA11bsa054_u:4364: iti vadhyapuruṣasyeva sarvato vadhyaghātakairadhiṣṭhitasya vadhyabhūmiṃ nīyamānasya niḥsaraṇamapaśyataḥ sukhāsikāvalambanamanucitameva bhavataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4366: athāpi syāt- yadi nāma avaśyaṃbhāvitā mṛtyoḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:4370: saṃbhṛtaḥ sajjīkṛtaḥ saṃbhāraḥ sāmagrī vadhāya vyādhijarālakṣaṇo yena /

SA11bsa054_u:4389: tena samucchūnāni samunnatāni sāśrūṇi sabāṣpāṇi raktāni tāmravarṇāni locanāni yeṣu ānaneṣu tāni tathā /
SA11bsa054_u:4390: tathābhūtāni ānanāni mukhāni yeṣāṃ bandhūnāṃ te tathā /

SA11bsa054_u:4396: svayaṃkṛtapāpakarmasmaraṇena maraṇasamaye kimityevaṃ mayā kṛtamiti paścāttāpena tāpitaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4398: kiṃ tu śṛṇvannādāṃśca nārakān tīvrakāraṇānubhavanadukhanirmuktān vikrośitaśabdān narakasamudbhūtān arthāntarakopāṇāmeva (?) /
SA11bsa054_u:4399: tacchrutvā mamāpyevamevāvasthā iti saṃtrāsena yaḥ purīṣotsargo viṭpravṛttiḥ, tenopaliptagātraḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4402: iti matvā svasthāvasthāyāmeva yatitavyam iti śikṣayitumāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4403: Bca_7.11 jīvamatsya ivāsmīti yuktaṃ bhayamihaiva te /
SA11bsa054_u:4405: jīvanta eva matsyāḥ krameṇa bhakṣaṇārthaṃ prāyaḥ prāgdiṅanivāsibhireva janai rakṣyante /
SA11bsa054_u:4406: jīvanopalakṣitā matsyā jīvamatsyā iti teṣāmeva samayaḥ /

SA11bsa054_u:4438: yadi nedānīmeva yatnaḥ kriyate, tadā punariyaṃ durgatigatasya naurdurlabhā bhaviṣyati / yaduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:4447: sugatiparaṃparāsaṃjananādanantā aparyavasānā ratisaṃtatiḥ sukhapravāho yasyāḥ sā tathā /
SA11bsa054_u:4457: evaṃ kutsitāsaktimapi nirākṛtya viṣādātmāvamanyanāṃ vīryavipakṣaṃ nirākartum,
SA11bsa054_u:4472: kuto me bodhiriti, kathamahaṃ varākaḥ samyaksaṃbodhibhājanam?

SA11bsa054_u:4664: tacca na śithilavyāpārasādhyamityavagamyāpi yadi anārabdhavīryatayā [Bcp_125] mandasamārambha eva tiṣṭhāmi,
SA11bsa054_u:4665: tadā durgativinipātamantareṇa nānyā gatirasti mameti vicintya saṃvegamāmukhīkurvan chandamutpādayediti samudāyārthaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:4673: mandavīryeṇa kalpārṇavaiḥ anekaiḥ kalpaśatasahasraiḥ kṣayaḥ prahāṇaṃ kriyate /

SA11bsa054_u:4680: Bca_7.36 vṛthā nītaṃ mayā janma kathaṃcillabdhamadbhutam //
SA11bsa054_u:4681: vṛthā viphalameva mayā janma akṣaṇavinirmuktaṃ nītaṃ preritam /

SA11bsa054_u:4688: Bca_7.38 bhītebhyo nābhayaṃ dattamārtā na sukhinaḥ kṛtāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4691: tena sukhaṃ saumanasyaṃ na prāptaṃ nādhigataṃ mayā /

SA11bsa054_u:5554: tena vardhitamiti tena amedhyena mātṛpītāśitasya vāntakalpasya rasena vardhitaṃ garbhasthitamupabṛṃhitam /
SA11bsa054_u:5559: atha aśucirāgo 'hamiti pakṣasvīkāraḥ, tathāpi upālambhastadavastha evetyāha-
SA11bsa054_u:5572: ayamiha mahāmohasya prabhāvaḥ, yadātmagatameva tāvadaśucisvabhāvaṃ na vigarhasi /
SA11bsa054_u:5579: āsatāṃ tāvattāni vastūni, tatsaṃsargādbhūmirapi śucisvabhāvā aśucitvaṃ yāti //
SA11bsa054_u:5582: evaṃ tāvadadhyakṣasiddho 'yaṃ vyavahāraḥ, tathāpi yadi nādhimucyase, na saṃpratyeṣi /
SA11bsa054_u:5586: vikhāditakavinīlakavipūyakādisvabhāvatayā bībhatsān bhayaṃkarān vā aparāniti ato 'dhikān //
SA11bsa054_u:5587: kiṃ ca / prakṛtyā vikṛta evāyaṃ kāyo nābhiratisthānaṃ yujyate ityupadarśayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:5593: evaṃ tatsvabhāvaṃ viditvāpi kathaṃ tasminneva sthāne bhayasthānatvena ekadā pratipanne punaranyadā jāyate ratirabhiṣvaṅgaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:5594: syādetat- yadi nāma aśucisvabhāvatā kāyasya adhyakṣasiddhā,
SA11bsa054_u:5598: śarīre niveśito 'pyasau gandhaḥ candanādiprasūtaḥ, yadvaśātkāye kamanīyabuddhirupajāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:5601: ataḥ kasmāt parakīyena gandhena candanasamudbhūtena anyatra yasyāsau gandho na bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:5604: api ca / candanādisaṃskāro 'pi kevalātmopaghātāya vartate, na hitāyeti pratipādayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:5605: Bca_8.66 yadi svabhāvadaurgandhyādrāgo nātra śivaṃ nanu /
SA11bsa054_u:5609: yadi rāgo notpadyate, tadā śivaṃ nanu kalyāṇameva syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:5610: evaṃ guṇasaṃbhave 'pi kiṃ kāraṇamanarthapriyo lokaḥ taṃ kāyaṃ gandhenānulimpati?
SA11bsa054_u:5614: kāyasya svabhāvadurgandhasya kimāyātam, kiṃ bhūtam? na kiṃcit /
SA11bsa054_u:5618: atha tadvaśāt tasmin kamanīyatāmupādāya abhiratirutpadyate ityatrāha-
SA11bsa054_u:5624: Bca_8.69 sa kiṃ saṃskriyate yatnādātmaghātāya śastravat /
SA11bsa054_u:5629: malapaṅkadharaḥ mala eva paṅkaḥ kardamaḥ, taṃ dhārayatīti tathā, snānābhyañjanādivirahāt /
SA11bsa054_u:5632: yadi kāyaḥ prakṛtyā bhīṣaṇaḥ pretānāmiva svabhāvena bhayaṃkaraḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:5640: ātmanaiva saṃcintya ātmano vyāmohamutpādayituṃ yatnavadbhiḥ unmattairasvasthacittaiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:5641: evaṃ ca viparītakarmānuṣṭhānānnaite varākāḥ sacetasa iti khedaṃ karoti śāsrakāraḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:5642: na cātra kaścidātmajño dṛśyata iti unmattairākulā samākīrṇā mahī pṛthivīti //
SA11bsa054_u:5644: Bca_8.70 kaṅkālān katicidṛṣṭvā śmaśāne kila te ghṛṇā /
SA11bsa054_u:5648: etaduktaṃ bhavati- carmaṇyutpāṭite [8. 64] ityādikamuktvā yaduktaṃ kathaṃ jñātvāpītyādi,
SA11bsa054_u:5656: tadeva śarīraṃ śmaśāne ghṛṇāsthānagrāme vā abhiratisthānamiti kākvā brūte /
SA11bsa054_u:5659: na ca anena viśeṣeṇāśucisvabhāvatā ghṛṇāheturnivartate, yena pravṛttiriyaṃ syāditi /
SA11bsa054_u:5662: tathā ca evaṃ vidhamapi draviṇavikalasya naitat sulabhamityupadarśayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:5663: Bca_8.71 evaṃ cāmedhyamapyetadvinā mūlyaṃ na labhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:5665: vinā mūlyaṃ dravyamantareṇa na labhyate na prāpyate /
SA11bsa054_u:5673: yātyarjanena tāruṇyaṃ vṛddhaḥ kāmaiḥ karoti kim //
SA11bsa054_u:5675: kena dhanena prakāreṇa vā asau bālo yauvane yuvāvasthāyāṃ sukhī syāt?
SA11bsa054_u:5677: yadapi kasyacit pitṛpitāmahopārjitadhanena yauvane sukhitvaṃ dṛśyate,
SA11bsa054_u:5681: tadarjayata eva galitavayaso na kaścidupayogo viṣayairiti //
SA11bsa054_u:5682: athāpi syāt- tadarjayatāpi kāmasukhamanubhūyata eva, ityatrāha-
SA11bsa054_u:5684: gṛhamāgatya sāyāhne śerate sma mṛtā iva //
SA11bsa054_u:5686: astaṃ gate savitari svagṛhamāgatya gāḍhamiddhākrāntatvāt mṛtakalpāḥ śerate sma svapanti /
SA11bsa054_u:5689: evamāyuḥsaṃskārān kecit kukāminaḥ kṣapayanti, na ca kāmasukhāsvādamupalabhante /
SA11bsa054_u:5703: vatsarairapi anekavarṣātyaye 'pi putrān dārāṃśca nekṣante na paśyanti /
SA11bsa054_u:5709: yadarthaṃ sukhapratilambhanimittaṃ vikrītaḥ paradāsīkṛtaḥ ātmā kāmaviḍambitaiḥ tanna prāptam,
SA11bsa054_u:5710: taditi sukhaṃ na prāptaṃ na pratilabdham /
SA11bsa054_u:5711: āyuḥsaṃskārā eva hi kevalamanarthakaṃ parakarmānuṣṭhānena kṣayamupanītāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:5712: na sādhukarmaṇi kvacidapi yojitā iti bhāvaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:5716: sukhabubhukṣayā vikrītaḥ parāyattīkṛtaḥ svātmabhāva svakāyo yaiste tathā, teṣām /
SA11bsa054_u:5724: Bca_8.77 raṇaṃ jīvitasaṃdehaṃ viśanti kila jīvitum /
SA11bsa054_u:5728: tatra praviṣṭasya jīvitaṃ syādvā na veti jīvitasya saṃdeho 'sminniti kṛtvā /
SA11bsa054_u:5731: mānārthaṃ dāsatāṃ yānti, balavatā kenacidabhibhūtāḥ svamānoddharaṇārtham /
SA11bsa054_u:5734: ke te? kāmabiḍambitāḥ kāmāya kāmena vā viḍambitāstiraskṛtāḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:5736: ihaiva janmani kāmāsaktacetasāṃ yadduḥkhaṃ dṛśyate tatkathayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:5741: ayaṃ sukhasādhanatvena upādīyamāno 'pi ca anarthaparaṃparāprasūtiheturevārthaḥ iti kathayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:5746: tathā rakṣitasyāpi kathaṃcit taskarādibhirnāśādviṣādo daurmanasyaṃ paritāpaheturanarthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:5748: ityevamarjanādibhiḥ sarvadā vyākulatvāt dhanāsaktacetasāṃ kṣaṇamapi samādhānānavakāśatvāt nāvasaraḥ saṃsārāśṛ[śri?
SA11bsa054_u:5757: yadapi viparyāsāt kathaṃcit sukhamiti pratibhāsate, tadapi na kiṃcit /
SA11bsa054_u:5761: tasyaivaṃbhūtasya atitucchasya sukhāsvādaleśasya paśorapi sādhāraṇāsyārthe tasya nimittam /
SA11bsa054_u:5779: kāyasya ātmaśarīrasyārthe sukhotpādanāya yo 'yaṃ narakādiduḥkhamavigaṇayya kṛtaḥ sarvakālaṃ saṃsārasya pūrvasyāṃ koṭau pariśramaḥ prayāsaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:5781: tatastasmāt pariśramāt koṭiśatenāpi pariśramabhāgena aṃśena buddhatvaṃ syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:5785: Bca_8.83 caryāduḥkhānmahadduḥkhaṃ sā ca bodhirna kāminām //
SA11bsa054_u:5786: caryāduḥkhamapekṣya idameva mahadduḥkhaṃ yatkāmārthe caratāṃ saṃsāre teṣāmavīcyādinarakapatanāt,
SA11bsa054_u:5788: na tu bodhisattvānāṃ pratiniyatakālaṃ svecchayā tadanubhavatām /
SA11bsa054_u:5789: tadevaṃ duḥkhamanubhavatāmapi kāmārthe kāmināṃ sā ca bodhirna bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:5792: Bca_8.84 na śastraṃ na viṣaṃ nāgnirna prapāto na vairiṇaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:5794: amī śastrādayo duḥkhajanakatvena prasiddhā na sādṛśyaṃ bhajante prati kāmānām /
SA11bsa054_u:5795: kasmāt? narakādidurgatiduḥkhasya āgamāt pratipannasya smaraṇāt smaraṇenāmukhīkaraṇāt /
SA11bsa054_u:5797: kāmāstu dīrghakālikatīvranarakādiduḥkhahetava iti kīdṛśī tairupamā bhavet?
SA11bsa054_u:5798: tadevaṃ kāyavivekānantaraṃ cittavivekaṃ pratipādya prakṛte yojayitumāha-
SA11bsa054_u:5801: evamuktakrameṇa udvijya saṃtrāsaṃ kṛtvā pūrvoktaviveke ratimabhiratimutpādayet /
SA11bsa054_u:5806: Bca_8.86 dhanyaiḥ śaśāṅkakaracandanaśītaleṣu ramyeṣu harmyavipuleṣu śilātaleṣu /
SA11bsa054_u:5810: śaśāṅkasya candramasaḥ karā raśmaya eva śuklatāśaityasādharmyāccandanānīva,
SA11bsa054_u:5811: taiḥ śītalāni yāni ślātalāni teṣu caṃkramyata iti saṃbandhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:5818: vījyamānāḥ taiścaṃkramyata iti parāvṛttyā punaḥ punarmandaṃ bhramyate /
SA11bsa054_u:5819: na kevalaṃ caṃkramyate, kiṃ tu parahitāya sattvānāṃ sukhotpādanāya vicintyate /
SA11bsa054_u:5823: Bca_8.87 vihṛtya yatra kvacidiṣṭakālaṃ śūnyālaye vṛkṣatale guhāsu /
SA11bsa054_u:5829: svasyātmanaḥ chando 'bhilāṣaḥ, tena carituṃ śīlamasyeti / svecchācārītyarthaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:5836: iti hi sarvasukhasaṃpattiheturviveka iti cetasi punaḥ punarāmukhīkaraṇāddhetoḥ upaśānto vitarkaḥ asanmanasikāro yasya saḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:5838: evaṃ pariśuddhe cetasi bhāvyamānaṃ bodhicittaṃ prakarṣapadamadhirohatīti viśeṣaṃ tuśabdena darśayati //
SA11bsa054_u:5840: na tāvat parahitasukhāya samyak cittaṃ calati,
SA11bsa054_u:5852: ato yathā mama duḥkhaṃ bādhakaṃ tathā eṣāmapi /
SA11bsa054_u:5856: yathā ātmā duḥkhādduḥkhahetorvā samudbhiyate, tathā anyepi sattvāḥ samuddharaṇīyāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:5857: yathā ātmā sarvathā sukhīkartumiṣyate, tathā anye 'pīti paripālanīyā ātmavat //
SA11bsa054_u:5860: Bca_8.91 hastādibhedena bahuprakāraḥ kāyo yathaikaḥ paripālanīyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:5862: karacaraṇaśiraḥprabhṛtibhedādanekaprakāraḥ kāyo yathikatvenādhyavasitaḥ paripālanīyo bhavati duḥkhanivartanāt sukhopadhānācca,
SA11bsa054_u:5870: tadā kathamiva bhavato duḥkhamanyasaṃtāneṣu na bādhakaṃ syāt?
SA11bsa054_u:5872: Bca_8.92 yadyapyanyeṣu deheṣu madduḥkhaṃ na prabādhate /
SA11bsa054_u:5874: anyeṣu apareṣu śarīreṣu mama duḥkhaṃ yadi nāma prabādhakaṃ na bhavati, tathāpi tadduḥkhameva mama /
SA11bsa054_u:5881: ataḥ svaparaviśeṣamapāsya duḥkhasvabhāvataiva nivartanahetuḥ / ata āha-
SA11bsa054_u:5886: na ca asiddhatā hetoḥ, aviśeṣeṇa duḥkhasvabhāvatāyāḥ prasādhitatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:5887: na cāpyanaikāntikatā, ātmaduḥkhasyāpi hantavyatā na syādaviśeṣāditi viparyayabādhakam /
SA11bsa054_u:5892: ye sattvāste sarve mayā anugrāhyāḥ, yathā ātmasattvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:5898: nanu asti viśeṣo 'nyasmādātmani sukhābhiniveśo nāma / tathā tato 'yamanaikāntiko heturiti / atrāha-
SA11bsa054_u:5899: Bca_8.95 yadā mama pareṣāṃ ca tulyameva sukhaṃ priyam /
SA11bsa054_u:5903: naiva kaścit yena tatraiva ātmanyeva sukhotpādanāya tātparyaṃ na parasminnityarthaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:5905: Bca_8.96 yadā mama pareṣāṃ ca bhayaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca na priyam /
SA11bsa054_u:5906: tadātmanaḥ ko viśeṣo yattaṃ rakṣāmi netaram //
SA11bsa054_u:5908: syādetat- yadi nāma duḥkhātmakatā na viśiṣyate,
SA11bsa054_u:5911: Bca_8.97 tadduḥkhena na me bādhetyato yadi na rakṣyate /
SA11bsa054_u:5913: tasya parasya duḥkhena mama bādhā pīḍā nāstītyato 'smāt kāraṇād yadi na rakṣyate 'nyaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:5915: yato nāgāminaḥ kāyasya paralokabhāvino narakādijātasya duḥkhātmakasya [duḥkhānme] tasyopāttasya kāyasya kācidbādhā saṃbhavati, tasya anyatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:5917: yata evam, tasmāt kenābhiprāyeṇa asau rakṣyate?
SA11bsa054_u:5918: kāya iti prakṛtatvāt pāpānnivartanāt kuśale pravartanācca //
SA11bsa054_u:5919: athāpi syāt- ahameka eva sarvadā, tenātra bhinnatvaṃ nāsti śarīrayoḥ / nāyaṃ doṣa ityatrāha-
SA11bsa054_u:5921: ātmano nirākariṣyamāṇatvāt nirastatvācca leśataḥ tatko 'yamahaṃpratyayasya viṣayo bhaviṣyati?
SA11bsa054_u:5926: itīdamapi adhyavasāyavaśāducyate, na tu punarasya vastutaḥ kiṃcidālambanamasti, vikalpātmakatvāt //
SA11bsa054_u:5928: Bca_8.98 anya eva mṛto yasmādanya eva prajāyate //
SA11bsa054_u:5931: tadā na khalu yadeva skandhapañcakamiha vinaśyati,
SA11bsa054_u:5933: api tu apūrvameva pūrvanivṛttau tatra idaṃpratyayatāviśiṣṭaṃ kleśakarmābhisaṃskṛtamantarābhavasaṃtatyā samutpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:5936: Bca_8.99 yadi tasyaiva yadduḥkhaṃ rakṣyaṃ tasyaiva tanmatam /
SA11bsa054_u:5940: tato yadā anyadduḥkhamanyasya rakṣituṃ na yujyate,
SA11bsa054_u:5941: tadā kathaṃ pādādau prahāraṃ patantaṃ dṛṣṭvā hastaṃ prasārya rakṣyate?
SA11bsa054_u:5949: yato yadayuktaṃ yuktyā saṃgataṃ na bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:5950: tannivartyamapasāryaṃ svakīyaṃ parakīyaṃ ca yathābalaṃ yathāsāmarthyam /
SA11bsa054_u:5955: tadetaddvayaṃ yathāsaṃbhavamihaloke paraloke ca ātmaduḥkhāpaharaṇāderniyāmakaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA11bsa054_u:5958: yasya duḥkhaṃ sa nāstyasmātkasya tatsvaṃ bhaviṣyati //
SA11bsa054_u:5959: saṃtāno nāma na kaścidekaḥ paramārthasan saṃbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:5961: tasmādeteṣāmeva kṣaṇānāmekapadena pratipādanāya saṃketo kṛto buddhairvyavahārārthaṃ saṃtāna iti /
SA11bsa054_u:5964: anyathā ātmanā kimaparāddhaṃ yenāsau na svīkriyate /
SA11bsa054_u:5965: evaṃ samudāyo 'pi na samudāyibhyo vastusan eko vidyate, tasya tebhyaḥ pṛthaganupalabdheḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:5966: [Bcp_159] tattvānyatvavikalpastu asya avayavivicāreṇaiva gata iti neha pratāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:5971: yathā anekeṣāṃ pipīlikādīnāṃ pūrvāparabhāvena vyavasthitānāṃ svarūpamantareṇa paṅktirnāsti straksūtravadekāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:5972: yathā ca hastyaśvapadātiprabhṛtibhyo militebhyo vyatiriktā nānyā senā kācidekā tatrāsti,
SA11bsa054_u:5974: etacca anyatra [9.73] vistareṇa vicāritamiti neha vicāryate /
SA11bsa054_u:5977: evamātmādeḥ svāminaḥ kasyacidabhāvād yasya saṃbandhi duḥkhaṃ sa nāsti /
SA11bsa054_u:5978: ataḥ kasya tadduḥkhaṃ svātmīyaṃ bhaviṣyati? naiva kasyacidityarthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:5980: tadā kathamayaṃ dṛṣṭānto bhaviṣyati ātmavaditi ātmasattvavaditi ca? satyametat /
SA11bsa054_u:5981: kiṃ tu nedaṃ vyasanitayā sādhanamabhidhīyate, kiṃ tarhi parasya ātmagrahābhiniveśanivāraṇāya /
SA11bsa054_u:5982: tadyadi parasya nivṛtta eva ātmagrahābhiniveśaḥ, tadā na kiṃcit prayojanamanumānaprayogasya /
SA11bsa054_u:5984: tadā tadabhiprāyeṇaiva svaparavibhāgaṃ kṛtvā tatpratyāyanārthaṃ sādhanaṃ dṛṣṭāntaścocyate,
SA11bsa054_u:5987: idamupāttapañcaskandhamātramabhisaṃdhāya dṛṣṭānte dīyamāne na kācit kṣatiḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:5997: duḥkhatvādeva svaparāvibhāgaṃ kṛtvā vāryāṇi niṣedhyāni bhavanti /
SA11bsa054_u:5999: tenāyaṃ niyamaḥ kiṃkṛtaḥ, kena viśeṣeṇa kṛtaḥ? yena svakīyāni ca vāryāṇi na parakīyānīti /
SA11bsa054_u:6000: evaṃ duḥkhatvāditi heturanaikāntiko na bhavatīti samarthitam //
SA11bsa054_u:6001: nanu yadi duḥkhī nāma na kaścit saṃsāre saṃbhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:6006: na vāryameva nirātmakatvādeva yadi manyase, tadā na yuktametat /
SA11bsa054_u:6010: na ca abhyupagamamātreṇa tasya sattā prasidhyati tatsādhakapramāṇābhāvāt,
SA11bsa054_u:6012: evaṃ sati yadi vāryaṃ duḥkham, tadā sarvaṃ vāryam, na cetsarvaṃ vāryam, tadātmāpi /
SA11bsa054_u:6015: tadvaraṃ bahuduḥkhanidānaṃ saiva prathamato notpādayituṃ yujyata iti paravacanāvakāśaṃ śaṅkamāna āha-
SA11bsa054_u:6018: Bca_8.104 jagadduḥkhaṃ nirūpyedaṃ kṛpāduḥkhaṃ kathaṃ bahu //
SA11bsa054_u:6019: jagato duḥkhaṃ narakādikṛtamanekaprakāraṃ samīkṣya idaṃ kṛpākṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ kathaṃ bahu?
SA11bsa054_u:6024: ekasya puruṣasya duḥkhena bahūnāṃ sattvānāṃ yadi duḥkhaṃ vigacchati nivartate,
SA11bsa054_u:6029: ātmaduḥkhaṃ na nihataṃ bahūnāṃ duḥkhināṃ vyayāt //
SA11bsa054_u:6030: yata eva utpādyameva tadduḥkhaṃ kṛpālunā svaparātmanoḥ ata eva supuṣpacandreṇa bodhisattvena /
SA11bsa054_u:6038: yaduktaṃ supuṣpacandrasyetivṛttake [samādhi. 35]- tathā hi- atīte 'dhvani ratnapadmacandraviśuddhābhyudgatarājo nāma tathāgato 'bhūt /
