SA11bsa054_u:6455: kimiha sarvaduḥkhahetunā bhāvābhiniveśena prayojanam? ataḥ idamarthasya tattvam-
SA11bsa054_u:6459: evaṃ niḥsvabhāvataiva sarvabhāvānāṃ nijaṃ pāramārthikaṃ rūpamavatiṣṭhate /
SA11bsa054_u:6462: anyathā bhāvābhiniveśo vā śūnyatābhiniveśo veti na kaścidviśeṣaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:6464: na ca abhāvasya kalpitasvabhāvatayā kiṃcit svarūpamasti /
SA11bsa054_u:6466: yadi ca bhāvasyaiva kaścit svabhāvaḥ syāt, tadā tatpratiṣedhātmā abhāvo 'pi syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:6468: ato na bhāvanivṛttirūpaḥ abhāvo nāma kaścit /
SA11bsa054_u:6469: na ca bhāvābhāvayoruktakrameṇa asattve pratipādite tadubhayasaṃkīrṇātmatā saṃbhavati ubhayapratiṣedhasvabhāvatā vā,
SA11bsa054_u:6471: tasminnirākṛte sarva eva amī ekaprahāreṇa nirastā bhavantīti / tasmāt-
SA11bsa054_u:6475: subhūtirāha- ihāyuṣman śāradvatīputra bodhisattvayānikaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anupāyakuśalo rūpaṃ śūnyamiti prajānāti, saṅgaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6480: evaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jivhā kāyo manaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:6499: etaduktaṃ bhavati- sarva eva amī ādhyātmikā bāhyāśca bhāvāḥ svabhāvadvayamābibhrataḥ samupajāyante yaduta sāṃvṛtaṃ pāramārthikaṃ ca /
SA11bsa054_u:6503: anayośca svabhāvayormṛṣādṛśāṃ bāliśānāṃ yo viṣayaḥ, tat saṃvṛtisatyam /
SA11bsa054_u:6504: yaśca samyagdṛśāmadhigatatattvānāṃ viṣayaḥ, tat paramārthasatyamiti vyavasthā śāstravidām / yadāha-
SA11bsa054_u:6506: samyagdṛśāṃ yo viṣayaḥ sa tattvaṃ mṛṣādṛśāṃ saṃvṛtisatyamuktam //
SA11bsa054_u:6514: idameva satyadvayaṃ nānyat satyamastīti avadhāraṇārtho 'pi yujyate cakāraḥ / taduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:6519: satya ime duvi lokavidūnāṃ diṣṭa svayaṃ aśruṇitva pareṣām /
SA11bsa054_u:6520: saṃvṛti yā ca tathā paramārtho satyu na sidhyati kiṃ ca tṛtīyu //
SA11bsa054_u:6522: nanu catvāri āryasatyāni duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgalakṣaṇāni abhidharme kathitāni bhagavatā,
SA11bsa054_u:6523: tat kathaṃ dve eva satye iti?
SA11bsa054_u:6524: satyam, kiṃ tarhi vaineyajanāśayānuśayavaśādete dve eva catvāri kṛtvā kathitāni (kathite?)
SA11bsa054_u:6529: syādetat- saṃvṛtiravidyopadarśitātmatayā abhūtasamāropasvarūpatvādvicārāt śataśo viśīryamāṇāpi kathaṃ satyamiti /
SA11bsa054_u:6534: ata eva lokasaṃvṛtisatyaṃ ceti śāstre 'pi viśeṣa ukta ācāryapādaiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6535: vastutastu paramārtha eva ekaṃ satyam, ato na kācit kṣatiriti /
SA11bsa054_u:6537: ekameva bhikṣavaḥ paramaṃ satyaṃ yaduta apramoṣadharma nirvāṇam,
SA11bsa054_u:6542: paramārthasatyaṃ tu na jñāyate kīdṛk kiṃsvabhāvaṃ kiṃlakṣaṇamiti /
SA11bsa054_u:6545: kenacit prakāreṇa tat sarvabuddhiviṣayīkartuṃ na śakyate iti yāvat /
SA11bsa054_u:6548: ataḥ sarvopādhiśūnyatvāt kathaṃ kayācit kalpanayā paśyet?
SA11bsa054_u:6550: vikalpajanmāno hi śabdā vikalpadhiyāmaviṣaye na pravartitumutsahante /
SA11bsa054_u:6552: tathāpi bhājanaśrotṛjanānugrahārthaṃ parikalpamupādāya saṃvṛtyā nidarśanopadarśanena kiṃcidabhidhīyate //
SA11bsa054_u:6553: yathā timiraprabhāvāt taimirikaḥ sarvamākāśadeśaṃ keśoṇḍukamaṇḍitamitastato mukhaṃ vikṣipannapi paśyati /
SA11bsa054_u:6554: tathā kurvantamavekṣya ataimirikaḥ kimayaṃ karotīti tatsamīpamupasṛtya tadupalabdhakeśapraṇihitalocano 'pi na keśākṛtimupalabhate,
SA11bsa054_u:6556: yadā punarasau taimirikaḥ ataimirikāya svābhiprāyaṃ prakāśayati- keśāniha paśyāmīti,
SA11bsa054_u:6557: tadā tadvikalpāpasāraṇāya tasmai yathābhūtamasau bravīti- nātra keśāḥ santīti /
SA11bsa054_u:6559: na ca tena tathā pratipādayatāpi kasyacit pratiṣedhaḥ kṛto bhavati vidhānaṃ vā /
SA11bsa054_u:6560: tacca keśānāṃ tattvaṃ yadataimirikaḥ paśyati, tanna taimirikaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:6563: tāneva skandhādīn yena svabhāvena nirastasamastāvidyāvāsanā buddhā bhagavantaḥ paśyanti ataimirikopalabdhakeśadarśananyāyena,
SA11bsa054_u:6568: iti paramārthato 'vācyamapi paramārthatattvaṃ dṛṣṭāntadvāreṇa saṃvṛtimupādāya kathaṃcit kathitam /
SA11bsa054_u:6569: na tu tadaśeṣasāṃvṛtavyavahāravirahitasvabhāvaṃ vastuto vaktuṃ śakyate iti / yaduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:6570: anakṣarasya dharmasya śrutiḥ kā deśanā ca kā /
SA11bsa054_u:6574: paramārthadeśanāvagamācca paramārthādhigamo bhavati, tasyāstadupāyatvāt / yaduktaṃ śāstre-
SA11bsa054_u:6579: evaṃ paramārthadeśanopāyabhūtā saṃvṛtiḥ, paramārthādhigamaśca upeyabhūta iti /
SA11bsa054_u:6581: nanu ca tathāvidhamapi tathāvidhabuddhiviṣayaḥ paramārthataḥ kiṃ na bhavatītyatrāha- buddhiḥ saṃvṛtirucyate iti /
SA11bsa054_u:6588: iti naiva kācid buddhiḥ pāramārthikarūpagrāhiṇī paramārthato yujyate /
SA11bsa054_u:6592: yadi hi devaputra paramārthataḥ paramārthasatyaṃ kāyavāṅyanasāṃ viṣayatāmupagacchet,
SA11bsa054_u:6604: tacca bhagavatā śūnyataḥ sudṛṣṭaṃ suviditaṃ susākṣātkṛtam /
SA11bsa054_u:6616: yāvanna lābho nālabho na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ na yaśo nāyaśo na rūpaṃ nārūpamityādi //
SA11bsa054_u:6622: evaṃ saṃvṛtiparamārthabhedena dvividhaṃ satyaṃ vyavasthāpya tadadhikṛtaśca loko 'pi dvividha evetyupadarśayannāha- tatra loke ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:6623: Bca_9.3 tatra loko dvidhā dṛṣṭo yogī prākṛtakastathā /
SA11bsa054_u:6632: yogaḥ samādhiḥ sarvadharmānupalambhalakṣaṇaḥ, so 'syāstīti yogī loka ityekaḥ prakāro rāśiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6633: tathā prakṛtiḥ saṃsārapravṛtteḥ kāraṇamavidyā tṛṣṇā, tasyā jāta iti prākṛtaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6634: prākṛta eva prākṛtako loka iti dvitīyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6637: syādetat- ubhayorapi yathāsvaṃ tattvadarśitvāt kataraḥ punaranayorbhrāntimānastu ya evānyatareṇa bādhyate?
SA11bsa054_u:6638: kaḥ punaranayoḥ kena bādhyata ityāha- tatretyādi /
SA11bsa054_u:6639: tatreti saptamyā samudāyanirdeśaḥ, nirdhāraṇe ca saptamī /
SA11bsa054_u:6640: tatra tayoryogiprākṛtakayorlokayormadhye prākṛtako lokaḥ prākṛtakatvajātyā samudāyānnirdhāryate,
SA11bsa054_u:6644: yogī eva lokaḥ yogilokaḥ, tena bādhyate iti viparyastamatirvyavasthāpyate /
SA11bsa054_u:6647: idamihābhimatam- yathā vibhramāhitasadbhāvaṃ timiropahatacakṣuṣaḥ asadbhūtakeśoṇḍukādidarśino jñānaṃ yathāvasthitavastutattvagrāhiṇo 'taimirikajñānena bādhyate,
SA11bsa054_u:6655: atha kiṃ prākṛtā eva bādhyante yogibhiḥ, uta yogino 'pītyāha- bādhyanta ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:6660: uttare ca uttare ca uttarottarāḥ, taiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6665: dhiyo jñānasya prajñāyā viśeṣaḥ tattadāvaraṇavigamāt prakarṣaḥ, tena /
SA11bsa054_u:6668: tathā hi- pramuditākhyaprathamabhūmilābhino bodhisattvasya jñānādiguṇāpekṣayā taduttaravimalābhidhānadvitīyabhūmilābhino bodhisattvasya jñānaprabhāvādayo guṇā viśiṣyante /
SA11bsa054_u:6670: tathā prathamadhyānādilābhināmapi uttarottarairbādhanaṃ yojanīm, yāvat sāsravāṇāmanāsravairiti //
SA11bsa054_u:6671: syādetat- satyapi yogināṃ dhiyo viśeṣe prākṛtajñānaṃ bhrāntamiti kathamavagamayituṃ śakyata ityāha dṛṣṭāntenobhayeṣṭeneti-
SA11bsa054_u:6673: ubhayeṣāṃ yogiprākṛtakānāmiṣṭaḥ abhimataḥ, tena dṛṣṭāntena nidarśanena /
SA11bsa054_u:6677: tathā hi- ye tāvat sarvajanapratipannasvarūpā rūpādayaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:6679: ye punarime svapnamāyādiṣu upalabdhāḥ, te prākṛtakānāmapi /
SA11bsa054_u:6680: atastatra ubhayorapi vipratipatterabhāvāt dṛṣṭāntadharmatā na vihanyate /
SA11bsa054_u:6681: yeṣāṃ tu mīmāṃsakādīnāṃ deśakālānyathātmakaṃ vastu eva tattathā pratibhāsate iti matam,
SA11bsa054_u:6682: te 'nyatra nirākṛtā iti na tanmatamiha nirasyate /
SA11bsa054_u:6683: ye tu svayūthyāḥ cittameva vastusat svapnādiṣu tathā pratibhāsate iti manyante,
SA11bsa054_u:6686: atastena dṛṣṭāntena viparītavastusvarūpagrāhitayā prākṛtakajñānaṃ bhrāntamiti vyavasthāpyate /
SA11bsa054_u:6688: nanu yadi niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā iti vastutattvam,
SA11bsa054_u:6689: kathaṃ tarhi sarvasattvasamuddharaṇāśayena dānādiṣu saṃbhāraparipūraṇārthaṃ tattvavedināmapi bodhisattvānāṃ pravṛttiḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:6690: teṣāmapi niḥsvabhāvatvāt, ityata āha- kāryārthamavicārataḥ iti /
SA11bsa054_u:6695: tathābhūteṣvapi tatra idaṃpratyayatāniyamasya vidyamānatvāt na hetuphalabhāvasya virodhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6696: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yadyapi māyādisvabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvā dānādayaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:6697: tathāpi trikoṭipariśuddhyā sādarādiyogena abhyasyamānāḥ tathābhūtā api paramārthādhigamāya hetubhāvamāpadyante,
SA11bsa054_u:6700: etādṛśādeva hetoretādṛśaṃ phalamadhigamyate, tasya tadupeyatvāt / taduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:6708: sarvadharmāṇāṃ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvāt hetvanurūpaṃ ca sarvatra phalamiṣyate /
SA11bsa054_u:6709: ataḥ sāṃvṛtādapi niḥsvabhāvāddhetoḥ niḥsvabhāvatādhigama eva phalam,
SA11bsa054_u:6711: iti dānādayo vastuto niḥsvabhāvā api paramārthatattvādhigamāya sarvasattveṣu karuṇāyamānairbodhisattvairupādīyante,
SA11bsa054_u:6719: Bca_9.5 lokena bhāvā dṛśyante kalpyante cāpi tattvataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6722: hetupratyayaṃ pratītya bhavanti svarūpaṃ labhante iti bhāvāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6723: na punaḥ pāramārthikaṃ rūpaṃ nijameṣāmasti, iti bhāvaśabdena niḥsvabhāvatābhidhānaṃ pratīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:6724: satsvarūpeṇa na kevalaṃ dṛśyante kalpyante cāpi tattvataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6729: na tu punaryathā yoginā māyeva māyāvat svabhāvaśūnyā dṛśyante,
SA11bsa054_u:6731: ityatrāsmin vivādo vipratipattiryogilokayoḥ yoginā saha lokasyetyarthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6732: tatpratipanne vastuttattve lokasyāpratipatteḥ lokena saha vā yoginaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:6734: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- sarvabhāvānāṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ pāramārthikaṃ ceti rūpadvayamasti,
SA11bsa054_u:6735: tatra yat sāṃvṛtaṃ tadeva lokena pratīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:6740: athāpi syāt- yadetat samastajanasādhāraṇamarthakriyākṣamaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇapratītaṃ vasturūpam,
SA11bsa054_u:6741: tat kathamapahrotuṃ śakyata iti parasya hṛdayamāśaṅkayāha pratyakṣamapītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:6745: tadapi prasiddhayā rūḍhyā lokapravādena na pramāṇataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6746: na pramāṇenādhigataṃ sat pratyakṣaṃ rūpādīti saṃbandhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6748: na ca laukikapramāṇasamadhigamyaṃ tāttvikaṃ rūpam, sarvajanānāṃ tattvaveditvaprasaṅgāt / yadāha-
SA11bsa054_u:6754: rūpādi tattvaṃ pratyakṣamapi yadi na pramāṇādhigatam, kathaṃ tatprasiddhiḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:6757: yathā ca paramārthato 'śucini strīkalevarādau tadāsaktiviparyastacetasāṃ śucibuddhirupajāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:6762: yadi na pratyakṣapramāṇāt tatsiddhiḥ, āgamāttarhi bhaviṣyati /
SA11bsa054_u:6763: tathā hi skandhadhātvāyatanādisvabhāvatayā bhagavatā bhāvāḥ sūtre deśitāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:6766: sarvaṃ sarvamiti brāhmaṇa yāvadeva pañca skandhāḥ, dvādaśāyatanāni, aṣṭādaśaḥ dhātavaḥ / iti /
SA11bsa054_u:6769: bhūtiryaiṣāṃ kriyā saiva kārakaṃ saiva cocyate //
SA11bsa054_u:6774: Bca_9.7 lokāvatāraṇārthaṃ ca bhāvā nāthena deśitāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6776: lokānāṃ bhāvābhiniveśināṃ skandhādideśanāvaineyānāṃ sattvānāmāpātataḥ śūnyatādeśanānadhikṛtānāṃ śūnyatāyāmavatāraṇārthaṃ sukumāropakrameṇa pravartanāya /
SA11bsa054_u:6780: nāthena narakādiduḥkhāt sattvān paritrāyamāṇena abhyudayaniḥśreyasasukhaṃ prāpayatā sattvāśayādivedinā buddhena bhagavatā deśitāḥ prakāśitāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:6786: yadi na paramārthato deśitāḥ, kathaṃ tarhi te kṣaṇikā ityāha- tattvataḥ kṣaṇikā naite iti /
SA11bsa054_u:6787: tattvataḥ paramārthataḥ niḥsvabhāvatvāt kṣaṇikā api na bhavanti ete ime bhāvāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6790: kathaṃ [Bcp_182] tarhi deśanāyāmapi kathitā iti manasi nidhāya [āha] saṃvṛtyā cet [iti]- yadi saṃvṛtyā kṣaṇikā abhidhīyanta ityucyate,
SA11bsa054_u:6793: saṃvṛtyā kṣaṇikā na paramārthataḥ iti virudhyate na saṃgacchate /
SA11bsa054_u:6795: sāṃvyavahāribhirakṣaṇikatvapratīteḥ na kṣaṇikatvaṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ rūpamiti yāvat //
SA11bsa054_u:6796: etat siddhāntavādī pariharati na doṣo yogisaṃvṛtyeti-
SA11bsa054_u:6797: Bca_9.8 na doṣo yogisaṃvṛtyā lokātte tattvadarśinaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6800: kutaḥ? yogināṃ pudgalanairātmyasamādhilābhināṃ yā saṃvṛtirvyavahāraḥ, tayā kṣaṇikatayā pratīteḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6801: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- yadi nāma arvāgdarśanaiḥ kṣaṇikatvaṃ na pratīyate, tathāpi yogivyavahāragocaraḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6802: yogivyavahāro 'pi saṃvṛtirūpatāṃ na jahāti, buddhiḥ saṃvṛtirūcyate [9.2] iti vacanāt /
SA11bsa054_u:6803: na ca pratītibādhitaṃ bādhitameva, tathāvidhāyāḥ pratīterapramāṇatvāt //
SA11bsa054_u:6804: kutaḥ punaretat sāṃvṛtamapi kṣaṇikatvādi yogina eva paśyanti nārvāgdarśina ityāha- lokātte tattvadarśina iti /
SA11bsa054_u:6807: yasmāt tattvadarśinaste, tasmāt kṣaṇikatvanairātmyādi lokāpratītamapi pratipadyante /
SA11bsa054_u:6810: anyathā yadi caivaṃ na svīkriyate, tadā bhavadabhyupagate 'pi lokabādhā syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:6812: aśucibhāvanāsamaye aśucīti striyāḥ kāminyā nirūpaṇe vibhāvanāyāṃ lokabādhā syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:6820: syādetat- yadi sarvavyāpinī māyopamasvabhāvatā, buddho 'pi tarhi māyopamaḥ svapnopamaḥ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:6822: evamukte subhūtistān devaputrānetadavocat- māyopamāste devaputrāḥ sattvāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6824: iti hi māyā ca sattvāśca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /
SA11bsa054_u:6836: sacennirvāṇādapi kaścid dharmo viśiṣṭataraḥ syāt, tamapyahaṃ māyopamaṃ svapnopamaṃ vadāmi //
SA11bsa054_u:6837: evaṃ kathaṃ tatra satkārāpakārayoḥ puṇyapāpasamudbhava iti parasyābhiprāyamāśaṅkayannāha māyopamādityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:6840: tadā māyopamānniḥsvabhāvājjinādbhagavataḥ puṇyaṃ sukṛtaṃ pūjāsatkārapādavandanādibhiḥ kathaṃ yathā kathamiveti manyase?
SA11bsa054_u:6843: na hi māyākāranirmitapuruṣasatkārāpakārayoḥ puṇyapāpaprasūtiryukteti parasyā bhiprāyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6845: tathātra parameva paripṛcchati- sadbhāve 'pi kathaṃ yatheti /
SA11bsa054_u:6848: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- yathā kasyacit paramārthasato jināt paramārthasat puṇyamupajāyate,
SA11bsa054_u:6851: iti yadevottaraṃ bhavatām, tadevāsmākamapi, nātiricyate kiṃcit /
SA11bsa054_u:6852: na ca yuktisiddhaṃ paramārthasad vastusvarūpaṃ kiṃcidastīti pratipāditam //
SA11bsa054_u:6853: bhavatu nāma māyopamādapi jināt puṇyam / idaṃ tu kathaṃ samādhīyate ityāha yadi māyopama ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:6854: Bca_9.9 yadi māyopamaḥ sattvaḥ kiṃ punarjāyate mṛtaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:6855: athavā anyathāvatāryate- yadi jino 'pi māyopamaḥ, kā vārtā tarhi sāṃsārikeṣu sattveṣu?
SA11bsa054_u:6858: evaṃ sati mahān doṣaḥ prasajyate ityāha- yadītyādi /
SA11bsa054_u:6859: yadi māyopamo māyāsvabhāvasamānadharmaḥ sattvaḥ prāṇī, tadā kiṃ punarjāyate mṛtaḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:6867: yāvatkālaṃ pratyayānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ mantrauṣadhādīnāṃ sāmagrī samudāyaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:6878: uktamatra- yāvatpratyayasāmagrī tāvat pravartate, yasya tu tathā nāsti, sa nānuvartate iti /
SA11bsa054_u:6882: dīrghaścirakālāvasthitaḥ saṃtānaḥ pravāhaḥ, sa eva kevalastanmātraṃ tena /
SA11bsa054_u:6883: kathamiti pṛcchati- kena prakāreṇa sattvo 'sti vidyate? satyataḥ paramārthataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6884: etāvāṃstu viśeṣaḥ- yasya hi dīrghakālāvasthitihetupratyayaviśeṣo 'sti, sa dīrghakālamanuvartate /
SA11bsa054_u:6885: yasya tu tathā nāsti, sa nānuvartate iti /
SA11bsa054_u:6888: evaṃ tarhi yathā māyāpuruṣavadhādau na prāṇātipātaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:6895: samāne 'pi niḥsvabhāvatve cittasya vijñānasya māyāpuruṣasaṃtāne 'bhāvāt asattvāt na pāpakaṃ na akuśalamutpadyate prāṇātipātādi /
SA11bsa054_u:6898: tatrāpi māraṇābhiprāyeṇa prahāraṃ dadato bhavatyeva aśubham, na tu prāṇātipātaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6899: māyāpuruṣādanyatra kathaṃ prāṇātipāta iti cedāha cittamāyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:6901: cittameva māyā cittamāyā, tayā samete yukte /
SA11bsa054_u:6904: puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ca puṇyapāpe, tayoḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ samudbhavaḥ samutpattiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6908: yaduktam- cittamāyeti, tat paro vighaṭayannāha mantrādīnāmityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:6911: ādiśabdādauṣadhādīnāṃ cittotpādaṃ prati asāmarthyādavyāpārāt na māyācittasaṃbhavaḥ na māyāsvabhāvaṃ cittaṃ saṃbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:6912: yathā paravyāmohanibandhanānāṃ māyākāraprayuktānāṃ mantrādīnāṃ prabhāveṇa hastyādyākāranirvṛttiḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:6919: ata eva nānāpratyayasaṃbhavā nānāpratyayāt anekaprakārakāraṇāt saṃbhava utpādo yasyāḥ sā tathoktā /
SA11bsa054_u:6923: na hi ekasmin kārye kiṃcit kāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭamiti kāryaśabdasāmyāt sarvatra tadeva prakalpayituṃ yujyate,
SA11bsa054_u:6928: naikasya kvacidupalabdhasāmarthyasya pratyayasya kāraṇasya hetoḥ sarvasāmarthyaṃ sarvasmin kārye sāmarthyaṃ śaktirasti saṃbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:6929: kvacidṛṣṭamiti kṛtvā kutraciditi kasmiṃścit samaye deśe kāle vā dṛṣṭamiṣṭaṃ vā /
SA11bsa054_u:6933: etat sarva lokavyavahārānugataṃ kalpanānirmitaṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ vastutattvamupādaya samutthitaṃ na tu paramārthataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6936: etadasahamānaḥ paraḥ punaranyathā prasañjayannāha nirvṛta iti-
SA11bsa054_u:6942: tadā ayaṃ mahān virodhaḥ syādityāha buddho 'pi saṃsaredevamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:6943: Bca_9.13 buddho 'pi saṃsaredevaṃ tataḥ kiṃ bodhicaryayā //
SA11bsa054_u:6944: evamabhyupagamyamāne buddho 'pi sarvāvaraṇaprahāṇato nirvṛto 'pi saṃsaret janmādibhāg bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:6945: yata evam, tataḥ tasmāt kāraṇāt kiṃ bodhicaryayā?
SA11bsa054_u:6948: sā hi sarvasāṃsārikadharmanivṛttaye sarvaguṇasamuccayāśritabuddhatvaprāptaye ca samāśrīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:6951: tat pratyuktameva yāvatpratyayasāmagrītyādinā, punarapi vispaṣṭayannāha pratyayānāmityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:6957: māyāpi na kevalaṃ saṃsāra iti samuccaye apiśabdaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6960: saṃvṛttyāpi kālpanikavyavahāreṇāpi na saṃbhavo na saṃsaraṇam /
SA11bsa054_u:6963: evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat- yaduktaṃ bhagavatā dharmasvāminā sarvajñena- yo bhikṣavaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati,
SA11bsa054_u:6965: yo dharmaṃ paśyati, sa buddhaṃ paśyati /
SA11bsa054_u:6966: tatra katamaḥ pratītyasamutpādo nāma? yadidam- avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:6977: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:6980: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:6983: ya imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ satatasamitaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvadaviparītamajātamabhūtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanālambanaṃ śivamabhayamahāryamavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati,
SA11bsa054_u:6985: yastu evaṃ satatasamitaṃ yāvadavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ dharmaṃ paśyati,
SA11bsa054_u:6989_0: eteṣāmeva ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ yā ekasaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā
SA11bsa054_u:6989_1: sukhasaṃjñā ātmasaṃjñā sattvasaṃjñā jīvasaṃjñā jantusaṃjñā manujasaṃjñā mānavasaṃjñā
SA11bsa054_u:6992: tatra ye rāgadveṣamohā viṣayeṣu, amī avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iutyucyante /
SA11bsa054_u:7009: ye cānye evamādāya upakleśāḥ, ime upāyāsā ityucyante //
SA11bsa054_u:7035: pratyayānāṃ punarucchede sarvathaiva saṃsaraṇaṃ na syāt, kāraṇavaikalyāt /
SA11bsa054_u:7037: evaṃ tāvat sautrāntikādicodyamudasya yogācāravipratipattinirākaraṇāya tanmatena dūṣaṇamudbhāvayannāha yadā na bhrāntirapītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7038: Bca_9.15 yadā na bhrāntirapyasti māyā kenopalabhyate //
SA11bsa054_u:7039: yadā sarvaṃ jagat māyātmakatayā svabhāvaśūnyamupagataṃ madhyamakavādibhiḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7044: yasya punaḥ svacittameva paramārthasat bāhyarūpatayā bhrāntaṃ tathā pratibhāsate,
SA11bsa054_u:7047: yadā māyaiva te nāsti tadā kimupalabhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7048: yadā māyaiva grāhyatayā hastyādyākārapravṛtyā tava vijñānavādino nāsti,
SA11bsa054_u:7054: Bca_9.16 cittasyaiva sa ākāro yadyapyanyo 'sti tattvataḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:7055: uktamatra cittameva bahīrūpatayā bhrāntaṃ hastyādyākāraṃ pratibhāsate iti /
SA11bsa054_u:7057: kiṃ tu yadyapi cittasyaiva jñānasyaiva sa iti deśādivicchedena grāhyatayā pratibhāsamāna ākāro nirbhāsaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7061: yadyapītyabhyupagamyoktam, tathāpi naitat saṃgacchata ityāha cittameva yadā māyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7062: cittameva yadā māyā tadā kiṃ kena dṛśyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7065: na hi vedakacittavyatiriktā kācidanyā māyā nāma,
SA11bsa054_u:7071: ato na kenacit kiṃcit dṛśyeta, iti āndhyamaśeṣasya jagataḥ prāptamiti bhāvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7072: nanu syādevaitat yadi jñānasya ātmasaṃvedanaṃ na syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:7073: yāvatā svasaṃvedanatayā svarūpaṃ saṃvedayat tadabhinnaṃ māyādipratibhāsamapi vedayet /
SA11bsa054_u:7074: tathā ca sati na kācit kṣatiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7076: uktaṃ ca lokanāthena cittaṃ cittaṃ na paśyati /
SA11bsa054_u:7077: svabhāvaśūnyameva sarva jagad yadā yuktitaḥ pratipāditam,
SA11bsa054_u:7078: tadā kaḥ kasya svabhāvo vastutaḥ iti kasya kena vedanaṃ syāt?
SA11bsa054_u:7083: uktaṃ ca kathitaṃ ca lokanāthena lokānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ nāthena śaraṇyena buddhena bhagavatā /
SA11bsa054_u:7088: Bca_9.17 na cchinatti yathātmānamasidhārā tathā manaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:7089: yathā sutīkṣṇāpyasidhārā khaṅgadhārā tadanyavadātmānaṃ svakāyaṃ na cchinatti na vighāṭayati,
SA11bsa054_u:7092: tathā hi na tadevaikaṃ jñānaṃ vedyavedakavedanātmasvabhāvatrayaṃ yuktam /
SA11bsa054_u:7095: sa cittaṃ parigaveṣamāṇo nādhyātmaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyati /
SA11bsa054_u:7102: tat kimanyaccittamanyadālambanam, atha yadevālambanaṃ tadeva cittam?
SA11bsa054_u:7104: atha yadevālambanaṃ tadeva cittam, tat kathaṃ cittaṃ cittaṃ paśyati?
SA11bsa054_u:7106: tadyathā na tasyaiva asidhārayā saiva asiṃdhārā śakyate chettum,
SA11bsa054_u:7107: na tenaiva aṅgulyagreṇa tadeva aṅgulyagraṃ spraṣṭuṃ śakyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7108: evameva tenaiva cittena tadeva cittaṃ draṣṭumiti vistaraḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:7109: atra cittāmātravādinaḥ svātmani kriyāvirodhaṃ vighaṭayituṃ svapakṣaprasādhanāya dṛṣṭāntamudbhāvayannāha ātmabhāvamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7111: ātmabhāvaṃ svasvarūpaṃ yathā dīpaḥ pradīpaḥ saṃprakāśayati dyotayati /
SA11bsa054_u:7112: yathā hi kila andhakārāvṛtaghaṭādivastupratipattaye pradīpa upādīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7114: api tu ghaṭādi prakāśayanneva ātmānamapi prakāśayati,
SA11bsa054_u:7116: na cāpi kvacidvirodho dṛṣṭa iti sarvatra yojanīyam /
SA11bsa054_u:7117: tasmāt pradīpavadavirodha eveti cet, yadyevaṃ manyase, tadā naivaṃ vaktavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:7119: Bca_9.18 naiva prakāśyate dīpo yasmānna tamasāvṛtaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:7120: naiva prakāśyate ghaṭādivannaiva uddayotyate dīpaḥ, yasmānna tamasāvṛtaḥ na andhakārapihitaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7125: na ca avidyāmānasya prakāśanaṃ yuktam, asattvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:7128: syādetat- ātmabhāvamityādinā naitadabhidhīyate yadātmānaṃ ghaṭavat tamasāvṛtaṃ prakāśayati dīpaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7138: tathā tena prakāreṇa kiṃcid ghaṭādikaṃ parāpekṣaṃ pradīpādyapekṣaṃ prakāśaṃ dṛśyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7139: kiṃcit punaḥ pradīpādikamanapekṣaṃ ca svayaṃprakāśātmakaṃ dṛśyate upalabhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7141: evaṃ vijñānavādinā upadarśite viśeṣe siddhāntavādī nīlameva tāvannīlatve paranirapekṣaṃ dṛṣṭāntatvenopadarśitaṃ pratiṣedhayannāha anīlatva ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7147: kadā punaridamanapekṣaṃ syāt? yadi tadanīlameva svahetorutpadyeta /
SA11bsa054_u:7153: nīlaṃ nīlaguṇayuktamātmānaṃ svarūpamātmanā svayameva na kuryāt,
SA11bsa054_u:7156: tasmānna nīlasyāpi parānapekṣatā nīlatvaṃ prati sphaṭikavat /
SA11bsa054_u:7157: tathā hi [Bcp_190] sphaṭikopalo 'pi vastuto 'vasthitarūpa eva upādhisaṃnidhau na nīloparāgamanubhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:7159: nīlopādhiviśeṣahakāriṇaśca pūrvasvarasanirodhāt anya eva nīlaguṇoparaktaḥ sphaṭikopala utpadyate iti siddhāntaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7162: nanu priyamidamanuṣṭhitaṃ priyeṇa yasmāt jaḍasvabhāvavyāvṛttātmatayā svahetupratyayāt utpattireva jñānasya prakāśāntaranirapekṣasya ātmaprakāśatā svasaṃvedanamucyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7167: tanna kriyādibhedena dūṣaṇe 'pi kiṃciddūṣitamasmākaṃ syāt, svahetujanitasyātmaprakāśasyānupaghātāt /
SA11bsa054_u:7177: tadā lokata eva bādhā bhavato bhaviṣyati /
SA11bsa054_u:7180: tathā ca sutarāṃ na svasaṃvedanaṃ jñānasya, tattvato nijasvabhāvābhāvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:7182: na cāpi jaḍasvabhāvatā madhyamakavādinaṃ prati paramārthataḥ kasyacit siddhā,
SA11bsa054_u:7187: sāṃprataṃ pradīpasya svayaṃprakāśatāmabhyupagamya buddheḥ svasaṃvedanamayuktamiti pratipādayannāha dīpa ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7188: Bca_9.22 dīpaḥ prakāśata iti jñātvā jñānena kathyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7189: buddhiḥ prakāśata iti jñātvedaṃ kena kathyate //
SA11bsa054_u:7191: tathāpi na buddhisaṃvedanasādhanaṃ prati sadṛśo dṛṣṭānta iti samudāyārthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7192: dīpaḥ prakāśata iti ābhāsate prakāśāntaranirapekṣaḥ svayameva,
SA11bsa054_u:7193: iti jñātvā pratītya jñānena buddhyā kathyate pratipādyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7196: tat punaḥ kena jñānena jñātvā kathyate iti paraṃ pṛcchati /
SA11bsa054_u:7197: na cātra kiṃcid buddhipratipattinibandhanamastīti asaṃbhāvanāṃ prakāśayati /
SA11bsa054_u:7201: na ca anupakārakasya viṣayabhāvaḥ, nākāraṇaṃ viṣayaḥ iti vacanāt /
SA11bsa054_u:7204: itthaṃ sarvathā buddherapratipattau tatsaṃvedanamatīva ayuktamityāha prakāśā vetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7205: Bca_9.23 prakāśā vāprakāśā vā yadā dṛṣṭā na kenacit /
SA11bsa054_u:7210: buddhiḥ yadā dṛṣṭā na kenacit, na pratipannā kenacit pratipantrā svayaṃrūpeṇa vā /
SA11bsa054_u:7212: tadā vandhyāyā aprasavadharmiṇyāḥ striyā duhitā putrī, tasyā līlā vilāso lalitaṃ tadvat /
SA11bsa054_u:7220: tadapratīteḥ tasyā api apratītiriti kathyamānāpi yuktirahitena vacanamātreṇa sā svasaṃvittirmudhāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7222: syādevam- yuktiśūnyaṃ vacanamātrametat / yataḥ iyamatra yuktirastītyāha yadi nāstītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7224: yadi svasaṃvedanaṃ vijñānasya nāsti na vidyate, tadā vijñānaṃ smaryate katham?
SA11bsa054_u:7227: tasmādanubhavaphalasya smaraṇasya uttarakālaṃ darśanāt jñānasaṃvedanamastītyanumīyate iti /
SA11bsa054_u:7229: yato yadi svasaṃvedanakāryatayā smaraṇaṃ niścitaṃ bhavet,
SA11bsa054_u:7230: bhaved vahveryathā dhūmaḥ svasaṃvedanasya kāraṇaṃ smṛtiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7231: na ca asiddhe svasaṃvedane pramāṇataḥ, smaraṇasya tatkāryatāgrahaṇamasti /
SA11bsa054_u:7238: ataḥ smaraṇamapi jñānatvāt kathaṃ siddhamiti vaktavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:7240: na ca smaraṇaṃ svasaṃvedanasya pratyakṣatayā grāhakam, tasya tasmādanyatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:7241: na ca jñānasya jñānāntaraviṣayatvam, bahirarthavat saṃbandhāsiddhayādidoṣaprasaṅgāt /
SA11bsa054_u:7242: anyatvāviśeṣāt saṃtānāntarabhāvināpi smaraṇena tasya grahaṇaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:7243: atha tena pūrvamananubhūtatvānna smaryata iti cet,
SA11bsa054_u:7249: kālpanikatve ca sarvavyavahārāṇāṃ kalpanānirmitatvāt sāṃvṛtatvamiti sādhitaṃ naḥ sādhyam /
SA11bsa054_u:7251: bhavato 'pi kathaṃ tarhi svasaṃvedanābhāve smṛtirityāha anyānubhūta ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7253: jñānādanyasmin grāhye vastuni viṣaye 'nubhūte sati jñāne smṛtiḥ smaraṇamupajāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7254: nanu anyasminnanubhūte anyatra smaraṇe atiprasaṅgaḥ syādityāha- saṃbandhāditi /
SA11bsa054_u:7256: vijñānaṃ hi tadgāhakatayā tatsaṃbaddham, ato vijñānaṃ smaryate, nānyat /
SA11bsa054_u:7257: satyapi saṃbandhe anyasminnanubhūte anyasya smaraṇe viplutaṃ smaraṇaṃ syāditi cenna,
SA11bsa054_u:7260: jñānameva ca viṣayānubhavo nānya iti viṣayānubhavasmaraṇāttatsaṃbaddhatayā jñāne smaraṇamabhidhīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7261: na tu viṣayarahitaṃ jñānamapi kevalamanusmaryate ityadoṣaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:7263: ākhuviṣaṃ mūṣikaviṣaṃ yathā saṃbandhāt kālāntareṇa jāyate, tathā smṛtirapītyarthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7264_0: tathā hi mūṣikaviṣamekasmin kṣaṇe śarīrasaṃkrāntaṃ punaḥ kālāntareṇa meghastanitamadhigamya
SA11bsa054_u:7270: īkṣaṇikādividyā paracittādijñānābhijñā ca tābhyāṃ yuktasya tatsāmagrīsaṃbaddhasya cittasya darśanāt pratibhāsanāt vijñānasya khaṃ prakāśate svarūpaṃ pratibhāsate /
SA11bsa054_u:7272: yadi hi tat sarvadā parokṣarūpaṃ kathaṃ kadācit sāmagrīviśeṣādupalabhyeta,
SA11bsa054_u:7281: tasmād dṛṣṭaḥ pratītaḥ ghaṭo nidhānādi vā naiva añjanaṃ bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:7284: evamīkṣaṇikādividyāsahakāriṇā jñānena paracittaṃ ca ghaṭādivad dṛṣṭamiti naitāvatā tatsaṃvedanaṃ siddhaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:7286: nanu yadi jñānamaviditasvarūpaṃ syāt, arthasyāpi pratītirna syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:7287: avyaktavyaktikatvād jñānasya, na hi arthasya vyaktiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7291: tadgahaṇābhyupagame ca uttarottarasya apratītasya pratītaye jñānāntarānusaraṇena anavasthāprasaṅgācca na kathaṃcidapi arthasya pratītiriti /
SA11bsa054_u:7293: sarvaścāyaṃ dṛṣṭādivyavahāro loke na syādityāha yathā dṛṣṭamityādi /
SA11bsa054_u:7294: yaducyate dṛṣṭādivyavahāro na syāditi, sa kiṃ paramārthato na syāt, saṃvṛtyā vā?
SA11bsa054_u:7295: tatra yadi paramārthato na syādityucyate, tadā priyamidamasmākam /
SA11bsa054_u:7298: yathā dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ jñātaṃ naiveha pratiṣidhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7303: tadetadiha sarvaṃ vyavahāramāśritya naiva pratiṣidhyate, naiva vāryate /
SA11bsa054_u:7307: tena jñānasaṃvedanābhāvādarthānadhigamādayo 'pi doṣāḥ paramārthapakṣavādina iha nāvataranti /
SA11bsa054_u:7308: yadi tat tathaivābhyupagamyate, kiṃ nāma tarhi pratiṣidhyate ityāha satyata ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7320: duḥkhaṃ samudayo loko dṛṣṭisthānaṃ bhavaśca te /
SA11bsa054_u:7325: na tu vāstavaṃ kiṃcit pratiṣidhyate iti /
SA11bsa054_u:7326: tadevaṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ jñānasya na kathaṃcidacidapi yujyate / taduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:7329: yatra boddhā ca bodhyaṃ ca tatra bodhirna vidyate //
SA11bsa054_u:7333: idānīṃ prāsaṅgikaṃ parisamāpya prakṛte yojayannāha cittādanyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7334: Bca_9.27 cittādanyā na māyā cennāpyananyeti kalpyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7335: vastu cetsā kathaṃ nānyānanyā cennāsti vastutaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:7343: dvitīyapakṣe tu "yadā māyaiva te nāsti" [9.6] ityādinā pratipādita eva doṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7345: atha caturthī kalpanā, sāpi na saṃgacchate /
SA11bsa054_u:7351: anyonyaparihāravatorekapratiṣedhasya aparavidhināntarīyakatvāt tayorekatrābhāvāt caturthī kalpanā sāpi na saṃghaṭate //
SA11bsa054_u:7354: yadi sā māyā vastusatī kathaṃ nānyā cittādvayatiriktā na bhavati?
SA11bsa054_u:7359: tasyāstatsvabhāvatvāt cittameva kevalam ityetat tadevāyātam / yaduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:7360: yadā māyaiva te nāsti tadā kimupalabhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7363: asatyapi yathā māyā dṛśyā draṣṭṛ tathā manaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7365: tādṛśyapi dṛśyā darśanaviṣayā yathā māyā, draṣṭu tathā manaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7368: tena "yadā na bhrāntirapyasti" [9.15] ityādi yaduktaṃ pareṇa tat prasādhya upasaṃhāreṇa darśitam /
SA11bsa054_u:7369: punarapi prakārāntareṇa paramārthasadvijñānasādhanāya paropakramamabhisaṃdhāya āha vastvāśrayaścetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7371: tathāhi- saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ ca heyopādeyatayā dvayamidaṃ yathāvat pratipattavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:7376: tadevaṃ [Bcp_195] saṃkleśavyavadānayorvastusamudbhūtacittamantareṇa vyavasthāpanaṃ na ghaṭate iti manyante,
SA11bsa054_u:7378: cittameva saṃkliśyate, cittameva vyavadāyate iti vacanāt /
SA11bsa054_u:7379: tadeva paramataṃ nirūpayati-vastveva vastusadbhūtacittameva āśrayaḥ asyeti vastvāśrayaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7386: ya eṣa cittāśrayaḥ saṃsāro 'bhidhīyate, sa kiṃ vastu avastu vā?
SA11bsa054_u:7388: tatra yadi vastu cittameva, tadā na cittādanyaḥ saṃsārastadāśryaḥ, cittameva saḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7390: atha cittādanyaḥ, tadā cittavyatiriktasya anyasyābhyupagamāt siddhāntakṣatiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7391: atha avastu, tadā saṃsāro nāma na kiṃcidasti, kharaviṣāṇavat /
SA11bsa054_u:7393: yathā ākāśaṃ prajñaptisanmātramasat, na kvacidarthakriyāyāṃ samartham, tathā saṃsāro bhavataḥ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:7397: tathāpi vastusadbhūtacittasamāśritatvāt tasya arthakriyāsāmarthyaṃ bhaviṣyatītyāha vastvāśrayeṇetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7399: na asadrūpasya kaścidāśrayo bhavitumarhati, āśrayāśrayibhāvasya kāryakāraṇarūpatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:7400: na ca abhāvaḥ kasyacit kāryam, anirvartyaviśeṣatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:7402: tathāpi vastvāśrayeṇa vastusadbhūtacittasamāśrayeṇa abhāvasya asadātmakasya kriyāvattvam,
SA11bsa054_u:7417: tat kathaṃ cittamevaikaṃ vastu? astu nāma, tathāpi na bādhakānmuktirityāha grāhyamuktamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7418: grāhyamuktaṃ yadā cittaṃ tadā sarve tathāgatāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7422: grāhakābhāve ca tadupakalpitasya abhilāpyasyābhāvāt abhilāpasyābhāva ityupadarśayituṃ grāhyamuktamityuktam /
SA11bsa054_u:7424: tadā tasya cittasya sarvasattvasaṃtānāntargatatvāt sarvasaṃsāriṇaḥ sattvāḥ [Bcp_196] tathāgatā buddhā bhagavantaḥ prāpnuvanti /
SA11bsa054_u:7428: tasmāt satyapi grāhyagrāhakavaidhurye bhāvābhiniveśasya tadavasthatvānna sarvathā saṃkleśaprahāṇamityabhisaṃdhāyāha evaṃ cetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7429: Bca_9.30 evaṃ ca ko guṇo labdhaścittamātre 'pi kalpite //
SA11bsa054_u:7432: evamapi svīkṛte ko guṇo labdhaḥ? naiva kaścit /
SA11bsa054_u:7435: nanu etatsamānaṃ niḥsvabhāvavādino bhavato 'pīti samānadūṣaṇatāmāpādayannāha māyopamatve 'pītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7437: māyopamatve māyāsvabhāvatve 'pi jagato jñāte kathaṃ kleśo nivartate,
SA11bsa054_u:7439: kimatra prahāṇānupapattikāraṇaṃ yat pṛcchasītyāha yadā māyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7441: idamatra prahāṇānupapattibījaṃ dṛśyate- yadā māyāstriyāṃ māyākāravinirmitāyāmabalāyāṃ rāgaḥ saṃraktacittatā jāyate utpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7445: kiṃ tu tasyā māyāstriyāḥ kartuḥ nirmāturapi jāyate iti apiśabdārthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7447: tadā na tāvat tadanye tāmabhisamīkṣya manmathaśaraprahārāntaravyathitacetaso jāyante,
SA11bsa054_u:7448: api tu yo 'pi sa tasyāḥ kamanīyakāntisaṃpadaḥ kāmakalākauśalotkaṇṭhitamūrterabhinirmātā,
SA11bsa054_u:7450: so 'pi kāmakalayā paramadaśāmāsādayan na kathaṃcidapi cetaḥ saṃdhārayitumalam,
SA11bsa054_u:7451: tat kathaṃ māyopamatve 'pi niścite saṃsārasaṃtaticchedaḥ syāt?
SA11bsa054_u:7459: kimaprahīṇā? jñeyasaṃkleśavāsanā jñeyasaṃkleśaḥ sasvabhāvatāsamāropādāsaṅgādiḥ, vastutāsamāropo vā /
SA11bsa054_u:7464: tasyāpi advayatattvasya sattve 'pi āgantukasaṃkleśavāsanāyā aprahīṇatvāt na sarve tathāgatā bhavanti /
SA11bsa054_u:7466: yasmādabhāvātmāno malāḥ kāryakalāvikalā nāvaraṇaṃ bhavitumarhanti, ityuktameva /
SA11bsa054_u:7467: asmākaṃ tu niḥsvabhāvameva janyaṃ janakaṃ ceti na samānam /
SA11bsa054_u:7469: taddṛṣṭikāle, tasyā jñeyasasvabhāvatāyā dṛṣṭiḥ upalabdhiḥ, tasyāḥ kāle /
SA11bsa054_u:7472: durbalā śūnyavāsaneti śūnyasya śūnyatattvasya śūnyatāyā veti vigrahaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7473: chandonurodhād bhāvapratyayasya lopaṃ kṛtvā śūnyeti nirdeśaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7474: vāsanā saṃskārādhānam, sa durbalā sāmarthyavikalā, āropitasya darśanāt /
SA11bsa054_u:7476: kathaṃ tarhi sā nivartate ityāha śūnyatetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7478: śūnyatāyā māyāsvabhāvaniḥsvabhāvatāyā vāsanā tasya ādhānam āvedhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7485: nanu bhāvābhiniveśo vā śūnyatābhiniveśo vā iti nābhiniveśaṃ prati kaścidviśeṣaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7495: ityevaṃ cābhyāsāt bhāvavāsanāprahāṇasya paścāt sāpi śūnyavāsanāpi prahīyate nivartate /
SA11bsa054_u:7496: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- śūnyatāvedho hi bhāvābhiniveśasya pratipakṣatvāt prahāṇopāyabhūtaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7497: adhigate ca upeye paścāt kolopamatvāt upāyasyāpi prahāṇamanuṣṭhīyate / etadevāha-
SA11bsa054_u:7501: syādetat- yadi nāma kiṃcinnāstīti manasikārābhyāsād bhavati śūnyatāvāsanāyāḥ prahāṇam,
SA11bsa054_u:7503: tataśca gaṇḍapraveśe 'kṣitārānirgamo jāta iti tadavasthaṃ tava dauṣṭhayam,
SA11bsa054_u:7505: Bca_9.34 yadā na labhyate bhāvo yo nāstīti prakalpyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7510: sa yadi vicāryamāṇo niḥsvabhāvatayā na labhyate na prāpyate taimirikopalabdhakeśastabakavat /
SA11bsa054_u:7513: tasya saṃbandhino 'bhāvāt nirālambaḥ abhāvaḥ kalpanāvidarśitamūrtiḥ kathaṃ tiṣṭhenmateḥ puraḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7516: athavā anyathāvatāryate- bhavatu nāma śūnyatābalādhānād bhāvavāsanāvinivṛttiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7517: tatpratiṣedhābhāvādabhāvābhiniveśastu kena vāryate ityata āha- yadā na labhyate ityādi /
SA11bsa054_u:7519: ayamatra samudāyārthaḥ- sarvadharmaśūnyatā hi bhāvābhiniveśaprahāṇāya upādīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7521: yāpi ca kathaṃcid bhāvakalpanā jāyate, sāpi samanantaravicāreṇa nivartate /
SA11bsa054_u:7522: ata eva etatsamastakalpanājālavinivartanāya bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa adhyātmaśūnyatādayo 'ṣṭādaśa śūnyatāḥ proktāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7523: na ca śūnyatā bhāvād vyatiriktā, bhāvasyaiva tatsvabhāvatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:7524: anyathā śūnyatāyā bhāvād vyatireke dharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatā na syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:7527: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārairevaṃ pratyavekṣate- na rūpaśūnyatayā rūpaṃ śūnyam,
SA11bsa054_u:7529: na vedanāśūnyatayā vedanā śūnyā, vedanaiva śūnyā, śūnyataiva vedanā /
SA11bsa054_u:7530: na saṃjñāśūnyatayā saṃjñā śūnyā, saṃjñaiva śūnyā, śūnyataiva saṃjñā /
SA11bsa054_u:7531: na saṃskāraśūnyatayā saṃskārāḥ śūnyāḥ, saṃskārā eva śūnyāḥ, śūnyataiva saṃskārāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7532: na vijñānaśūnyatayā vijñānaṃ śūnyam, vijñānameva śūnyam, śūnyataiva vijñānam //
SA11bsa054_u:7534: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā /
SA11bsa054_u:7537: iti na śūnyatā dharmād vyatiriktā / tasmācchūnyatāyāmapi nābhiniveśaḥ kartavyaḥ iti //
SA11bsa054_u:7538: evaṃ sarvavikalpapratyastamayāt samastāvaraṇanirmuktirupajāyate ityupadarśayannāha yadā na bhāva ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7539: Bca_9.35 yadā na bhāvo nābhāvo mateḥ saṃtiṣṭhate puraḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7541: yadā na bhāvaḥ paramārthasatsvabhāvo materbuddheḥ saṃtiṣṭhate puro 'grataḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7543: nāpi bhāvavirahitalakṣaṇo 'bhāvaḥ yadā mateḥ saṃtiṣṭhate puraḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7546: ābhyāmavyatiriktatayā anayoḥ saṃgrahe tāvapi saṃgṛhītāviti nirāśrayā,
SA11bsa054_u:7549: kathaṃ tarhi sakalakalpanāvirahādanekakalpāsaṃkhyeyābhilaṣitaṃ parārthasaṃpadupāyabhūtaṃ buddhatvamadhigamya parārthamabhisaṃpādayati bhagavānityatrāha cintāmaṇiriti-
SA11bsa054_u:7554: sa yathā vikalpamantareṇāpi lokānāṃ yathābhavyamicchāyāḥ paripūraṇaḥ abhilāṣasya saṃpādakaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7557: jinasya buddhasya bhagavataḥ bimbaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇairvirājitaṃ śarīram /
SA11bsa054_u:7558: tathā tena prakāreṇa īkṣyate sarvakalpanābhāve 'pi parahitasukhasaṃpādanasamarthaṃ pratīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7563: yatpūrvaṃ bodhisattvāvasthāyāmanekaprakāraṃ bhagavatā sattvārthasaṃpādanaṃ praṇihitaṃ tasyākṣepavaśāt,
SA11bsa054_u:7565: yasyāṃ rātrau tathāgato 'bhisaṃbuddho yasyāṃ ca parinirvṛtaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7567: tat kasya hetoḥ? nityaṃ samāhito bhagavān /
SA11bsa054_u:7581_0: evamasādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇamākhyāya punaranyathā hetvavasthāyā eva sa tādṛśaḥ prabhāvāti-
SA11bsa054_u:7582: Bca_9.37 yathā gāruḍikaḥ stambhaṃ sādhayitvā vinaśyati /
SA11bsa054_u:7584: yathā gāruḍiko viṣatatvavit labdhamantrasāmarthyaḥ stambhaṃ kāṣṭhamayaṃ vā anyadvā sādhayitvā mantreṇābhisaṃskṛtya mamābhāvādayameva sarvaviṣāpahāracaturo bhaviṣyatīti vinaśyati,
SA11bsa054_u:7586: sa stambhaḥ tenābhimantritaḥ tasmin gāruḍike ciranaṣṭe 'pi prabhūtakālamuparate 'pi viṣādīnupaśāmayet,
SA11bsa054_u:7588: chāndasasamayaṃ paripālayatā mito 'pi upadhāyā ṇici hrasvo na kṛtaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7600: dharmato buddhā draṣṭavyā dharmakāyā hi nāyakāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7601: dharmatā cāpyavijñeyā na sā śakyā vijānitum //
SA11bsa054_u:7612: iti ubhayathāpi sarvathā kalpanāvirahe 'pi sattvārthasaṃpādanamavikalamupadarśitaṃ bhavati //
SA11bsa054_u:7615: kathaṃ tarhi tathāgatapūjā mahāphalā varṇyate ityāśaṅkayannāha acittake ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7616: acittake kṛtā pūjā kathaṃ phalavatī bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:7617: saṃvṛticittavivikte bhagavati kṛtā upahṛtā pūjā kārāviśeṣaḥ kathaṃ phalavatī bhavet, saphalā syāt?
SA11bsa054_u:7618: tatra asatyupabhoktari dāyakadānapatīnāṃ kathaṃ puṇyaṃ bhavet?
SA11bsa054_u:7620: Bca_9.39 tulyaiva paṭhyate yasmāttiṣṭhato nirvṛtasya ca //
SA11bsa054_u:7623: yasmāt tiṣṭhato nirvṛtasya ca tasmāt phalavatī bhavediti yojanīyam /
SA11bsa054_u:7625: nirvṛtasya nirupadhinirvāṇaṃ gatasya pūjāyā nāsti viśeṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7626: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- dvividhaṃ hi puṇyam- tyāgānvayaṃ ca, tyāgādeva yadutpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7628: tatra yadi nāma nirvṛte bhagavati pratigrahīturabhāvāt paribhogānvayaṃ na bhaviṣyati puṇyam,
SA11bsa054_u:7631: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sati pratigrahītari bhavitavyaṃ puṇyena, nāsati?
SA11bsa054_u:7633: yadi hi puṇyaṃ parānugrahādeva syāt, maitryādyapramāṇasamyagdṛṣṭibhāvanāyāṃ na syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:7635: tathā vyatīte 'pi guṇavati tadbhaktikṛtaṃ svacittādbhavat puṇyaṃ na virudhyate iti //
SA11bsa054_u:7636: api ca sarvapuṇyapāpasadbhāve sarveṣāmāgamaḥ sākṣītyāha āgamāccetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7637: āgamācca phalaṃ tatra saṃvṛtyā tattvato 'pi vā /
SA11bsa054_u:7641: etāvāṃstu viśeṣaḥ- kasyacit tat phalaṃ sāṃvṛtam, kasyacit punaḥ pāramārthikamabhimatam /
SA11bsa054_u:7643: saṃvṛtyā tattvato 'pi vā puṇyapāpakriyāyāḥ phalaṃ bhagavadāgamāt pratīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7644: tatra ca āvayoravivāda eva tatra idamuktaṃ bhagavatā puṣpakūṭadhāraṇyām-
SA11bsa054_u:7645: ye kecit siṃhavikrīḍita tathāgatasya pūjāṃ kariṣyanti tiṣṭhato vā parinirvṛtasya vā,
SA11bsa054_u:7647: yaśca khalu siṃhavikrīḍita tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā cittaṃ prasādayet,
SA11bsa054_u:7648: prasannacittaḥ satkuryāt gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet upacaret,
SA11bsa054_u:7650: yaśca parinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya sarṣapaphalamātradhātau śarīrapūjāṃ kuryāt,
SA11bsa054_u:7652: tathā pūjāyai nāsti viśeṣo nānākaraṇaṃ ca / iti //
SA11bsa054_u:7659: yaśca khalu punaḥ siṃhavikrīḍita tathāgataṃ varṣaśataṃ vā varṣasahasraṃ vā sarvasukhopadhānenopatiṣṭhet,
SA11bsa054_u:7667: ekakramapadavyatihāraṃ vā atikramya vācaṃ bhāṣeta- namastamai buddhāya bhagavate iti,
SA11bsa054_u:7668: mā te atra siṃhavikrīḍita kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā,
SA11bsa054_u:7669: yadasau kalpaṃ vā kalpaśataṃ vā kalpasahasraṃ vā durgativinipātaṃ gacchet,
SA11bsa054_u:7672: satyabuddhe kṛtā pūjā saphaleti kathaṃ yathā //
SA11bsa054_u:7673: satyabuddhe paramārthasati bhagavati kṛtā pūjā saphaleti phalavatī, ityetadapi kathaṃ yatheti /
SA11bsa054_u:7678: tatra vaibhāṣikādayaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāḥ sarvāvaraṇaprahāṇamasahamānāḥ caturāryasatyadarśanabhāvanāṃ ca tadupāyamicchantaḥ prāhuḥ satyadarśanata ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7686_0: tatra vṛttasthasya śrutacintāvato bhāvanāyāṃ pravṛttasya aśubhānāpānasmṛtismṛtyupasthānabhāvanā
SA11bsa054_u:7686_1: niṣpattikrameṇa anityato duḥkhata śūnyato 'nātmataśca ityetaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhirākāraiḥ
SA11bsa054_u:7697: Bca_9.41 na vinānena mārgeṇa bodhirityāgamo yataḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:7700: tathā hi- sarva eva hi bhāvā āropitamanāropitaṃ ceti rūpadvayamudvahanti /
SA11bsa054_u:7705: tacca prajñayā vivecyamānaṃ sarvadharmānupalambhalakṣaṇamavasitamiti sarvadharmaśūnyataiva sarvāvaraṇavibhramaprahāṇāya paṭīyasītyavagamyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7706: iti yuktito nirūpitaṃ prāk, nirupayiṣyate ca paścāt /
SA11bsa054_u:7710: bhagavānāha- iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ bhāva iti na bhāvayati /
SA11bsa054_u:7714: yāvat mārgākārajñatāṃ bhāva iti na bhāvayati /
SA11bsa054_u:7715: yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ bhāva iti na bhāvayati /

SA11bsa054_u:8175_0: santi asmin kāye keśā romāṇi nakhā dantā rajo malaṃ tvakū māṃsāsthi snāyu śirā bukkā
SA11bsa054_u:8175_1: hṛdayaṃ plīhakaḥ klomakaḥ antrāṇi antraguṇāḥ āmāśayaḥ pakkāśayaḥ audarīyakaṃ yakṛt
SA11bsa054_u:8175_2: purīṣam aśru svedaḥ kheṭaḥ siṃghāṇakaṃ vasā lasikā majjā medaḥ pittaṃ śliṣmapūyaśoṇitaṃ
SA11bsa054_u:8176: eṣu ca vastuṣu bodhisattvaḥ upaparīkṣaṇajātīyo bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:8180: syādetat- yadi nāma keśādayo 'haṃpratyayavedyā na bhavanti, tathāpi nāyaṃ nirviṣayaḥ sidhyati /
SA11bsa054_u:8181: yataḥ antarvyāpārapuruṣagocara eva ahaṃpratyayo 'smābhiriṣyate iti naiyāyikādayaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8183: yasmāt- ahaṃ gauraḥ kṛśo dīrgho gacchāmītyādyākāraparāmarśātmaka eva ayamahaṃpratyayaḥ pratibhāsate /
SA11bsa054_u:8185: na ca anyākāreṇa jñānena anyasya grahaṇaṃ yuktam, atiprasaṅgāt /
SA11bsa054_u:8186: tathā hi tadvān, idamidaṃ tasya lakṣaṇamupavarṇayanti pare /
SA11bsa054_u:8187_0: tatra naiyāyikāstāvat nityaṃ sarvagataṃ pratiprāṇibhinnamacetanaṃ cetanāyogāttu cetanaṃ
SA11bsa054_u:8187_1: sukhādiguṇādhāraṃ śubhāśubhakarmakartāraṃ tatphalopabhoktāraṃ paralokinaṃ ca ātmānamicchanti /
SA11bsa054_u:8197: na ca tasya pravṛttinivṛttī bhavataḥ, tasyobhayatrānugatarūpatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:8198: tadyathā- sarpasya kuṇḍalāvasthānivṛttau ṛjutvāvasthāpravṛttau ca sarpatvasyobhayatrāpyavṛttiḥ / yathoktam-
SA11bsa054_u:8207: jaināstu jaiminīyavaccetanamātmānamicchanti dravyaparyāyarūpeṇa yathāyogamanugamavyāvṛttyātmakam / tathā coktam-
SA11bsa054_u:8211: kāpilāstu nityaṃ vyāpakaṃ nirguṇaṃ svayameva caitanyātmakamātmānamicchanti, na tu buddhisaṃbandhāt /
SA11bsa054_u:8214: nāpi sa kasyacit kāryasya kartā, svayaṃ tatphalopabhoktā vā, niṣkriyatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:8220: śabdādiṣu śrotrādivṛttibhirmanasādhiṣṭhitābhiḥ parigṛhīteṣu viṣayeṣu buddhiradhyavasāyaṃ karoti /
SA11bsa054_u:8222: evaṃ caitanyasvarūpatvānnirguṇatvam, vyāpitvānniṣkriyatvamiti sāṃkhyapuruṣasya viśeṣaḥ / uktaṃ ca-
SA11bsa054_u:8224: ātmanaśca nijaṃ rūpaṃ caitanyaṃ kalpayanti te //
SA11bsa054_u:8226: pradhānenopanītaṃ ca phalaṃ bhuṅkte sa kevalam /
SA11bsa054_u:8232: upaniṣadvādinastu samastaprāṇisaṃtānāntargatamekameva vyāpi nityaṃ ca jñānamicchanti /
SA11bsa054_u:8235: na bāhyaṃ kimapyavayavi paramāṇvādikaṃ grāhyaṃ pramāṇaprasiddhamasti / āha ca-
SA11bsa054_u:8247: tatkathamātmā ahaṃpratyayatayā pratibhāsate ityucyate? tasmād vikalpamātrametat /
SA11bsa054_u:8249: saṃprati citsvabhāvātmavādinaḥ sāṃkhyādayaḥ ṣaḍvijñānānāmātmaniṣedhamasahiṣṇavaḥ prāhuḥ- śabdādijñānaṃ cidātmakamātmaivāsmābhirabhidhīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:8250: tatkathamasyātmatāpratiṣedha ucyate? iti parābhiprāyamākalayya siddhāntavādī prasaṅgamāsañjayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:8251: śabdajñānaṃ yadi tadā śabdo gṛhyeta sarvadā /
SA11bsa054_u:8253: tasya ca nityatvāt śabdajñānaṃ nityaṃ syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:8254: tadā śabdo 'pi sadā nityameva tadbhāvābhāvakālayorgrahītavyaḥ syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:8259: jñeyaṃ vinā tu kiṃ vetti yena jñānaṃ nirucyate //
SA11bsa054_u:8260: jñānameva nityamupasthitam, śabdasya tu kādācitkatvāt na sarvadā sattābhivyaktiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8261: tataśca tadasattākāle jñeyaṃ vinā viṣayamantareṇa kiuṃ vetti kiṃ jānāti tad jñānam?
SA11bsa054_u:8263: yena jñeyena śūnyamapi jñānaṃ nirucyate abhidhīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:8264: jñeyaṃ jānātīti jñānamākhyāyate, tadabhāvāt kathaṃ jñānamityāśayaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:8266: ajānānaṃ yadi jñānaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ jñānaṃ prasajyate /
SA11bsa054_u:8267: yadapi viṣayaṃ na jānāti, tadapi yadi jñānamucyate, tadā kāṣṭhamajñānasvabhāvaṃ jñānaṃ prasajyate /
SA11bsa054_u:8268: na hi tena kiṃcidaparāddhaṃ yena na vijñānaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:8270: tasmādviṣayaparijñānābhāvāt yathā kāṣṭhaṃ jñānaṃ na bhavati, tathā anyadapi na syādityāha-
SA11bsa054_u:8273: tena kāraṇena asaṃnihitajñeyaṃ asaṃnihitamayogyadeśasthaṃ jñeyaṃ grāhyo viṣayo yasya tattathoktaṃ jñānaṃ nāsti na vidyate iti niścayaḥ ekānta eṣaḥ / sāpekṣatvāt //
SA11bsa054_u:8277: yato yadasya jñānasya paricchedyaṃ rūpaṃ vyaktamityucyate,
SA11bsa054_u:8279: śabdasya tu sadā sattvamasattvaṃ vā na vivakṣitam /
SA11bsa054_u:8283: tasya na sarvadā saṃnidhānamastīti kṛtvā iti kathaṃ noktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:8284: śabdasya yathā sarvadā sattvaṃ nāsti, tadvistarabhayānnocyate //
SA11bsa054_u:8286: yadi śabdajñānamevātmā, tadā tadgrahaṇātmakatvāttasya rūpagrahaṇaṃ na syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:8288: yataḥ tadeva rūpagrāhakamiṣyate iti cedatrāha tadevetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8289: tadeva rūpaṃ jānāti tadā kiṃ na śṛṇotyapi /
SA11bsa054_u:8290: tadeva śabdajñānameva yadi rūpaṃ jānātīti matam,
SA11bsa054_u:8295: kevalamasaṃnidhānāt na doṣa iti parasyottaramāśaṅkayāha śabdasyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8297: śabdasya viṣayatāmāpannasya asaṃnidhānādayogyadeśāt grahaṇaṃ na syāt- yadi,
SA11bsa054_u:8300: tat tasmāt tarhi śabdasyāsaṃnidhānāt tat jñānamapi śabdajñānam asadavidyamānam /
SA11bsa054_u:8303: kiṃ ca / yadi śabdajñānaṃ tadā rūpagrahaṇādyātmakaṃ tanna yujyate ityāha śabdagrahaṇetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8307: yat jñānaṃ tad rūpagrahaṇaṃ rūpagrahaṇātmakaṃ katham? na kathaṃcidapi syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:8309: nanu yathā kaścideka eva kasyacidapekṣayā pitā,
SA11bsa054_u:8310: kasyacidapekṣayā ca sa eva putraḥ syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:8311: tathā prakṛte 'pi rūpadvayamekasya bhaviṣyatītyāha ekaḥ pitetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8312: Bca_9.64 ekaḥ pitā ca putraśca kalpyate na tu tattvataḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:8313: ekaḥ pitā eva janakaḥ putraśca janyaḥ sa eveti kalpyate,
SA11bsa054_u:8315: na tu tattvataḥ, na punaḥ paramārthataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8316: eka eva svabhāvaḥ ubhayātmakaḥ kalpanāsamāropitavyapadeśāt [rūpabhedena] punareka eva tathā nānābhidhānena naivābhidhīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:8320: tasmāt yathā vāstavamekasya dvirūpatvaṃ tanna dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇyasti,
SA11bsa054_u:8323: ito 'pi na pāramārthiko 'yaṃ vyapadeśa ityāha sattvaṃ raja iti-
SA11bsa054_u:8324: sattvaṃ rajastamo vāpi na putro na pitā yataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8325: etacca avaśyaṃ tvayāpi svīkartavyam- sāṃkhyamate hi triguṇamekaṃ jagat,
SA11bsa054_u:8326: tataḥ sattvaṃ rajastamo vāpīti samudāyaḥ samuccayārthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8327: yato yasmādete guṇāḥ svasvabhāvāvasthitāḥ pratyekaṃ samuditā vā /
SA11bsa054_u:8331: te eva prāptajanakabhāvā api tena pūrvāparakālayoraviśiṣṭasvabhāvā eva /
SA11bsa054_u:8332: te tatastadapekṣya pitā putraścābhidhīyante, na tu tatra kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8340: svabhāvastasya rūpagrāhakasya jñānasya nekṣyate na pratīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:8342: syādetat- yadi nāma na pratīyate, tathāpi tadeva tat / kathaṃ tarhi rūpagrahaṇamityāha tadevetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8345: anyena rūpeṇa svabhāvena rūpagrahaṇātmakena rūpaṃ gṛhṇātīti śeṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8347: yathā nāṭyasamaye raṅgabhūmigato naṭaḥ eka eva [Bcp_218] nānārūpeṇāvatarati,
SA11bsa054_u:8349: atrāha- so 'pyaśāśvataḥ iti anityaḥ pūrvasvabhāvaparityāgena rūpāntaramāviśati /
SA11bsa054_u:8350: na ca pūrvāparakālayorekasvabhāva eva naṭo nānārūpasaṃbandhāt,
SA11bsa054_u:8354: svabhāvaḥ punarasya aparāpara utpadyate nirudhyate ca /
SA11bsa054_u:8359: ced yadi ucyate, tadā apūrveyaṃ tadekatā, apūrveyamadṛṣṭapūrveyamīdṛśī tadekatā /
SA11bsa054_u:8361: tathā hi- sa eveti tattvamākhyāyate, punaranyasvabhāva iti tasyaiva anyatvam /
SA11bsa054_u:8363: na hi bhāvo nāma anya eva svabhāvāt, yena tasyotpādanirodhayorapi bhāvasya tau na syātām /
SA11bsa054_u:8364: nāpi tadabhinnasya svabhāvasya utpādanirodhayorbhāvasya tādavasthyaṃ yuktamabhedābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
SA11bsa054_u:8366: syādetat- bhavatveva eṣa prasaṅgaḥ yadi rūpadvayamasyātmanaḥ satyaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:8367: kiṃ tarhi nijamasya rūpamapahāya aparaṃ rūpamatāttvikam,
SA11bsa054_u:8373: tarhi nijaṃ tadrūpamucyatām nijaṃ svābhāvikaṃ tasyātmano rūpaṃ tattvamucyatām /
SA11bsa054_u:8388: yadi vā avāntaraṃ bhedanibandhanaṃ viśeṣamapāsya kiṃcidākārakamāśritya ekatvamucyate tadā cetanā puruṣadharmaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:8392: katham? tayoścetanācetanayoḥ yena kāraṇena astitā samā /
SA11bsa054_u:8398: Bca_9.68 viśeṣaśca yadā mithyā kaḥ sādṛśyāśrayastadā //
SA11bsa054_u:8400: viśeṣo bhedaḥ sarvabhāvānāmaniyamena yadā mithyā asatyam [tyaḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:8401: ], nijameva rūpaṃ satyam, tadā kaḥ sādṛśyāśrayaḥ syāt?
SA11bsa054_u:8404: viśeṣābhāve ca tadeva tat syānna sadṛśam /
SA11bsa054_u:8405: na hi gogavayayorgoviśeṣamananubhavan na gavayo gosadṛśo bhavet, api tu gaureva syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:8407: sa ca yadā pāramārthiko na bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:8408: tadā kaḥ sādṛśyasya samānākāratāyāḥ puṃsāmanyasya vā āśrayo nibandhanaṃ vā bhavet?
SA11bsa054_u:8410: ato vastuta eva ekatvamāpatitaṃ bhavataḥ, na sādṛśyakṛtam /
SA11bsa054_u:8425: yathā paṭavṛkṣaparvatādayaḥ caitanyavirahādātmā na bhavanti, tathā abhimato 'pi /
SA11bsa054_u:8428: na ca acetanasya tadyuktam, yathā paṭādeḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8431: tenāyamadoṣaḥ iti parābhiprāyaṃ saṃbhāvayannāha atha jña ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8434: athāyamātmā cetanāyogād buddhisamavāyāt svayamacetano 'pi jño bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:8437: yadā tarhi madamūrcchāvasthāyāṃ cetanānivṛttau ayamātmā ajño na kiṃcidapi jānāti,
SA11bsa054_u:8445: acetanasya sarvakālamavikṛtasya sataḥ asyātmanaḥ caitanyena buddhisamavāyena kiṃ kṛtam,
SA11bsa054_u:8450: ajñasya kiṃcidapi hitāhitaṃ jñātumaśaktasya niṣkriyasya nirgato bahirbhūtaḥ kriyāyā iti niṣkriyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8452: athavā sarvakarmaṇi śaktivikalasya gamanādhikriyāśūnyasya vā ākāśasya prakṛtānupayogitvādākāśakalpasya /
SA11bsa054_u:8455: yathā niḥsvabhāvatayā sarvakriyāśūnyaṃ prajñaptisanmātramākāśam, tathā ātmāpītyarthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8457: yathā ca na karmakartrādirūpamākāśamacetanatvādakriyatvācca, tathā ātmapīti bhāvaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:8458: idānīṃ punaranyathā ātmapratiṣedhabādhakaṃ paramatenotthāpayannāha na karmetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8461: tadā tenātmanā paralokagāminā vinā antareṇa karmaphalasaṃbandho 'yuktaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8462: karma śubhāśubham, phalaṃ ca tasyaiva iṣṭāniṣṭalakṣaṇam, tayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8464: yenaiva kṛtaṃ karma, tasyaiva tatphalapratilambho nānyasyeti /
SA11bsa054_u:8467: tatra ca saugatānāmapyavivādaḥ / tathā ca sūtram-
SA11bsa054_u:8469: na hi bhikṣavaḥ kṛtopacitāni karmāṇi pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante nābdhātau na tejodhātau na vāyudhātau /
SA11bsa054_u:8473: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
SA11bsa054_u:8479: kathamasati ātmani karmaphalasaṃbandho ghaṭate ityāha karma kṛtvetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8480: Bca_9.71 karma kṛtvā vinaṣṭe hi phalaṃ kasya bhaviṣyati //
SA11bsa054_u:8481: hi yasmāt karma kṛtvā karmotpādya śubhāśubhalakṣaṇam /
SA11bsa054_u:8487: kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ sugatau durgatau vā sukhaduḥkhātmakaṃ kasya bhaviṣyati utpatsyate?
SA11bsa054_u:8489: paraloke ca kṛtakarmaṇa eva phalayogino 'nyasya kasyacidutpādāt,
SA11bsa054_u:8498: ke siddhe? āhabhinnādhāre kriyāphale karma kriyā asmin bhave, tasyāḥ phalaṃ paraloke /
SA11bsa054_u:8500: tathāhi- na yenaiva śarīreṇa tasmin janmani karma karoti, tenaiva pretya phalamupabhuṅkte /
SA11bsa054_u:8504: syādetat- ātmavyāpāramantareṇa te eva kartṛtvopabhoktṛtve na syātāmityatrāha-
SA11bsa054_u:8505: Bca_9.72 nirvyāpāraśca tatrātmetyatra vādo vṛthā nanu //
SA11bsa054_u:8513: iti hetoratrātmani nirvyāpāre vādo vivādo vṛthā niṣphalaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8516: nanu yadi ātmā na bhavet, kathaṃ tarhi kṛtavipraṇāśādidoṣo na syāt?
SA11bsa054_u:8517: tato na vṛthā tadvāda ityāha hetumānityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8521: sa eva phālayogī phalasaṃbaddhaḥ iti evameṣa saṃbhavo na dṛśyate,
SA11bsa054_u:8523: anya eva mṛto loke jāyate anya eva hi /
SA11bsa054_u:8525: etattarhi kathaṃ nīyate yaduktam- anenaiva kṛtaṃ karma, ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti?
SA11bsa054_u:8528_1: aikyamāśritya anekeṣu ekatvaṃ lokādhyavasāyavaśādāropitameva nimittīkṛtya kartā bhoktā
SA11bsa054_u:8528_2: iti deśitam- ya eva karmaṇaḥ kartā sa eva tatphalasyopabhoktā ca /
SA11bsa054_u:8532: ata eva ca tatraivoktam- upātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu vipacyante iti /
SA11bsa054_u:8533: tathā cetanā karma, cetayitvā karma iti vacanācca / taduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:8534: karmajaṃ lokavaicitryaṃ cetanā tatkṛtaṃ ca tat /
SA11bsa054_u:8539: karmajaṃ hi jagaduktamaśeṣaṃ karma cittamavadhūya na cāsti //
SA11bsa054_u:8545: yathā ca lākṣārasaparibhāvitaṃ mātuluṅgādibījamuptaṃ tatsaṃskāraparaṃparāpravṛtteḥ tatpuṣpādiṣu raktatāmutpādayati,
SA11bsa054_u:8546: na ca tatra kaścit pūrvāparakālayoreko 'nugāmī samasti /
SA11bsa054_u:8547: tacca kuśalākuśalasamānasyāpi (?) kalpanopasthāpitatvāt nopanyāso yuktaḥ / taduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:8550: phalaṃ tatraiva badhnāti karpāse raktatā yathā //
SA11bsa054_u:8552: tasmādyathā bījādiṣu ātmānamantareṇāpi pratiniyamena kāryaṃ tadutpattiśca krameṇa bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:8553: tathā prakṛte 'pi paralokagāminamekaṃ vināpi kāryakāraṇabhāvasya niyāmakatvāt pratiniyatameva phalam,
SA11bsa054_u:8554: kleśakarmābhisaṃskṛtasya saṃtānasya avicchedena pravartanāt paraloke phalapratilambho 'bhidhīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:8557: yathā ca satyevātmani sa na ghaṭate,
SA11bsa054_u:8558: tathā sapracayamucyamānamativistaraṃ syāditi neha pratanyate // āha ca-
SA11bsa054_u:8566: tasmādābhiprāyikīṃ bhagavato deśanāmajānadbhiḥ parikalpito 'sau, na vastusat /
SA11bsa054_u:8571: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ asti karma, asti phalam /
SA11bsa054_u:8572: kārakastu nopalabhyate ya imān skandhān vijahāti,
SA11bsa054_u:8575: atrāyaṃ dharmasaṃketaḥ, yadasmin sati idaṃ bhavati, asyotpādādidamutpadyate iti //
SA11bsa054_u:8576: etena bhagavataiva idaṃpratyayatāmātralakṣaṇaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'pi darśita eva /
SA11bsa054_u:8577: ayamapi ca saṃtānasyetyanena [saṃtāna eka ityanena] yathāvyavahāramanirūpitasvarūpaḥ sūcita eva,
SA11bsa054_u:8583: dṛṣṭā śaktirmatā sā cetsaṃvṛtyāstu yathā tathā //
SA11bsa054_u:8588: na ca atra smarturabhāve 'pi kaścid vyāghātaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8589: anubhūte hi vastuni vijñānasaṃtāne smṛtibījādhānāt kālāntareṇa saṃtatiparipākahetoḥ smaraṇaṃ nāma kāryamutpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:8591: ativistarabhayāt pratyekamiha na pratividhīyante iti tatsamarthanamanyatraiva vistareṇāvadhāryamiti //
SA11bsa054_u:8594: paramārthe tu sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvāt sarvavikalpoparamācca na kiṃcidutpadyate vā nirudhyate vā sātmakamanātmakaṃ vā /
SA11bsa054_u:8596: nāpi ihaloko na paraloko vā na kaścidasti,
SA11bsa054_u:8598: tasmāt sarvametat pratibimbasaṃnibhaṃ niḥsvabhāvamutpadyate nirudhyate ca /
SA11bsa054_u:8599: kāryakāraṇaṃ ca sātmakaṃ nirātmakaṃ ca nityamanityaṃ cābhidhīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:8606: evaṃ na ca nirodho 'sti na ca bhāvo 'sti tattvataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8613: na kartāsti na bhoktāsti puṇyāpuṇyaṃ pratītyajam /
SA11bsa054_u:8614: yatpratītya na tajjātaṃ proktaṃ vācaspate tvayā //
SA11bsa054_u:8620: bhagavānāha- evameva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaścakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāni abhiniviśate /
SA11bsa054_u:8623: saṃrakto rāgajaṃ karmābhisaṃskaroti trividhaṃ kāyena, caturvidhaṃ vācā, [trividhaṃ manasā] /
SA11bsa054_u:8624: tacca karmābhisaṃskṛtamādita eva kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati,
SA11bsa054_u:8633_0: tat punaḥ kālāntareṇa maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite jīvitendriyanirodhe āyuṣaḥ
SA11bsa054_u:8633_1: parikṣayāt tatsabhāgasya karmaṇaḥ kṣīṇatvāt caramavijñānasya nirudhyamānasya manasa ārambaṇībhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:8635: iti hi mahārāja caramavijñānenādhipatinā tena ca karmārambaṇena aupapattyaṃśikaṃ dvayapratyayaṃ prathamaṃ vijñānamutpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:8640: yadi vā manuṣyeṣu, yadi vā deveṣu /
SA11bsa054_u:8641: tasya ca prathamavijñānasya aupapattyaṃśikasya samanantaraniruddhasya anantaraṃ sabhāgā cittasaṃtatiḥ pravartate,
SA11bsa054_u:8646: iti mahārāja na kaściddharmo 'smāllokāt paralokaṃ gacchati, cyutyupapattī prajñāyete /
SA11bsa054_u:8647: tacca mahārāja caramavijñānamutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchati, nirudhyamānaṃ na kvacidgacchati /
SA11bsa054_u:8648: karmāpyutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchati, nirudhyamānaṃ na kvacidgacchati /
SA11bsa054_u:8656: karmaṇāṃ ca avandhyatā prajñāyate, vipākasya ca pratisaṃvedanā /
SA11bsa054_u:8657: na tatra kaścit kartā, na bhoktā, anyatra nāmasaṃketāt // iti vistaraḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:8661: evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante puṇyopagāḥ, apuṇyopagāḥ ānañjayopagāśca /
SA11bsa054_u:8672: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate /
SA11bsa054_u:8683: ātmapriyarūpasātarūpairviyogo mā bhavatviti aparityāgo bhūyo bhūyaśca prārthanā,
SA11bsa054_u:8685: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayatti kāyena vācā manasā,
SA11bsa054_u:8700: tatra karmaṇāṃ naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomi /
SA11bsa054_u:8701: [Bcp_226] tṛṣṇāyāṃ api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījaṃ snehayāmīti /
SA11bsa054_u:8702: avidyāyā api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījamavakirāmīti /
SA11bsa054_u:8704: api tu vijñānabījaṃ karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehābhisyanditam avidyāvakīrṇaṃ virohati,
SA11bsa054_u:8706: sa ca nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvaranirmito na kālapariṇāmito na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8707_0: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogādṛtusamavāyādanyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyādāsvādanānuprabaddhaṃ
SA11bsa054_u:8707_2: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu apratyarthikeṣu ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu
SA11bsa054_u:8710: asti ca karmaphalam, asti ca vijñaptiḥ, hetupratyayānā mavaikalyāt /
SA11bsa054_u:8714_1: kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu apratyarthikeṣu
SA11bsa054_u:8724: yasmādanye māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ, anye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti /
SA11bsa054_u:8725: na tu ya eva māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ, ta eva aupapattyaṃśikāḥ prādurbhavanti /
SA11bsa054_u:8728: na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu māraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti, nāpyaniruddheṣu /
SA11bsa054_u:8730: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti,
SA11bsa054_u:8733: kathaṃ na saṃkrāntitaḥ? visadṛśāt sattvanikāyādvisabhāgāḥ skandhā jātyantare 'bhinirvartante /
SA11bsa054_u:8738: kathaṃ tatsadṛśānuprabandhataḥ? yathāvedanīyaṃ karma kriyate, tathāvedanīyo vipāko 'nubhūyate /
SA11bsa054_u:8740: evamādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ [kāraṇaiḥ-ākāraiḥ] draṣṭavyaḥ // iti vistaraḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:8741: tadevamātmādivirahe 'pi karmaphalasaṃbandho 'vikalaḥ sūtreṣu bhagavatā svayamupadarśita ityupadarśitaṃ bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:8744: ātmā hi ātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:8745: ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnoti paṇḍitaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:8750: cittasya damanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham /
SA11bsa054_u:8753: tadapi ca ātmadṛṣṭayabhiniviṣṭānāmanyatrātmagrāhaparikalpavicchedārthaṃ neyārthatayā saṃvṛtyā cittamātmeti prakāśitaṃ na tu paramārthataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8759: yataḥ tadapi ca anyatra pudgalādyabhiniveśabādhanāya vacanam /
SA11bsa054_u:8764: tathāpi na vastutaḥ tadahaṃkāragocara ityupadarśayannāha atītetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8765: atītānāgataṃ cittaṃ nāhaṃ taddhi na vidyate /
SA11bsa054_u:8766: tridhā hi cittaṃ saṃbhavati parikalpamupādāya atītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannaṃ ca /
SA11bsa054_u:8768: atītānāgataṃ naṣṭājātaṃ cittaṃ nāhaṃ na ahaṃdarśanaviṣayaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8770: tadatītā nāgataṃ cittaṃ na vidyate, na saṃpratyasti, naṣṭājātatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:8771: yadatītaṃ tat kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇāmitam /
SA11bsa054_u:8773: pratyutpannaṃ tarhi cittamahaṃ bhaviṣya tītyata āha-
SA11bsa054_u:8775: yathā utpannaṃ vartamānaṃ cittamahamastu, tadapi na yuktam /
SA11bsa054_u:8777: asmin pratyutpanne citte naṣṭe dvitīyakṣaṇe atīte sati nāstyahaṃ punaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:8781: ato na cittālambano 'pīti nirālambana evāyamahaṃpratyaya utpadyate //
SA11bsa054_u:8783: nāpi cittamahaṃkārasya viṣaya iti prasādhyopasaṃharannāha yathaivetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8784: Bca_9.75 yathaiva kadalīstambho na kaścidbhāgaśaḥ kṛtaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8788: bhāgaśaḥ pratyavayavaśaḥ kṛto 'vadhūto na kaścit na vastusan prāpyate,
SA11bsa054_u:8790: ahamapi ahaṃpratyayasya viṣayo 'pi asadbhūtaḥ avastubhūtaḥ, vandhyātanayavat /
SA11bsa054_u:8794: yadi sattvo na vidyeta kasyopari kṛpeti cet /
SA11bsa054_u:8795: yadi sarvathaiva sattvaḥ ātmā pudgalo vā vicāryamāṇo na vidyeta,
SA11bsa054_u:8797: tadā kasyopari kṛpā karuṇā bodhisattvānāṃ bhavet,
SA11bsa054_u:8799: karuṇā ca samyaksaṃbodhisādhanam, tatpūrvakameva saṃbhāranidāneṣu dānādiṣu pravartanāt /
SA11bsa054_u:8802: atha khalu āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat- na bhagavan bodhisattvena atibahuṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:8803: eka eva dharmo bodhisattvena svārādhitaḥ kartavyaḥ supratibiddhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8805: tadyathā- yena rājñaścakravartinaścakraratnaṃ gacchati, tena sarvabalakāyo gacchati /
SA11bsa054_u:8806: evameva bhagavan yena bodhisattvasya mahākaruṇā gacchati, tena sarve buddhadharmā gacchanti /
SA11bsa054_u:8807: tadyathā bhagavan jīvitendriye sati anyeṣāmindriyāṇāṃ pravṛttirbhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:8808: evameva bhagavan mahākaruṇāyāṃ satyāṃ bodhikārakāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pravṛttirbhavatīti //
SA11bsa054_u:8811: mañjuśrīrāha- mahākaruṇārambhā devaputra bodhisattvānāṃ caryā sattvādhiṣṭhānā // iti vistaraḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:8812: tasmādavaśyaṃ prathamataḥ sattvālambanā karuṇābhyupagantavyāḥ duḥkhitasattvādhiṣṭhānena samutpatteḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8813: sattvābhāve ca sā na syāditi cet, evaṃ manyase yadi, tadā naitadvaktavyamityāha kāryārthamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8816: tadarthamabhyupetena svīkṛtena mohena saṃvṛtyā yaḥ prakalpitaḥ samāropitaḥ sattvaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:8818: tathāhi sakalakalpanājālarahitaṃ sarvāvaraṇavinirmuktaṃ paramapuruṣārthatayā buddhatvamiha sādhyam /
SA11bsa054_u:8823: sā ca prathamato duḥkhitasattveṣu pravartamānā saṃbhārārambhanidānamupapadyate iti kāryārthaṃ mohasya saṃvṛtisatyarūpasyābhyupagamaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8824: tataḥ prathamataḥ sattvālambanaiva karuṇā, tataḥ paraṃ dharmālambanā, anālambanā ca /
SA11bsa054_u:8829: ye kecidbhikṣavaḥ śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ātmeti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśyanti imānete (tān?)
SA11bsa054_u:8831: tato yadi nāma prajñayā nirūpayataḥ paramārthataḥ sattvānupalambhaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:8832: tathāpi saṃvṛtyā na niṣidhyate iti / taduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:8833: yataḥ prajñā tattvaṃ bhajati karuṇā saṃvṛtimataḥ
SA11bsa054_u:8836: tadā te 'bhūdārte suta iva pituḥ prema jagati //
SA11bsa054_u:8839: sattvasaṃjñā ca te nātha sarvathā na pravartate /
SA11bsa054_u:8842: tasmādamī rūpādaya eva saṃvṛtyā sattvaśabdenocyante / iti na karuṇā nirviṣayā //
SA11bsa054_u:8843: nanu paramārthataḥ sattvābhāve kasya tat kāryam,
SA11bsa054_u:8844: iti kathaṃ tatsādhanāya kasyacit pravṛttirityabhisaṃdhāya āha kāryamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8845: kāryaṃ kasya na cetsattvaḥ satyamīhā tu mohataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8847: yadi sattvo nāsti, tadā ekasyānuyāyino 'bhāvāt rūpādīnāṃ ca utpannavināśitvāt kāryaṃ kasya?
SA11bsa054_u:8850: evameva etanmatameva asmākam- naiva kasyacit paramārthataḥ kāryam, asvāmikatvāt sarvadharmāṇām /
SA11bsa054_u:8851: yadyevam, kathaṃ tarhi tatsādhanāya prathamataḥ pravṛttiriti cet, īhā tu mohataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8853: mamaiva tat kāryaṃ bhaviṣyatītyekatvādhyavasāyena sattvābhāve 'pi saṃvṛtyā māyāsvabhāvatayā /
SA11bsa054_u:8859: nanu ca moho nāma avidyāsvabhāvatayā sarvathaiva anupādeyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8860: tat kathaṃ punastasyaiva svīkāraḥ ityata āha duḥkhetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8861: Bca_9.77 duḥkhavyupaśamārthaṃ tu kāryamoho na vāryate //
SA11bsa054_u:8863: tatra yaḥ saṃsāranidānam, sa prahātavya eva /
SA11bsa054_u:8864: anyastu yaḥ paraṃparayā duḥkhavyupaśamārthaṃ sarvasattvajātyādivyasananimittaṃ [Bcp_230] kāryamohaḥ kāryasya paramārthasatyalakṣaṇasyādhigamāya mohaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:8874: etat kāryārthamavicārataḥ [9.4] ityasmin prastāve pratipāditameva pūrvam /
SA11bsa054_u:8882: yathā kāryamoho duḥkhopaśamahetuḥ, na tathā dvitīya ātmamohaḥ, tasmin sati ahaṃkārakṣayābhāvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:8883: ātmamohāttu anātmani ātmaviparyāsadarśanāt punarahaṃkāro vardhate, vṛddha upajāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:8884: kiṃbhūtaḥ? duḥkhahetuḥ duḥkhasya sāṃsārikasya triduḥkhatālakṣaṇasya hetuḥ kāraṇam /
SA11bsa054_u:8886: sati ca ātmadarśane kathamasau nivarteta? kāraṇe 'vikalasāmarthye kāryasya nivṛttyayogāt /
SA11bsa054_u:8888: tathāhi ātmānaṃ paśyataḥ saṃskṛteṣu skandhadhātvāyataneṣu ahamiti dṛḍhataramutpadyate snehaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8889: tatastadduḥkhapratīkārecchayā sukhābhilāṣo doṣān pracchādya tadarthitayā guṇādhyāropāt tatsādhaneṣu pravartate /
SA11bsa054_u:8891: ahaṃ mameti ca darśanāt paripanthini vidveṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8892: tataḥ samastaduḥkhanidānaṃ sarva eva kleśopakleśā labdhaprasarāḥ pravartante /
SA11bsa054_u:8905: tato 'pi ātmadarśanādapi na nivartyo nivartayitumaśakyo 'haṃkāraśced yadi, tadā-
SA11bsa054_u:8910: tāvatkālamastu, paścāt punariyamapi prahāsyate, upalambhadṛṣṭitvāditi bhāvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8911: tathāhi tadbhāvanāprakarṣaparyantagamanāt sākṣānnairātmyadarśanāt virodhi satkāyadarśanaṃ nivartate /
SA11bsa054_u:8912: tannivṛttau ca ekasyānugāmino darśanābhāvāt pūrvāpararūpavikalasya kṣaṇamātrasya darśanam /
SA11bsa054_u:8913: tataḥ pūrvāparasamāropābhāvāt na anāgatasukhasādhanaṃ kiṃcidātmanaḥ paśyati /
SA11bsa054_u:8914: tato na tasya kvacidviṣaye rāgo jāyate, nāpi tatprativirodhini dveṣaḥ, āsaṅgābhāvādeva /
SA11bsa054_u:8917: na ca anyena kṛte 'pakāre prekṣāvataḥ anyatra vairaniryātanamucitam, nāpi yasya kṛtastenāpi /
SA11bsa054_u:8918: evaṃ rāgādinivṛttau anye 'pi tatprabhavāḥ kleśopakleśā notpadyante /
SA11bsa054_u:8919: nāpi vastutaḥ kaścit kasyacidapakārī, idaṃ pratītya idamutpadyate iti pratītyasamutpādadarśanādvā /
SA11bsa054_u:8920: evaṃ hi pudgalaśūnyatāyāṃ satkāyadarśananivṛttau chinnamūlatvāt kleśā na samudācaranti /
SA11bsa054_u:8922: tadyathāpi nāma śāntamate vṛkṣasya mūlacchinnasya sarvaśākhāpatrapalāśaṃ śuṣyati,
SA11bsa054_u:8927: syādetatyadi nāma ātmā vicāreṇa kharaviṣāṇasadṛśatvānnāhaṃkārasya viṣayaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:8928: tathāpi kāyāvayavī tadviṣayo bhaviṣyatītyatrāha kāyo neti-
SA11bsa054_u:8929: Bca_9.79 kāyo na pādau na jaṅghā norū kāyaḥ kaṭirna ca /
SA11bsa054_u:8930: nodaraṃ nāpyayaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ noro bāhū na cāpi saḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:8931: Bca_9.80 na hastau nāpyayaṃ pārśvau na kakṣau nāṃsalakṣaṇaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8932: na grīvā na śiraḥ kāyaḥ kāyo 'tra kataraḥ punaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:8933: kāyo 'pi vicāreṇaiko naiva kaścidastītyupadarśayati- tathā hi karacaraṇādayo bhāgā evaṃ paraṃ dṛśyante,
SA11bsa054_u:8936: yataḥ kāyo na pādau, na caraṇau, na jaṅghā /
SA11bsa054_u:8941: nāpyayaṃ pṛṣṭham, ayaṃ kāyaḥ pṛṣṭhamapi naiva /
SA11bsa054_u:8943: bāhū na cāpi saḥ, sa kāyo bhujāvapi na bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:8945: nāpyayaṃ pārśvau, [Bcp_232] ayaṃ kāyaḥ pārśvāvapi na bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:8946: na kakṣau, bhujamūle api na kāyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8949: na śiraḥ kāyaḥ, mastako 'pi kāyo na bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:8956: atra eṣu pādādibhāgeṣu purovartiṣu śarīrakalpanānimitteṣu kataraḥ kāyo bhavatu?
SA11bsa054_u:8957: naiva kaścideko 'pi nirūpyamāṇaḥ kāyātmaka upalabhyate iti yāvat //
SA11bsa054_u:8958: athāpi syāt- naivamabhidhīyate pratyekaṃ karādayaḥ kāyaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:8959: kiṃ tarhi sarvāvayavavyāpakatvādavayavinaḥ sarvāvayaveṣu vartate ityatrāha yadītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8961: sarvāvayaveṣu vartamāno 'yamekadeśena vartate, yugapat sarvātmanā vā?
SA11bsa054_u:8962: tatra yadi sarveṣu karacaraṇādiṣu avayaveṣu kāyo 'vayavī,
SA11bsa054_u:8972: tasya avakāśābhāvādeva avayaveṣu na vṛttirityāha aṃśā ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8973: Bca_9.81 aṃśā aṃśeṣu vartante sa ca kutra svayaṃ sthitaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:8974: aṃśā bhāgāḥ aṃśeṣu svasvabhāgeṣu vartante vyavatiṣṭhante, svasvabhāgavyavasthitatvāt sarvabhāvānām /
SA11bsa054_u:8975: sa ca kutra svayaṃ sthitaḥ? svayaṃ punarasau kāyo 'vayavī kva nu nāma vyavasthitaḥ iti na vidmaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:8977: Bca_9.82 sarvātmanā cetsarvatra sthitaḥ kāyaḥ karādiṣu /
SA11bsa054_u:8980: avayaveṣu anavakāśatvāt sa ca kutra svayaṃ sthitaḥ iti prasaṅgo nādyāpi nivartate /
SA11bsa054_u:8983: ādiśabdāccaraṇādiṣu sthitaḥ samavetaḥ kāyāvayavī cet yadi,
SA11bsa054_u:8984: tadā punarayaṃ doṣaḥ syādityāha- kāyā iti /
SA11bsa054_u:8985: kāyāvayavinaḥ tāvanta eva syuḥ, tatsaṃkhyāparicchinnā eva prāpnuyuḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8993: ayaṃ ca prasaṅgaḥ anekatra ekadeśena vṛttipakṣe 'pi yojayitavyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8998: naivāntarna bahiḥ kāyaḥ kathaṃ kāyaḥ karādiṣu /
SA11bsa054_u:9000: adhunā punaravayavinaḥ pratiṣedhāt na bahiḥ na bāhyaḥ pratyakṣādigocaraḥ kāyaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9003: Bca_9.83 karādibhyaḥ pṛthaṅ nāsti kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate //
SA11bsa054_u:9004: karādibhyo 'vayavebhyaḥ pṛthag bhinnaḥ upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaḥ kāyo nāsti, na pratibhāsate /
SA11bsa054_u:9009: sa kāyaḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate?
SA11bsa054_u:9010: kathaṃ nviti kathaṃcidapi kāyamanupalabhamānaḥ tatsattvamasaṃbhāvayan pṛcchati- kathaṃ nu kena prakāreṇa /
SA11bsa054_u:9019: kathaṃ tarhi karādiṣu kāyabuddhirityāha- mohāttu ityādi /
SA11bsa054_u:9020: mohādavidyāvaśāt tu punaḥ kāyabuddhiḥ karādiṣu ekadravyarahiteṣu, na tu paramārthataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9023: tadupanibaddho 'yaṃ kāyādivyavahāro loke pravartate, na tu pāramārthika iti //
SA11bsa054_u:9024: kathamanyatra sā na bhavati ityatrāha saṃniveśeti-
SA11bsa054_u:9032: yathā sthāṇau puruṣasvabhāvarahite 'pi puruṣasādhāraṇordhvatādisaṃniveśaviśeṣamupalabdhavato dūrādavivecitaparaviśeṣasya kasyacit vibhramāt puruṣabuddhirupajāyate,
SA11bsa054_u:9034: syādetat- kathaṃ punaretadavasitaṃ mohāt kāyabuddhiḥ, na tu punarvastutaḥ ityatrāha yāvadityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9037: yāvat yāvatkālāvadhiparicchinnā pratyayānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ pṛthivyādiṣaḍdhātuṣaṭsparśāyatanāṣṭādaśamanopavicārātmakānāṃ karmāyattavṛttīnāṃ sāmagrī samavadhānam,
SA11bsa054_u:9039: yathā puruṣasvabhāvavirahito 'pi paramārthataḥ parikalpitarūpatayā puruṣa iva pratibhāsate vyavahriyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9042: na pūrvaṃ kalalādyavasthāyāṃ na paścādvikalitatvād bhasmādyavasthāyāṃ nijasvabhāvābhāvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9044: Bca_9.85 evaṃ karādau sā yāvattāvatkāyo 'tra dṛśyate //
SA11bsa054_u:9047: evaṃ tathā karādau yāvat sā pratyayasāmagrī,
SA11bsa054_u:9051: tasmāt sāmagrīsākalye bhavati, tadabhāve ca na bhavati kāyabuddhiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9053: ayamatra samudāyārthaḥtattatpratyayasāmagrīsadbhāve tattadvastusvabhāvamantareṇāpi abhūtaṃ tattvamādarśayantī bhrāntivaśādasau kalpanā upajāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9056: ato nāyaṃ kāyādivyavahāro vāstava iti vakṣyati / taduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:9060: anirdeśyaḥ svataḥ prāptaḥ kāya ityucyate katham //
SA11bsa054_u:9070: tāvat kāṣṭhaṃ sthāṇusvabhāvaṃ pumāniva pratīyate, na tadabhāve /
SA11bsa054_u:9071: evameva karādau yāvat sā pratyayasāmagrī, tāvat kāyo 'tra karādau dṛśyate, na paścāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9074: karacaraṇādayaḥ punaravayavāḥ pratyakśopalabdhatvāt pratiṣeddhumaśakyāḥ ityāśaṅkaya karādayo 'pi parikalpitasvabhāvā evetyupadarśayitumāha evamaṅgulītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9077: yathaiva vicāryamāṇaḥ kāyo nāsti, evaṃ karacaraṇādayo 'pi na santi /
SA11bsa054_u:9082: pādo 'pi caraṇo 'pi kataro bhavet? tatsamudāyamantareṇa vicāryamāṇo naiva kaściditi bhāvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9088: parvaṇāmaṅgulibhāgānāṃ samūhatvāt saṃghātatvāt kataro bhavediti prakṛtena saṃbandhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9089: parvaṇāmapi pratyekamavastutvamityata āha- parvāpi na vastu /
SA11bsa054_u:9090: kasmāt? svāṃśabhedataḥ, svasya ātmanaḥ aṃśānāmavayavānāṃ bhedato 'pi vibhāgāt //
SA11bsa054_u:9094: aṃśāḥ parvabhāgāḥ api aṇubhedena paramāṇuśo vibhāgena bhidyamānatvāt kalpitā eva /
SA11bsa054_u:9099: dikṣu vā vibhāgāḥ nānādigavasthitā nānārūpāṃśāḥ paramāṇoḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9104: tathāhi- pūrvāparādidigavasthitaparamāṇvabhimukhaṃ yat tat paramāṇormadhyavartino rūpam,
SA11bsa054_u:9106: yadi ekameveti pakṣaḥ, tadā sarvaparamāṇūnāṃ parivāryāvasthitānāmekadeśatāprasaṅgaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9110: tasyāpi pūrvadigavasthitasya paramāṇoraparaparamāṇunā sarvātmanā saṃbandhena tatsvarūpāntarbhāvāt paramāṇumātraṃ dravyaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9111: tathā ca sati pracayarūpā bhūdharādayo na syuḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9112: ato bhavanādīnāṃ pracayamicchatā dvitīya eva pakṣaḥ samabhyupeyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9113: tadā ca ṣaḍbhiraparāpararūpeṇa yugapat saṃbandhāt ṣaḍbhāgo madhyaparamāṇuḥ syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:9121: te 'pi punaraṇīyāṃso bhāgāḥ tathaiva nirūpyamāṇāḥ nirātmatayā nabhaḥsvabhāvatāṃ pratipadyante ityāha digvibhāgo 'pītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9123: digvibhāgo 'pi digbhedena paramāṇorvibhāgo 'pi pūrvavat ṣaḍaṃśatayā bhidyamānaḥ kataro bhavet?
SA11bsa054_u:9128: tena kāraṇena nāstyaṇuḥ, na vidyate paramāṇuriti /
SA11bsa054_u:9129: evaṃ karādayo 'pi vicārato niḥsvabhāvā draṣṭavyā iti /
SA11bsa054_u:9130: tataḥ kāyo 'pi na paramārthataḥ kaścidasti, ekānekasvabhāvaviyogasya pratipādanāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9131: itthaṃ na keśādayaḥ, na cātmā, nāpi cittam, na ca kāyaḥ ahaṃkārasya viṣayo vastutaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9132: tasmādavidyāsamutthāpitātmatayā ātmādisattvamantareṇāpi pravartamāno 'yamahamiti pratyayo nirviṣaya eva samutpadyate / tena yaduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:9137_0: punaraparaṃ kulaputra bodhisattva evaṃ kāyasmṛtimupasthāpayati- ayaṃ kāyaḥ pādapādāṅulijaṅghorutrikodaranābhīpṛṣṭhavaṃśahṛdayapārśvapārśukāhastakalācībāhvaṅgagrīvāhanulalāṭaśiraḥkapālamātrasamūhaḥ
SA11bsa054_u:9140: tat ko 'tra kāyaḥ? tasya pratyavekṣamāṇasya evaṃ bhavati- ākāśasamo 'yaṃ kāyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9143: tasya kāyaparijñānahetorna bhūyaḥ kvacit smṛtiḥ prasarati, na visarati, na pratisaratīti //
SA11bsa054_u:9145: ayaṃ kāyo na pūrvāntādāgato nāparānte saṃkrānto na pūrvāntāparāntāvasthito 'nyatrāsadviparyāsasaṃbhūtaḥ kārakavedakarahito nādyantamadhye pratiṣṭhitamūlaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9147: āgantukairvyavahārairvyavahriyate kāya iti deha iti bhoga iti āśraya iti kuṇapa iti āyatanamiti /
SA11bsa054_u:9149: evaṃ yadā vicāryamāṇo vastutaḥ śūnyasvabhāvatayā ākāśasaṃkāśaḥ sarvathā kāyaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9150: tadā mithyaiva vastutattvamāropya rāgādikamutpādayantaḥ saṃsāramupabṛṃhayanti bālāḥ ityāhaevamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9151: evaṃ svapnopame rūpe ko rajyeta vicārakaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9152: evamityuktakrameṇa svapnopame svapnopalabdhe iva rūpe 'saumanasyasthānīye ko rajyeta, ka āsajyeta?
SA11bsa054_u:9153: asya ca upalakṣaṇatvāt ko dviṣyāt, ko muhyet, ityapi veditavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:9154: tadyathā- saumanasyasthānīyāni cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā rāgo jāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9155: daurmanasyasthānīyāni cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā dveṣo jāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9156: upekṣāsthānīyāni cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā moho jāyate iti /
SA11bsa054_u:9157: yadetanmanopratikūleṣu rūpeṣvanunītaṃ carati, tenāsya rāga utpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9158: pratikūleṣu rūpeṣu pratihataṃ carati, tenāsya dveṣa utpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9159: naivānukūleṣu na pratikūleṣu saṃmūḍhaṃ carati, tenāsya moha utpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9162: iti hi atyantayā cakṣurāyatanaṃ śūnyaṃ cakṣurāyatanasvabhāvena tat pūrvāntato 'pi nopalabhyate,
SA11bsa054_u:9168: Bca_9.88 iti hi māyopamānīndriyāṇi svapnopamān viṣayān paśyati, tasya kathaṃ rāgādikamutpadyate?
SA11bsa054_u:9171: evametadyathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā paśyan ko rajyeta dveṣṭi muhyati vā?
SA11bsa054_u:9173: kāyābhāve ca strāyādikalpanayāpi rāgo na yukta ityāha kāyaścetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9174: kāyaścaivaṃ yadā nāsti tadā kā strī pumāṃśca kaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:9179: tadā kāyābhāvāt kā strī kāminī yasyāḥ kamanīyatayā puruṣe rāgo bhavet?
SA11bsa054_u:9180: kaśca pumān kāmukaḥ yasya rañjanīyatayā striyāṃ rāgo bhavet?
SA11bsa054_u:9181: strī hi svātmani strīti saṃkalpya bahirdhā puruṣe puruṣa iti rāgaṃ janayati /
SA11bsa054_u:9182: evaṃ puruṣo 'pi svātmani puruṣa iti saṃkalpya bahirdhā striyāṃ strīti rāgaṃ janayati /
SA11bsa054_u:9183: kāyābhāve tu striyāṃ strīti na saṃvidyate, puruṣe puruṣo na saṃvidyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9184: yacca svabhāvena na saṃvidyate, na tat strī na puruṣa iti /
SA11bsa054_u:9185: tasmādasati kāye stryādikalpanākṛto 'pi na yujyate rāgaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9186: tatkasya hetoḥ? manyanāpagatā hi sarvadharmā iti /
SA11bsa054_u:9193: ṣaḍdhāturayaṃ mahārāja puruṣa iti khalu punaretad yuktam /
SA11bsa054_u:9194: kiṃ caitat pratītya kam? ṣaḍime mahārāja dhātavaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9195: katame ṣaṭ? tadyathā- pṛthvīdhātuḥ, abdhātuḥ, tejodhātuḥ, vāyudhātuḥ, ākāśadhātuḥ, vijñānadhātuśca /
SA11bsa054_u:9198: katamāni ṣaṭ? cakṣuḥsparśāyatanaṃ rūpāṇāṃ darśanāya yāvanmanaḥsparśāyatanaṃ dharmāṇāṃ vijñānāya /
SA11bsa054_u:9203: iha puruṣaḥ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyadaurmanasyopekṣāsthānīyāni rūpāṇyupavicarati /
SA11bsa054_u:9209: tat punaḥ katamat? tadyathā- keśā romāṇi nakhā dantā ityādi /
SA11bsa054_u:9210: katamaśca mahārāja bāhyaḥ pṛthvīdhātuḥ? yat kiṃcid bāhyaṃ kakkhaṭatvaṃ kharagatamupāttam /
SA11bsa054_u:9212: tatra mahārāja ādhyātmikaḥ pṛthvīdhātuḥ utpadyamāno na kutaścidāgacchati,
SA11bsa054_u:9214: bhavati mahārāja samayo 'yaṃ yat strī adhyātmaṃ [ahaṃ] strīti kalpayati /
SA11bsa054_u:9215: sā adhyātmamahaṃ strīti kalpayitvā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣa iti kalpayati /
SA11bsa054_u:9216: sā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣa iti kalpayitvā saṃraktā satī bahirdhā puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ saṃyogamākāṅkṣate /
SA11bsa054_u:9220: tatra mahārāja yaśca saṃkalpyate, yaśca saṃkalpayitā, ubhayametanna saṃvidyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9227: yacca svabhāvato na saṃvidyate, tat kathaṃ kakkhaṭatvaṃ janayiṣyati?
SA11bsa054_u:9228: iti hi mahārāja saṃkalpaṃ jñātvā kakkhaṭatvaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā kakkhaṭatvamutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchatīti /
SA11bsa054_u:9229: bhavati mahāraja samayaḥ, yadayaṃ kāyaḥ śmaśānaparyavasāno bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:9230: tasya tat kakkhaṭatvaṃ saṃklidyamānaṃ saṃnirudhyamānaṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ gacchati,
SA11bsa054_u:9242: iti hi mahārāja pṛthivīdhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātutvena nopalabhyate, anyatra vyavahārāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9243: so 'pi vyavahāro na strī na puruṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9244: evaṃ mahārāja yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā draṣṭavyamiti /
SA11bsa054_u:9246: tat kasya hetoḥ? manyanāpagatā hi sarvadharmāḥ // iti //
SA11bsa054_u:9247: evaṃ kāyasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratipādya vedanāsmṛtyupasthānamupadarśayituṃ vedanāṃ vicārayannāha yadyastītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9248: Bca_9.89 yadyasti duḥkhaṃ tattvena prahṛṣṭān kiṃ na vādhate /
SA11bsa054_u:9249: śokādyārtāya mṛṣṭādi sukhaṃ cetkiṃ na rocate //
SA11bsa054_u:9250: trividhā hi vedanāsukhā vedanā, duḥkhā vedanā, aduḥkhāsukhā ceti /
SA11bsa054_u:9255: tadā prahṛṣṭān kiṃ na bādhate, saṃtoṣayuktān kiṃ na duḥkhayati?
SA11bsa054_u:9260: sukhaṃ cedyadi, kiṃ na rocate? na hi vastu satsvabhāvaṃ kadācidapi nivartitumutsahate /
SA11bsa054_u:9262: yaduktaṃ prahṛṣṭān kiṃ na bādhate iti, tatra parasya samādhānamāha balīyasetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9265: kiṃ tarhi samudbhūtavartinā sukhena tiraskṛtatvāt vidyamānamapi nānubhūyate,
SA11bsa054_u:9267: sadapi yadi tadduḥkhaṃ nānubhūyate na vedyate ityucyate, tadā na yuktametadityāha vedanātvamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9268: Bca_9.90 vedanātvaṃ kathaṃ tasya yasya nānubhavātmatā //
SA11bsa054_u:9269: vedanātvaṃ vedanāsvabhāvatvaṃ kathaṃ kena prakāreṇa tasyāvyaktasya sukhasya yasya nānubhavātmatā nānubhūyamānasvabhāvatā /
SA11bsa054_u:9270: vedyate iti hi vedanocyate, vedanānubhava iti vacanāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9271: yadi ca avedyamānāpi vedanā syāt, tadā na kiṃcinna vedanā syādityatiprasaṅgaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:9273: kiṃ tu sūkṣmatayā anubhūtamapi ananubhūtakalpamityatrāha astītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9274: Bca_9.91 asti sūkṣmatayā duḥkhaṃ sthaulyaṃ tasya hṛtaṃ nanu /
SA11bsa054_u:9276: asti vidyate sūkṣmatayā anupalakśyamāṇatayā duḥkham, tarhi balīyasā sukhena kiṃ kṛtamasya?
SA11bsa054_u:9278: prahṛṣṭāvasthāyāṃ pravṛttena balavatā sukhena sthaulyaṃ prābalyamasya duḥkhasya hatamabhibhūtam /
SA11bsa054_u:9280: iti mataṃ bho tava, na hi sūkṣmatā nāma duḥkhasya sātānubhavakāle kācidupalabhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9282: atha tuṣṭimātrā aparā tasmādeva udbhūtavṛtteḥ sukhāt,
SA11bsa054_u:9283: aparā tuṣṭimātrā dvitīyā sukhamātrā alpīyasī sukhakaṇikā syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:9286: nanu sāpyasya sūkṣmatā sāpi tuṣṭimātrā aparā,
SA11bsa054_u:9290: iti duḥkhasya sūkṣmatā avedyasvabhāvā sukhānubhavakāle nāstyeveti niścitam //
