SA11bsa054_u:9292: kiṃ tarhi kāraṇavaikalyāt kadācinnopalabhyate ityatrāha viruddhetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9295: duḥkhena viruddhasya sukhasya yaḥ pratyayo hetuḥ sparśaḥ, tasyotpattau ābhimukhye sati /
SA11bsa054_u:9297: viruddhasya pratyayasya sukhahetorutpattau janmani, viruddhaḥ pratyayo 'syeti vā /
SA11bsa054_u:9299: tasyotpattau satyāṃ prahṛṣṭāvasthāyāṃ hetuvaikalyāt duḥkhasyānudayo duḥkhasyānutpattiśceducyate, tadā-
SA11bsa054_u:9302: kiṃ tat? kalpanayā abhiniveśaḥ, kalpanayā kṛto yo 'bhiniveśaḥ, hiravadhāraṇe /
SA11bsa054_u:9303: sa eva vedanā sukhā duḥkhā taditarā vā /
SA11bsa054_u:9307: kathamanyathā yadeva anyasya duḥkhasādhanam, tadeva aparasya kasyacit sukhasādhanaṃ syāt?
SA11bsa054_u:9310: tasmāt kālpanikameva sukhādikaṃ tatsādhanaṃ vā, na vāstavam / āha ca-
SA11bsa054_u:9311: ahirmayūrasya sukhāya jāyate viṣaṃ viṣābhyāsavato rasāyanam /
SA11bsa054_u:9312: bhavanti cānandaviśeṣahetavo mukhaṃ tudantaḥ karabhasya kaṇṭakāḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:9314: vedanā abhiniveśasvabhāvatvādeva ca vicāreṇa nivartayituṃ śakyate ityāha ata evetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9318: ata eva vicāro 'yaṃ vimarśo 'yaṃ pratipakṣo virodhī,
SA11bsa054_u:9326: tasmin saṃbhūtaṃ jātaṃ dhyānaṃ viviktaṃ kāmaiḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9327: viviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhamityādi /
SA11bsa054_u:9334: sāṃprataṃ hetvanabhisaṃbhavādeva na vedanā vastusatī yuktetyāha sāntarāvityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9339: sparśāḥ ṣaṭ saṃnipātajāḥ [abhi. ko.-3.30] iti vacanāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9340: sa trikasaṃnipātajaḥ sparśa eva na ghaṭate, kutastatpratyayā vedanā bhaviṣyatīti /
SA11bsa054_u:9343: tadā saṃsargaḥ saṃnipāto melanaṃ kutaḥ kasmāt etayorindriyārthayoḥ? naiva yujyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9345: vyavadhāne sati sa kathaṃ bhavet iti bhāvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9346: atha dvitīyaḥ prakāraḥ, so 'pi na yujyate ityāha nirantaratve ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9349: evaṃ hi tayoḥ sarvātmanā nairantaryaṃ bhavet yadi aṇīyasāpi nāṃśena vyavadhānaṃ syāt sadharmatā ca /
SA11bsa054_u:9352: ekatve sati bhedābhāvāt kiṃ kena saṃgataṃ syāt?
SA11bsa054_u:9355: na ca tatra aṃśāṃśivyavahāro yuktaḥ, sthūlarūpāṇāmeva tatsaṃbhavāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9356: tatra ca saṃsargadūṣaṇe na kiṃciddūṣyate ityāha nāṇorityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9366: tāvatā siddhaṃ naḥ sādhyamityāha apraveśa iti-
SA11bsa054_u:9367: Bca_9.95 apraveśe na miśratvamamiśratve na saṃgatiḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:9368: sarvātmanā hi saṃparkaḥ saṃgatiraṇoḥ, anyathā sāṃśatvaprasaṅgāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9369: tathā ca tatsvarūpaṃ svātmanā vyāpnuvata eva tena saṃgatiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9371: tacca miśratvaṃ tatra praveśamantareṇa na bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:9372: itthamapraveśe praveśābhāve sati na miśratvaṃ nāsaṃbhinnarūpatvam /
SA11bsa054_u:9373: amiśratve miśratvābhāve ca na saṃgatiḥ nāsaṅgaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:9374: niraṃśasya sarvathaiva saṃsargo na yujyate ityāha niraṃśasya cetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9378: saṃsargo mīlanaṃ kathaṃ nāmopapadyate? nāmeti saṃbhāvayānām /
SA11bsa054_u:9379: kathaṃ saṃsargaḥ saṃbhāvyate? sarvālpasyāpi avaśyamekenāṃśena bhavitavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:9380: yasya punaraṃśa eva nāsti, tasya amūrtasya aṃśābhāve asattvameva prāptamiti bhāvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9381: na caitad bhavato 'pi pramāṇapratītaṃ kvacidastītyāha saṃsarga ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9382: Bca_9.96 saṃsarge ca niraṃśatvaṃ yadi dṛṣṭaṃ nidarśaya //
SA11bsa054_u:9394: yasya tu mūrtireva nāsti, tasya kathaṃ saṃsargaḥ syāt?
SA11bsa054_u:9395: iti trayāṇāmapi saṃsargamavadhūya saṃprati samūha eva vastusan nāsti iti pratipādayannāha samūhasyāpītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9399: avastutvāt vasturahitatvāt aśvaviuṣāṇavat saṃsargo naiva yujyate iti prakṛtena saṃbandhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9402: yathā pūrvaṃ vicāritam, yathā prāṅ nirūpitam, evamaṅgulipuñjatvādityādinā //
SA11bsa054_u:9405: tasmādevaṃ pratipāditakrameṇa sparśanābhāve trikasaṃparkābhāve vedanāsaṃbhavaḥ kutaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9406: vedanāyāḥ sukhādirūpāyāḥ saṃbhava utpādaḥ kutaḥ, naiva yujyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9412: mā bhūt sukhasādhanāya, duḥkhasyābhiṣoḍhumaśakyatvāt tatparihārāya bhavatu cedāha-
SA11bsa054_u:9414: vedanāyā vicāreṇa niḥsvabhāvatvād bādhā avicārataḥ ātmādeḥ pūrvanirastatvādvedakābhāvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9416: ityevaṃ bādhā pīḍāvedanābhāvāt kasya vedakābhāvādbhavet, kuta upaghātahetorabhāvācca bhavet?
SA11bsa054_u:9419: saṃprati vedanābhāvāt tatpratyayā tṛṣṇāpi kāraṇavirahāt paramārthato notpādamarhatītyupadarśayitumāha yadā netyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9420: Bca_9.99 yadā na vedakaḥ kaścidvedanā ca na vidyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9421: tadāvasthāmimāṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛṣṇe kiṃ na vidīryase //
SA11bsa054_u:9424: yadā kaścidātmādirnāsti, tadabhāvātsamanantaranirūpaṇācca vedanā na vidyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9425: tadā avasthāmimāṃ evaṃvidhāṃ svajanmavikalāṃ dṛṣṭvā upalabhya tṛṣṇe kiṃ na vidīryase,
SA11bsa054_u:9430: kenāyaṃ tarhi sukhasādhanatvādinā bhāveṣu dṛṣṭādivyavahāraḥ pravartate ityatrāha dṛśyate ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9435: evaṃ tarhi cittameva vedakaṃ vastusadastīti cedāha svapnamāyopamātmanā /
SA11bsa054_u:9440: cittena sahotpannatvāt cittena saha janma yasya tasya darśanam,
SA11bsa054_u:9442: na tu paramārthato darśanamasti yenaivaṃ dṛṣṭādivyavahāraḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9448: api tu jñānaṃ viṣayākāratayā tata utpadyamānamuttarakālaṃ tasya grāhakamucyate,
SA11bsa054_u:9452: anyathā pūrvaṃ prāgbhāvi paścāduttarakālaṃ jātena utpannena jñānena smaryate nānubhūyate smṛtirūpeṇa viṣayīkriyate, na sākṣādvidyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9454: na ca atītasya svarūpeṇa vedanamucitam, avidyamānatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9460: svātmānaṃ svaṃ svarūpaṃ nānubhavati, na vedayate, svasaṃvedanasya pūrvaṃ nirastatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9461: anyena tarhi sā jñānenānubhūyate vedanā? āha-
SA11bsa054_u:9464: anyena tatsamānakālabhāvinā jñānenānubhūyate, vedyate, jñānasya jñānāntareṇa avedanāt //
SA11bsa054_u:9465: na cāsti vedakaḥ kaścidvedanāto na tattvataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9466: na ca naivāsti vedakaḥ kaścit, yo vedanāṃ vedayate, cittamanyadvā /
SA11bsa054_u:9467: ataḥ asmāt kāraṇāt vedanā anubhava iti vedanālakṣaṇaśūnyatvādvedanā na tattvataḥ na paramārthataḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9479: vedako vedanā vedyaḥ pṛthagbhūto na vidyate //
SA11bsa054_u:9481: yathā bodhistathā hyeṣā śāntā śuddhā prabhāsvarā //
SA11bsa054_u:9484: iti na kasyacit sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā svakīyaṃ bhavatītyāha nirātmaka ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9485: Bca_9.102 nirātmake kalāpe 'smin ka evaṃ bādhyate 'nayā //
SA11bsa054_u:9486: nirātmake kasyacidātmādervedakasyābhāvādasvāmike kalāpe ekasyānuyāyino 'bhāvāt pratītyasamutpannamātre 'smin māyāsvabhāvavadupalambhagocaratāmupagate /
SA11bsa054_u:9487: evamindrajālavat paśyan saṃjātavismayo brūte- ka evaṃ bādhyate 'nayā /
SA11bsa054_u:9494: Bca_9.103 nendriyeṣu na rūpādau nāntarāle manaḥ sthitam /
SA11bsa054_u:9496: tatra ṣaṣṭhaṃ tāvanmanovijñānaṃ nirūpayati- tathā kva punaridaṃ manovijñānaṃ svayamupasthitam?
SA11bsa054_u:9497: tatra na tāvadindriyeṣu cakṣurādiṣu manaḥ sthitaṃ sthitimupagatam /
SA11bsa054_u:9502: nāpyantarna madhye kāyasya cittaṃ nāpi bahiḥ na bāhyeṣu śarīrāvayaveṣu cittaṃ labhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9504: uktebhyaḥ sthānebhyaḥ anyatrāpi kkaciddeśāntare yatra tatra vā na labhyate,
SA11bsa054_u:9506: tathā kkacit kathaṃcidbhavati, tataḥ kathaṃ tasya niṣedha ityatrāha yanna kāye ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9507: Bca_9.104 yanna kāye na cānyatra na miśraṃ na pṛthak kvacit /
SA11bsa054_u:9510: na cānyatra, naiva kāyādanyatra bāhye vastuni /
SA11bsa054_u:9515: nāpi pṛthak svātantryeṇa ca kvacidavasthitaṃ yaccittam,
SA11bsa054_u:9516: tat paramārthato na [Bcp_245] kiṃcit na vastusat /
SA11bsa054_u:9519: ataḥ asmāt kāraṇāt sattvāḥ prāṇinaḥ prakṛtyā svabhāvena parinirvṛtāḥ parimuktasvabhāvāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9521: svayameva tu abhūtaparikalpavaśādasatyapi satyamāropya kleśavāsanopahatacittasaṃtatayaḥ saṃsāracārakāvarodhaniṣiddhasvātantryavṛttayo 'parimuktā ityucyante na tu paramārthataḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:9522: iti mano vicārya cakṣurādivijñānaṃ vicārayannāha jñeyādityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9523: Bca_9.105 jñeyātpūrvaṃ yadi jñānaṃ kimālambyāsya saṃbhavaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9525: tathā hi na kvacit sadā sadrūpamavasthitaṃ jñānam,
SA11bsa054_u:9526: kiṃ tu cakṣurādisāmagrīṃ pratītya utpadyamānaṃ rūpādijñeyagrāhakamityucyate,
SA11bsa054_u:9527: iti parasyāśayamāśaṅkaya vikalpayati- tat punarjñeyāt pūrvaṃ vā syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:9534: pūrvaṃ jñeyamālambanamantareṇa kimālambya kimāśritya asya saṃbhava utpādaḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:9535: dvitīyapakṣamāśrityāha- jñeyena grāhyaviṣayeṇa saha samānakālaṃ cedyadi jñānam,
SA11bsa054_u:9540: atha jñeyādbhavet paścāt tadā jñānaṃ kuto bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:9544: paścāt tadanantaraṃ nivṛtte jñeye bhavet utpadyeta jñānam,
SA11bsa054_u:9551: sa evaṃ cittaṃ parigaveṣate- katarat taccittaṃ rajyati vā duṣyati vā muhyati vā?
SA11bsa054_u:9556: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇopalabhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9558: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa sarvabuddhairna dṛṣṭam, na paśyanti, na drakṣyanti /
SA11bsa054_u:9559: [yat sarvabuddhairna dṛṣṭam], na paśyanti, na drakṣyanti, kīdṛśastasya pracāro draṣṭavyaḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:9561: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa māyāsadṛśamabhūtakalpanatayā vividhāmupapattiṃ parigṛhṇāti /
SA11bsa054_u:9564: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa dīpārciḥsadṛśaṃ hetupratyayatayā pravartate /
SA11bsa054_u:9566: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa ākāśasadṛśam, āgantukaiḥ kleśopakleśairupakliśyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9568: yāvat cittaṃ hi kāśyapa parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9572: yat tryadhvasamatikrāntaṃ tannaivāsti na nasti ityādi //
SA11bsa054_u:9573: evaṃ cittasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratipādya dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratipādayitumuktameva kramaṃ yojayannāha evaṃ cetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9576: evameva yathoditanyāyena sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvabhāvānāmutpattirutpādo nāvasīyate na pratīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9577: teṣāmapi svahetutaḥ pūrvaṃ samānakālaṃ paścādvā utpattau idameva dūṣaṇaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ vācyam /
SA11bsa054_u:9580_0: ata eva ca anutpannāniruddhasvabhāvatayā niṣprapañcatvāt sarvadharmā vimokśābhimukhā
SA11bsa054_u:9580_1: dharmadhātuniryātā ākāśadhātuparyavasānā aprajñaptikā avyavahārā anabhilāpyā anabhilapanīyā ityucyante /
SA11bsa054_u:9583: dharme dharmānupaśyī viharan bodhisattvo na kaṃciddharmaṃ samanupaśyati /
SA11bsa054_u:9589: sa sarvadharmeṣu sarvakleśeṣu ca kṛtrimasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhate- niṣkleśā ete dharmā naite sakleśāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9590: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathāhi ete nītārthe 'rthaṃ samavasaranti /
SA11bsa054_u:9591: nāsti kleśānāṃ saṃnicayo rāśībhāvaḥ, na rāgabhāvaḥ, na dveṣabhāvaḥ, na mohabhāvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9593: yatsvabhāvāśca kleśāḥ, tatsvabhāvā bodhiḥ, ityevaṃ smṛtimupasthāpayati / iti //
SA11bsa054_u:9597: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā /
SA11bsa054_u:9603: evaṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ darśayatā sarvadharmā anutpannāniruddhāḥ prakāśitāḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:9605: tataḥ satyadvayavyavasthāpanaṃ na ghaṭate iti parihartuṃ codyamutthāpayannāha yadyevamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9612: tataḥ saṃvṛterabhāvāt satyadvayaṃ saṃvṛtisatyaṃ paramārthasatyaṃ ceti yaduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:9615: iti, tadetat satyadvayaṃ kutaḥ? naiva syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9618: tathā marīcikādiṣu jalakalpanayeva saṃvṛtisvabhāvayā kalpanayā buddhyā vyavasthāpyate,
SA11bsa054_u:9631: yo 'pi tarhi sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatālakṣaṇaṃ paramārthasatyamadhigamya anupalambhayogena sarvaprapañcavirahāt parinirvṛtimupayātaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9632: so 'pi sattvaḥ parinirvṛto vinirmuktaḥ kuto bhavet? naiva syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9635: buddhiḥ saṃvṛtirucyate iti vacanāt nirvṛtirapi saṃvṛtiḥ syāt //
SA11bsa054_u:9638: parasya nirvṛtasattvādanyasya sattvasya cittaṃ tasyāsau vikalpaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9641: tato 'nyabuddhayā viṣayīkriyamāṇo 'pi nirvṛta evāsau / kutaḥ? yataḥ-
SA11bsa054_u:9644: svasaṃvṛtyā nijasaṃvṛtyā svakalpanayā sa iti parinirvṛto nāsti, na vidyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9645: parinirvṛta eva saḥ iti svayamasya sarvavikalpoparamāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9646: anyatrāpi tarhi kathamanyasaṃvṛtiḥ syādityatrāha sa paścādityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9647: Bca_9.108 sa paścānniyataḥ so 'sti na cennāstyeva saṃvṛtiḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:9648: asmin sati idaṃ bhavati, asyotpādādidamutpadyate iti idaṃpratyayatāmātrameva saṃvṛtiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9649: iti dharmebhyo dharma utpadyamānaḥ paścādbhāvī bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:9650: tataḥ sa paścānniyato dharmaḥ, so 'sti yadi, tadā astyeva saṃvṛtiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9651: na cedyadi sa nāsti, tadā nāstyeva saṃvṛtiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9653: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yadi nāma parinirvṛto buddhyā viṣayīkṛtaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9656: na raktacittenālambitaḥ svayaṃ prahīṇasarvakleśāvaraṇo vītarāgo 'pyavītarāgo bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:9657: tasmāt sarvakalpanāvirahādanyasaṃvṛtyālambito 'pi svayaṃ parinirvṛta evāsau paramārthataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9658: ata eva sarvadharmāḥ sarvakalpanāśūnyatvādanutpannāniruddhasvabhāvatvācca prakṛtiparinirvṛtā ādiśāntā ityucyante /
SA11bsa054_u:9659: tathāpi tathāvidhebhya eva tathāvidhā anye dharmā utpadyante nirudhyante ca /
SA11bsa054_u:9661: tena ca rūpeṇa parikalpavaśāt punarālambyamānāḥ sāṃvṛtāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9663: śūnyebhya eva śūnyā dharmāḥ prabhavanti dharmebhyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9671: yatha muñca pratītya balvajaṃ rajju vyāyāmabalena vartitā /
SA11bsa054_u:9672: ghaṭiyantra sacakra vartate teṣu ekaikaśa nāsti vartanā //
SA11bsa054_u:9676: mudrāt pratimudra dṛśyate mudrasaṃkrānti na copalabhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9677: na ca tatra na caiva sānyato eva saṃskāra anuchedaśāśvatāḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:9679: araṇiṃ yatha cottarāraṇiṃ hastavyāyāma trayebhi saṃgati /
SA11bsa054_u:9680: iti pratyayato 'gni jāyate jātu kṛtārthu laghu nirudhyate //
SA11bsa054_u:9681: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kutayaṃ āgatu kutra yāti vā /
SA11bsa054_u:9682: vidiśo diśi sarvi mārgato nāgati nāsya gatiśca labhyate //
SA11bsa054_u:9683: skandhāyatanāni dhātavaḥ tṛṣṇa avidyā iti karmapratyayā /
SA11bsa054_u:9684: sāmagri tu sattvasucanā sa ca paramārthatu nopalabhyate //
SA11bsa054_u:9693: svapnavat saṃsṛtiḥ proktā tvayā tattvavidāṃ vara //
SA11bsa054_u:9695: tasmāt paramārthata utpādanirodhābhāve 'pi na saṃvṛtisatyavirodha iti sarvaṃ samañjasam //
SA11bsa054_u:9697: tadā na jñānaṃ na ca jñeyaṃ vastutaḥ saṃbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:9698: tat kimiha kena vicāryate iti vicāro 'pi na syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9708: yathāprasiddhaṃ lokavyavahārato niścitamāśritya gṛhītvā vicāro vimarśaḥ sarva ucyate abhidhīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9709: sarva iti na kaścideva vicāro 'pi saṃvṛtimāśritya pratanyate,
SA11bsa054_u:9714: Bca_9.110 vicāritena tu yadā vicāreṇa vicāryate /
SA11bsa054_u:9716: vicāritena tu parīkṣitena punaryadā vicāreṇa vicāryate nirūpyate,
SA11bsa054_u:9719: yo 'sau vicārasya vicāraṇārthaṃ vicāra upādīyate, tasyāpi vicārasya vicāraṇāddhetoḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:9720: vicārye tarhi vicāryamāṇe kathamiyamanavasthā na syādityatrāha vicārite ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9721: Bca_9.111 vicārite vicārye tu vicārasyāsti nāśrayaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9723: vicārye tu parīkṣye punarvastuni vicārite nirṇīte sati vicārasya nirṇayasya punaruttarakālaṃ kartavyasya āśrayo nāsti,
SA11bsa054_u:9726: ata eva nirāśrayatvānnodeti, āśrayābhāvānna punarvicāraḥ pravartate /
SA11bsa054_u:9727: sarvasamāropaniṣedhaṃ vidhāya vastutattvaparijñānāt kṛtakṛtyatvāt pravṛttinivṛttyabhāvāt [Bcp_250] na kkacit sajyate, nāpi virajyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9729: sarvavyavahāranivṛtteḥ sarvatra nirvyāpāratayā praśāntatvāt tadeva nirvāṇamabhidhīyate //
SA11bsa054_u:9730: kalpitaviṣaye 'vaśyameva sarvatra vicāraḥ satyo na tu paramārthata ityāha yasya tvityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9732: yasya punaḥ paramārthasadbhāvavādinaḥ etaddūyaṃ vicāro vicāryaṃ ceti etadubhayamapi satyaṃ paramārthasat,
SA11bsa054_u:9733: sa eva bhāvasvabhāvavādī atyantaduḥsthitaḥ atyantamatiśayena duḥkhena sthito duḥsthitaḥ duṣkaraṇīyatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9735: Bca_9.112 yadi jñānavaśādartho jñānāstitve tu kā gatiḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:9736: yadi jñānavaśāt jñānasya pramāṇasya vaśāt sāmarthyāt arthaḥ prameyaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
SA11bsa054_u:9740: jñānasya pramāṇasya punarastitvaṃ kuto niścitamiti vaktavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:9741: svasaṃvedanasyābhāvāt pramāṇāntarānveṣaṇe anavasthānaṃ syāditi kā gatirāśrayaṇīyā?
SA11bsa054_u:9742: syādetat- syādeva anavasthānam, yadi jñānastitve pramāṇaṃ mṛgyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9743: yāvatā prameyādeva pramāṇavyavasthā, tat kuto 'navasthānaṃ syādityāśaṅkayannāha athetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9744: atha jñeyavaśājjñānaṃ jñeyāstitve tu kā gatiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9746: atha jñeyasya prameyasya vaśāt jñānaṃ vyavasthāpyate, tarhi jñeyāstitve tu kā gatiḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:9748: tadā svayameva jñeyaṃ jñānāstitve vyavasthānibandhanaṃ syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:9749: tacca kutaḥ pramāṇāt siddhamiti pṛcchati- jñeyāstitve punaḥ kā gatiriti /
SA11bsa054_u:9750: prameyasiddhaye jñānāntarānusaraṇe tadapi jñānāntaraṃ kutaḥ siddhamiti vaktavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:9751: tasmādeva jñeyāditi cet, jñeyaṃ kutaḥ siddham?
SA11bsa054_u:9753: syādetat- bhavedetat yadi jñānasya jñeyasya vā siddhaye jñānāntarāpekṣā syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:9757: atha punarevamabhidhīyate- anyonyasya jñānasya jñeyasya parasparasya vaśāt sāmarthyāt jñānajñeyayorapi sattvamastitvaṃ niścīyate jñānavaśājjñeyasya jñeyavaśācca jñānasyeti yāvat /
SA11bsa054_u:9759: dvayorapi jñānajñeyayorabhāvaḥ syāt, ekasyāpi sattvasiddhirna bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:9762: pitā cenna vinā putrātkutaḥ putrasya saṃbhavaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9765: pitā janakaḥ yadi putraṃ vinā putramantareṇa na syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:9768: kutaḥ kasmāt piturabhāvāt putrasya janyasya saṃbhavaḥ janma astu?
SA11bsa054_u:9771: yataḥ putrasya abhāve asattve pitā nāsti na bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:9773: sa ca na putraṃ yāvajjanayati, tāvat pitaiva na bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:9774: yāvacca pitā na bhavati, tāvat putrasya tasmāt saṃbhavo nāsti /
SA11bsa054_u:9775: ataḥ itaretarāśrayaṇādekābhāvādanyatarābhāvaḥ syāditi dvayorapyanayorabhāva iti samudāyārthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9778: yathātra pitāputrodāharaṇe, tathā asattvaṃ tathaiva abhāvaḥ tayordvayorjñānajñeyayoḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9780: jñānaparicchedyatayā ca jñeyamiti yāvat jñānaṃ na sidhyati,
SA11bsa054_u:9782: tāvat paricchedyatayā ca jñeyaṃ na sidhyati /
SA11bsa054_u:9784: syādetat- na brūmaḥ- anyonyavaśāt siddhiranayoḥ api tu jñeyakāryaṃ jñānam,
SA11bsa054_u:9787: Bca_9.115 aṅkuro jāyate bījādvījaṃ tenaiva sūcyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9788: jñeyājjñānena jātena tatsattā kiṃ na gamyate //
SA11bsa054_u:9790: bījaṃ tenaiva bījājjātena aṅkureṇa sūcyate gamyate yathā,
SA11bsa054_u:9791: tathā atra jñeyāt prameyāt jñānena jātena utpannena tatsattā tasya jñeyasya sattā sadbhāvaḥ kiṃ na gamyate,
SA11bsa054_u:9796: jñānāstitvaṃ kuto jñātaṃ jñeyaṃ yattena gamyate //
SA11bsa054_u:9799: kiṃ tarhi anyato jñānādaṅkuravyatiriktāt tadastīti gamyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9800: tathā hi- na yogyatāmātreṇa kāryaṃ kāraṇasya gamakam,
SA11bsa054_u:9804: ataḥ prākpratipannakāryakāraṇabhāvasya punaḥ paścāt kkacid bījāvinābhāvinamaṅkuramupalabdhavataḥ aṅkurādadhyavasāyātmakamanumānamutpadyate,
SA11bsa054_u:9807: jñānāstitvaṃ jñānasya sadbhāvaḥ kuto jñātaṃ kasmāt pratītam?
SA11bsa054_u:9810: yad yasmāt jñeyaṃ tena jñānena jñeyakāryeṇa gamyate avasīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9811: na hi svayamaniścitaṃ liṅgaṃ [Bcp_252] sādhyasya gamakamupapadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9814: kālpanikapakṣe tu yathāprasiddhavyavahāramāśritya śakyate iti niścitam //
SA11bsa054_u:9815: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9816: utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kvacana kecana //
SA11bsa054_u:9818: ityasyārthasya samarthanārthaṃ nāpyahetuta iti turīyakoṭiprasādhanāya tāvat svabhāvavādimatamapākartumāha loka ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9820: tathā hi te svaparasvabhāvasarvahetunirapekṣameva bhāvagrāmavaicitryamutpadyate iti varṇayanti /
SA11bsa054_u:9822: na ca cetano 'pi kaścidanyaḥ karmaṇā tādṛśanirmāṇapravīṇa upalabhyate,
SA11bsa054_u:9825: tasmāt kiṃcitkāraṇamantareṇaiva sarvamidaṃ jagadvaicitryamutpadyate iti teṣāṃ matam, taduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:9846: padmasya rājīvasya nālamādi yeṣāṃ padmadalakesarādīnāṃ te tathoktāḥ, teṣāṃ bhedo nānātvam /
SA11bsa054_u:9848: hetubhedena hetoḥ kāraṇasya bhedena viśeṣeṇa jāyate utpadyate, nānyathā /
SA11bsa054_u:9852: yasmāt pratiniyatakāraṇādeva pratiniyataviśeṣotpattiḥ, tadbhedena tadbhedāditi na ahetumatī //
SA11bsa054_u:9854: nanu bhavedeṣa viśeṣaḥ yadi hetoreva svayamasau viśeṣaḥ siddhaḥ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9855: kiṃ tu tasyaiva kutaḥ sa bhavatīti vaktavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:9859: kiṃkṛtaḥ kena kṛtaḥ kuto yātaḥ hetubhedaścet, hetorbhedo viśeṣaśceducyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9860: pūrvahetuprabhedataḥ pūrvasya prāktanasya tajjanakasya hetoḥ prabhedataḥ prabhedādviśeṣāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9861: tasyāpi tatpūrvasya hetoḥ kuto viśeṣa iti cet,
SA11bsa054_u:9863: iti uttarottarasya viśeṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ pūrvapūrvasya viśeṣādityuttaraṃ vācyam /
SA11bsa054_u:9864: na caivamanavasthānamaniṣṭaṃ kiṃcidāpādayati- anavarāgrasya saṃsārasya pūrvakoṭirna prajñāyate ityabhyupagamāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9865: ata eva phalāviparyayo 'pi na svato bhavatītyāha kasmāccedityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9868_0: pūrvahetuprabhāvataḥ pūrvasya tajjanakasya hetoḥ sāmarthyāt svahetunā sa tādṛśastatsvabhāvo
SA11bsa054_u:9875_0: hetuvyāpāreṇa tat prasādhayataḥ svayameva punaḥ sahetukatvābhyupagamāt vandhyā me
SA11bsa054_u:9875_1: māteti bruvataḥ iva pratijñāyāḥ svavacanena bādhanaṃ syāt ityubhayataḥpāśā rajjuriti
SA11bsa054_u:9876: na heturastīti vadan sahetukaṃ nanu pratijñāṃ svayameva śātayet /
SA11bsa054_u:9877: athāpi hetupraṇayālaso bhavet pratijñayā kevalayāsya kiṃ bhavet //
SA11bsa054_u:9880: evaṃ svabhāvavādinaṃ nirākṛtya caturthaprakāraprasādhanārthameva īśvarakāraṇatāṃ jagataḥ pratyākhyātuṃ tadupakṣepaṃ kurvannāha īśvara ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9882: īśvarakāraṇavādino hi svabhāvavādimataniṣedhamākarṇya viśeṣamabhidhātumardhamavasitaṃ bhārasyeti manyamānāḥ prāhuḥ- sāhāyyameva anuṣṭhitamevaṃ bhavadbhiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9884: kevalamacetanāḥ punaramī jalapaṅkādayo vaicitryāsāmarthyā iti yuktamanenoktam /
SA11bsa054_u:9885_0: tatra astyeva sa bhagavān viśvavaicitryanirmāṇapravīṇaḥ jagadekasūtradhāraḥ sakalajagadādibhūtaḥ
SA11bsa054_u:9886: tena hetunā sahetukaṃ sakalamidaṃ sacarācaraṃ jagaditi kaḥ sacetanaḥ anyathā vaktumutsahate?
SA11bsa054_u:9887: iti naiyāyikādiveśmakathāmabhidhāya pratyācaṣṭe- īśvaro jagato hetuḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9889: sa eva jagato viśvasya hetuḥ sṛṣṭisthitipralayakāraṇam /
SA11bsa054_u:9891: anyathā punaracetanopādānatvāt kathamamī girisaridavanisāgarādaya utpattibhājo bhaveyuḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:9892: cetanāva dadhiṣṭhānāt punarime samutpattumutsahante, tadvayāpāreṇaiva pravartanāt / taduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:9902: naitaducyamānamapi svasamayābhiniveśināṃ jaḍadhiyāṃ prītikaraṃ pramāṇaśūnyaṃ viduṣāṃ saṃtoṣamutpādayati /
SA11bsa054_u:9903: tathā hi- yadyasau kāruṇikaḥ, kimarthaṃ punarimān narakādiduḥkhapīḍitān prāṇinaḥ karoti?
SA11bsa054_u:9904: tathā ca sati kāruṇikatvaṃ tasya śraddhāsamadhigamyameva syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9905: svakṛtāsatkarmaphalopabhogena tatkṣepāpanayane yasya pravṛttiḥ, kathamakāruṇiko nāmeti cet, na /
SA11bsa054_u:9906: tat karma kāruṇikaḥ kimiti kārayati yenāniṣṭaṃ phalamupabhujyate,
SA11bsa054_u:9909: api ca kiṃ tasminnavyāpriyamāṇe tat karmaphalamupabhujyate na vā?
SA11bsa054_u:9918: atha kṛtasya karmaṇo 'vipraṇāśādavaśyaṃ tena tatphalamanubhavitavyamiti tadupabhogāya vyāpriyate iti cet,
SA11bsa054_u:9922: evaṃ hi tadicchāyattavṛttitayā tasyāparipākāt tena svamaiśvaryamupadarśitaṃ tatra bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:9924: mahad bata anena svamaiśvaryamitthaṃ dyotitamanyatra syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9925: tat parakarmaṇāpi samākṛṣṭo nāma nātmani vaśitvamadhigacchati,
SA11bsa054_u:9926: īśvarataḥ karmaṇa eva mahat sāmarthyamevaṃ prakāśitaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9927: tadvaraṃ karmaiva paryupāsyaṃ yatsāmarthyena samākṛṣyamāṇo maheśvaro 'pi sthātumasamarthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9929: namaḥ satkarmabhyo vidhirapi na yebhyaḥ prabhavati //
SA11bsa054_u:9931: atha na kāruṇikaḥ, tadāsau vītarāgaḥ sarāgo vā?
SA11bsa054_u:9933: tadā yadi nāma dayāvirahāt sukhaṃ nopanayati,
SA11bsa054_u:9938: krīḍārthaṃ duḥkhayatīti cet, krīḍārthaṃ vītarāgasya pravṛttiriti cet, niścitamasau na vītarāgaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9939: rāgādimatāmapi tāvajjitendriyāṇāṃ na krīḍārthaṃ dṛśyate pravṛttiḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9941: na rakṣaḥpiśācādimantareṇa anyasya paraduḥkhena krīḍā saṃbhāvyate //
SA11bsa054_u:9942: atha avītarāga iti pakṣaḥ, tadā kathamayamitarajanasādhāraṇaḥ sannīśvaro bhavitumarhati?
SA11bsa054_u:9949: yadi svasthātmā, tadā kimiti janamakāṇḍameva duḥkhayati?
SA11bsa054_u:9950: na hi svasthātmā niraparādhaṃ janaṃ pīḍayan dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9951: atha vimārgagāminameva kṛtāparādhaṃ pīḍayatīti cet, vimārgagāminamapi ayameva kārayati /
SA11bsa054_u:9952: tathābhūtamapi kārayitvā punaḥ pīḍayatīti sa laukikeśvarāṇāmapi jaghanyatayā vṛttimatiśete /
SA11bsa054_u:9955: atha asvasthātmā, tadā asādhu tadārādhane svargāpavargārthināṃ prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9957: tathā hi svargādilipsayā tadārādhanāya pravartante prekṣāvantaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9963: teṣāṃ prabhāvātiśayavikalatvāditi cet, na vai prakṛte 'pi kaṃcit prabhāvātiśayamutpaśyāmaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9965: tadayamabhivicāryamāṇo na kvacidavasānaṃ labhate iti alaṃ durmativiṣyanditeṣu ādareṇeti /
SA11bsa054_u:9968: sukhasya duḥkhasya na ko 'pi dātā paro dadātīti kubuddhireṣā /
SA11bsa054_u:9971: tasmādakartṛkameva idaṃ jagadaśeṣamiti na paridṛṣṭakāraṇādanyaḥ svatantraścetano vā tasya kartā kaścidasti /
SA11bsa054_u:9974: īśvarakāraṇavādinaṃ pṛcchati- vada brūhi ko 'yamīśvaro bhavato 'bhimataḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:9977: na ca anupalabdhānvayavyatirekavyāpārasya kāraṇatā prakalpayituṃ yuktā, atiprasaṅgāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9979: na cānyasya kṣitibījādivyatiriktasya anvayavyatirekānuvidhānaṃ kurvat dṛśyate kāryam /
SA11bsa054_u:9980: tat kathaṃ tasya kāryopayogitvaṃ vyavasthāpyate? yaduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:9984: atha pṛthivyādīni bhūtānyeva īśvaro bhavatviti parābhiprāyamāśaṅkayāha bhūtāni cedityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9985: Bca_9.119 bhūtāni cedbhavatvevaṃ nāmamātre 'pi kiṃ śramaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:9986: yadi bhūtāni pṛthivyādīni īśvara ucyate, tadā abhyupagamyate eva /
SA11bsa054_u:9989: kevalaṃ nāmamātre 'pi kiṃ śramaḥ? nāmaiva kevalamarthabhedaśūnyaṃ nāmamātrakam /
SA11bsa054_u:9991: nāmamātre eva kimiha mahāsamārambheṇa tatprasādhanāya śramaḥ āyāsaḥ kriyate?
SA11bsa054_u:9992: mayā kṣityādaya ucyante, tvayā punastānyeva bhūtāni īśvaraḥ iti nārthataḥ kaścidviśeṣaḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:9994: atha astyeva arthaviśeṣaḥ, tadā naiṣāmīśvaratvaṃ yuktamityāha api tvityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9995: Bca_9.120 api tvaneke 'nityāśca niśceṣṭā na ca devatāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9998: naite kṣityādayo bhavatāmīśvaratvena kalpayituṃ yujyante, tallakṣaṇāyogāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10000: aneke nānāsvabhāvāḥ, anityāśca vinaśvarasvabhāvāḥ, niśceṣṭāḥ, acetanatayā nirvyāpārāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10001: na ca devatāḥ, nāpi ca ārādhyarūpāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10005: [Bcp_257] kṣmādayaḥ kṣmā pṛthivī ādiryeṣāmaptejovāyūnāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10006: na sa īśvaraḥ, sa īśvaraḥ tādṛkkhabhāvo na bhavati, tatṣaṭprakāraviparītatvāt //
SA11bsa054_u:10007: yadi kṣmādayo neśvaraḥ, ākāśaṃ tarhi bhaviṣyatītyāha nākāśamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10010: kutaḥ? aceṣṭatvāt, svabhāvavikalatayā nirvyāpāratvāt, paramate 'pi niṣkriyatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10013: pūrvameva vistareṇa ātmanaḥ pratiṣiddhatvāt niḥsvabhāvaḥ śaśaviṣāṇavadasau /
SA11bsa054_u:10014: athāpi syāt- avitarkyamāhātmyatvādasya nārvāgdarśanairidamitthamiti tatsvarūpaṃ vivecayituṃ śakyamityāha acintyasyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10017: tadā acintyasya ca cintāpathamatikrāntasya īśvarasya kartṛtvaṃ yugapatkāraṇatvamapi acintyamatarkyaṃ kimucyate, kimabhidhīyate?
SA11bsa054_u:10023: bhavatu nāma tasya kāryaṃ cintyam, tathāpi tena kiṃ straṣṭumiṣṭuṃ ca /
SA11bsa054_u:10024: tena īśvareṇa acintyamāhātmyena kiṃ kāryaṃ straṣṭuṃ nirmātumiṣṭamabhipretaṃ ca,
SA11bsa054_u:10028: ātmā tena straṣṭumiṣṭaṃ cenmatam, etat pratiṣedhayati-
SA11bsa054_u:10030: nanu bhoḥ, asāvātmā dhruvo nityo 'bhimato bhavatām /
SA11bsa054_u:10031: tat kathamasau kriyate? anyathā nitya eva sa na syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10033: anyatrāpi na tasya sṛṣṭivyāpāra upalakśyate ityāha kṣmādītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10034: Bca_9.122 kṣmādisvabhāva īśaśca jñānaṃ jñeyādanādi ca //
SA11bsa054_u:10038: so 'pi na tena kriyate, pṛthivyādīnāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ nityatvābhyupagamāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10042: īśvaro 'pi dhruvaḥ iti ātmānamasau na karoti /
SA11bsa054_u:10048: karmaṇaḥ śubhāśubhāt yathāsaṃbhavaṃ sukhaduḥkhe ca bhavataḥ iṣṭāniṣṭavipākaje,
SA11bsa054_u:10049: tatrāpi na tasya vyāpāraḥ / evaṃ sati-
SA11bsa054_u:10051: brūhi kimidānīṃ teneśvareṇa nirmitaṃ racitam, iti na kvacit tasya sāmarthyamupalabhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10052: tat kathamasya jagatkartṛtvamucyate? adhunā sarvatra sādhāraṇaṃ dūṣaṇamāha hetorityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10053: Bca_9.123 hetorādirna cedasti phalasyādiḥ kuto bhavet //
SA11bsa054_u:10054: tathāhi asau nityo vā jagato hetuḥ syādanityo vā? nitya eva tadvādibhirasau parikalpitaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10055: tatra nityatve sati hetoḥ kāraṇasya ādirnāsti, yadi, tadā phalasyādiḥ kuto bhavet?
SA11bsa054_u:10057: nityamupasthite samarthasvabhāve hetau kāryamapi tajjanyamajastrameva jāyeta /
SA11bsa054_u:10058: iti tatsāmarthyapratibaddhaṃ kāryaṃ sadā prāpnoti / tat-
SA11bsa054_u:10060: kasmāt kāraṇāt sadā sarvakālaṃ na kurute?
SA11bsa054_u:10061: na sarvaṃ kāryaṃ janayatīti kathaṃ kasyacit kāryasya kadācit kriyāvirāmaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:10063: anyathāvatāryate- yadi ca neśvaro jagataḥ kartā syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:10066: tataśca hetoḥ kleśakarmādilakṣaṇasya ādiḥ pūrvakoṭiḥ na cedasti,
SA11bsa054_u:10067: phalasya sattvabhājanalokavivartādilakṣaṇasya ādiḥ prathamārambhaḥ kuto bhavet?
SA11bsa054_u:10069: anādau saṃsāre hi sattvānāṃ karmādhipatyena sthitisaṃvartavivartānāṃ pravartanāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10074: pralayakāle 'pi tasyānupahatatayā māhātmyasyābhyupagamāt phalasya tatkṛtasya sargādilakṣaṇasya ādiḥ kuto bhavet?
SA11bsa054_u:10075: nityatayā tatkāraṇasya sadā samarthatvāt sargādikamapi nityameva syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10076: ato nityasamarthe tasmin sargāderādireva na syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10077: tataḥ kathaṃ sargasyādāvapi tadvayāpāro bhavet? api ca /
SA11bsa054_u:10078: yadi asau kartā syāt, tadā nityatvāt-
SA11bsa054_u:10081: tathāhi yadi kadācit sargaṃ karoti, tadā tatkāraṇasvabhāvatayā sadā tameva kuryāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10086: athāpi syāt- yadi nāma asau sadā samarthasvabhāvaḥ, tathāpi kadācit sahakārivaikalyānna karotītyāha-
SA11bsa054_u:10094: na hi nityatayā anādheyātiśayasya kācidapekṣā nāma /
SA11bsa054_u:10096: vyatireke vā viśeṣādeva kāryotpattiḥ, tasya akārakatvaṃ syāt / taduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:10101: tathāpi te nityā vā syuranityā vā?
SA11bsa054_u:10105: anityānāmapi tadāyattodayasaṃnidhīnāṃ kuto vaikalyaṃ nāma, yena sahakārivaikalyānna karotītyucyate?
SA11bsa054_u:10109: tena īśvareṇa akṛtaḥ, yaḥ utpattimāṃstena akṛtaḥ, sa nāstyeva, na vidyate anyo 'paro jagati /
SA11bsa054_u:10110: tena kāraṇena tadāyattavṛttīnāṃ sahakāriṇāṃ sadāsaṃnihitatvādasau nityaḥ kartā kimapekṣatām?
SA11bsa054_u:10112: itthaṃ na kācidapi tasyāpekśāstīti sadā kāryaṃ kurvīta //
SA11bsa054_u:10113: athāpi syāt- samavāyikāraṇam, asamavāyikāraṇam, nimittakāraṇaṃ ceti kāraṇatritayāt kāryamutpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10114: tadasya nimittakāraṇatvāt sāmagrīmapekṣya kāryaṃ kurvato noktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ iti parāśayamāśaṅkayāha apekṣata ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10116: yadi nāma asau sadā sarvakāryāṇi kartuṃ samarthaḥ, tathāpi apekṣate sāmagrīm /
SA11bsa054_u:10117: na hi sāmagrīmantareṇa satyapi samarthe kartari kāryamutpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10118: yathā kila paṭotpādanasamarthe 'pi kvaciddhetau turītantuvemādikamantareṇa na paṭa utpadyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10125: tasyā bhāvābhāvayoḥ kāryasya bhāvābhāvadarśanāt, na tu punarīśvarabhāvābhāvayoriti /
SA11bsa054_u:10127: svarūpaṃ cāsya prāgapi samarthaṃ tadeveti kathaṃ kadācit kriyāvirāmaḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:10128: yadapyuktam- kuvindādivat kadācit karotīti, tadapi na yuktam /
SA11bsa054_u:10131: anyathāpi teṣāmapi pūrvaṃ tatsāmarthyasadbhāve tatkriyāprasaṅgo na nivartate iti sādhyavikalo [Bcp_260] dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10134: sa ca sarvadā saṃnihitasvabhāva iti kathaṃ kadācit sāmagrīvaikalyamapyasya?
SA11bsa054_u:10144: kutaḥ? tadabhāvataḥ, tasyāḥ sāmagryā abhāvataḥ avidyamānatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10145: na ca avidyamānasvabhāve vandhyāsuta iva kiṃcit kartuṃ śakyate nīrūpatvāt / yadvakṣyati-
SA11bsa054_u:10149: tathāpi kiṃ sāmagrībalākṛṣṭaḥ svayamanicchanneva karoti, āhosvidicchan iti vikalpau /
SA11bsa054_u:10154: cenmatam, parāyattaḥ prasajyate, parāyattaḥ paratantraḥ prasajyate āsajyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10156: na ca pāratantryamanubhavataḥ īśvaratvaṃ yuktam, atiprasaṅgāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10159: atha icchan karotīti pakṣaḥ svīkriyate, tadāpi icchāyattaḥ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10163: evaṃ kurvataḥ kāryamabhinirvartayataḥ sataḥ tasya kuta īśatā, kutaḥ eśvaryam?
SA11bsa054_u:10164: etena yaduktaṃ kenacit- buddhimattvādīśvarasya naiṣa doṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10168: tathā hi tā api icchāḥ svasattāmātranibandhanāḥ kiṃ na karotīti sa eva tasyopālambhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10171: kiṃ tāsāṃ viyoge 'pi na karoti atha asahakārivaikalye 'pi kāryākaraṇe sarvadā tadāyattaḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:10172: sahakāriṇyaścet, tathā tadbhāve 'pi sarvakāryaṃ kiṃ na karoti?
SA11bsa054_u:10174: kevalasya aśaktasya na kārakatvamiti cet, tat kimayaṃ pararūpeṇa kārakaḥ? tathā cedakāraka eva /
SA11bsa054_u:10175: na hi svarūpeṇa [Bcp_261] akārakaḥ kārako nāma /
SA11bsa054_u:10176: svarūpamapi asya nijaśaktiśabdavācyaṃ kāryopayogīti cet, alamidānīmāgantukaśaktiṣvapekṣayā /
SA11bsa054_u:10177: samartho 'pyeṣa prakṛtyā sahakāriṇāmasaṃnidhau nava kāraka iti cet,
SA11bsa054_u:10178: mātāpi satī prakṛtyā bandhyā ityetadapi tarhi devānāṃ priyeṇa vaktavyamityāstāṃ tāvat /
SA11bsa054_u:10180: tathā ca sati anyasādhāraṇasvabhāvasya kathamīśatvamiti neśvarakāryaṃ jagadvaicitryamiti siddham //
SA11bsa054_u:10182: tarhi nityaparamāṇupuñjamayaṃ dvayaṇukādikrameṇotthaṃ kṣititaruparvatādikaṃ bhavatvityāha ye 'pītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10184: ye 'pi mīmāṃsakādivādino nityānaṇūn paramāṇunāhuḥ jagadvaicitryakāraṇatvena bruvate,
SA11bsa054_u:10185: te 'pi vādinaḥ pūrvam "aṃśā apyaṇubhedena" [9.87]ityādinā paramāṇuvicārasamaye tatpratiṣedhānnivāritā nirākṛtāḥ ato nityaparamāṇumayamapi nedaṃ jagat //
SA11bsa054_u:10186_0: evamīśvarakāraṇatāṃ ślokārdhena antarāle eva nityaparamāṇusvabhāvatāṃ ca jagato nirasya
SA11bsa054_u:10186_1: tasyaiva turyaprakārasya samarthanāya pradhānapariṇāmarūpatāṃ nirākartuṃ sāṃkhyamatamudbhāvayannāha sāṃkhyā ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10187: Bca_9.127 sāṃkhyāḥ pradhānamicchanti nityaṃ lokasya kāraṇam //
SA11bsa054_u:10188: sāṃkhyāḥ kāpilāḥ pradhānaṃ prakṛtirityaparanāmadheyam icchanti manyante nityaṃ lokasya kāraṇam /
SA11bsa054_u:10189: tacca nityamavinaśvarasvabhāvaṃ lokasya sarvasya carācarasya jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ pariṇāmarūpeṇa hetumicchanti //
SA11bsa054_u:10193: sattvaṃ rajastamaśceti ete trayo guṇā aviṣamaṃ sthitāḥ sāmyāvasthāṃ prāptāḥ pradhānamiti kathyante,
SA11bsa054_u:10201: tadā punaḥ śabdādisargarūpeṇa pariṇatimupajanayati / tadā ayaṃ kramaḥ-
SA11bsa054_u:10208: tasmādahaṃkārādgaṇaśca ṣoḍaśakaḥ, ṣoḍaśaka iti ekādaśendriyāṇi pañca ca tanmātrāṇi /
SA11bsa054_u:10210: pañca buddhīndriyāṇi [Bcp_262] śrotraṃ tvakū cakṣū rasanaṃ ghrāṇaṃ ceti /
SA11bsa054_u:10214: pañcabhyaḥ śabdādibhyaḥ pañca bhūtāni bhavanti pañca bhūtāni ca ākāśavāyutejojalapṛthivyākhyāni /
SA11bsa054_u:10216: mahadahaṃkārau śabdādayaśca pañca kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca /
SA11bsa054_u:10217: ekādaśendriyāṇi ākāśādayaśca pañca kāryameva na kāraṇam /
SA11bsa054_u:10220: ṣoḍaśakastu vikāro na prakṛtirna vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:10223: kathamanyathā tatrāvidyamānaṃ kāryaṃ vaiśvarūpyamutpadyate? tathā coktam-
SA11bsa054_u:10229: evaṃ kila pradhānāt kāryarūpeṇa jagadvivartaḥ pravartate iti kāpilāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10230: tadevaṃ tat sarvamākāśe viracitacitramiva pratibhāsate iti manyamānaḥ siddhāntavādī dūṣayitumāha ekasyeti-
SA11bsa054_u:10232: ekasya sataḥ pradhānasya trisvabhāvatvaṃ sattvarajastamobhedena tryātmakatvamayuktamasaṃgatam /
SA11bsa054_u:10233: tena kāraṇena nāsti tat, na vidyate tat triguṇātmakaṃ pradhānam /
SA11bsa054_u:10236: mā bhūnnāma tadekasvabhāvaṃ triguṇātmakam, guṇāstāvat svarūpataḥ santītyāha evamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10237: Bca_9.129 evaṃ guṇā na vidyante pratyekaṃ te 'pi hi tridhā //
SA11bsa054_u:10238: evameva pradhānavat guṇāḥ sattvarajastamorūpā na vidyante /
SA11bsa054_u:10242: tathā hi sarvaṃ triguṇātmakaṃ bruvatāṃ pratyekaṃ guṇā api svarūpeṇa triguṇātmakāḥ prāpnuvanti /
SA11bsa054_u:10243: tathā tadguṇā api triguṇātmakatayā naikasvabhāvā vidyante //
SA11bsa054_u:10244: yadā caivaṃ vicārayato guṇā na santi,
SA11bsa054_u:10245: tadā tadvivartarūpāḥ śabdādayo 'pi na yujyante ityāha guṇābhāve ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10250: astitvaṃ sadbhāvaḥ atidūrataḥ, sarvathaiva na yujyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10257: yaśca sattvādīnāṃ sukhādirūpatāmupapādayituṃ tatpariṇāmasya rūpādino vyaktasya sukhādyanvayo heturuktaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:10262: vastrādau acitsvabhāve paṭādau sukhāderapi cidātmakasya tādātmyenāsaṃbhavaḥ abhāvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10264: te ca guṇā na hi santi /
SA11bsa054_u:10266: athāpi syāt- na sukhādyātmakatayā parādayaḥ sukhādisvabhāvā ucyante,
SA11bsa054_u:10269: tasya sukhāderheturūpāḥ kāraṇasvabhāvā bhāvā bāhyāḥ paṭādayaścenmatam, nanu bhāvā vicāritāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10270: nāmī paṭādayaḥ avayavirūpāḥ, nāpi paramāṇusvarūpā nāpi triguṇātmakāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10271: evaṃ bhāvā vicāritāḥ nirūpitāḥ yuktitaḥ, pratibhāsamānānāṃ māyāvanniḥsvabhāvatvācca /
SA11bsa054_u:10272: tat ke ime bhāvāḥ sukhādiheturūpā bhaviṣyanti? api ca /
SA11bsa054_u:10273: vyaktasya sukhādisvabhāvatve paṭādaya eva sukhādijanyāḥ syurityāha sukhādyevetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10275: paṭasyāpi sukhādyeva ca / te tava sāṃkhyasya / hetuḥ syāt / vyaktasya sukhādyātmakatvāt / tathāpi-
SA11bsa054_u:10286: paṭādikāryatvāt sukhādyapi na syāditi tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānāt sukhādestatkāryatvam /
SA11bsa054_u:10287: sattvādiguṇātmakatayā yadapi sukhādīnāṃ nityatvamiṣṭam, tadapi na samyagityāha sukhādikānāṃ cetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10294: yadi ca sukhādīnāṃ nityatvaṃ syāt, tadā nityamupalabhyerannityāha satyāmityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10295: satyāmeva sukhavyaktau saṃvittiḥ kiṃ na gṛhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10299: satyāmeva sukhavyaktau, ekadā bhūtāyāṃ sukhavyaktau sukhasya nityatve sati /
SA11bsa054_u:10300: saṃvittiḥ kiṃ na gṛhyate, sukhasya saṃvedanaṃ sarvadā kiṃ na syāt? na ca sarvadā saṃvedanamasti /
SA11bsa054_u:10301: tasmāt kadācidanupalabhyamānaṃ tat tadā nāstīti niścitamiti kathaṃ nityatvam?
SA11bsa054_u:10303: yadā punastadeva śaktirūpatayā layagataṃ bhavati, tadā na doṣa ityāha tadevetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10304: Bca_9.133 tadeva sūkṣmatāṃ yāti sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ ca tatkatham //
SA11bsa054_u:10309: yad yasmāt sthūlaṃ vyaktasvabhāvaṃ sat, sūkṣmaṃ tat katham?
SA11bsa054_u:10311: nitya tayā nānāsvabhāvatā ekasya na yukteti bhāvaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:10312: athāpi syāt- ekadā parasparaviruddhayorekasminnayogaḥ pūrvadharmanivṛttau tu dharmāntarotpatterna doṣa ityāha sthaulyamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10314: sthaulyamāvirbhāvarūpatāṃ tyaktvā parityajya bhavet sūkṣmaṃ tirohitarūpaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10315: evamabhyupagame sati anitye sthaulyasūkṣmate utpādavināśālīḍhatvādadhruve sthaulyasūkṣmate syātām /
SA11bsa054_u:10316: bhavatāṃ nāma anitye, kā kṣatirityāha sarvasyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10322: anyathā kathaṃcit kenacidrūpeṇa avasthānāt pūrvavat punarupalabdheḥ prasaṅgaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10325: yathā ca tayoretau bhavataḥ, tathā anyeṣāmapi viśeṣābhāvāt syātāmiti //
SA11bsa054_u:10327: yadi sthaulyasūkṣmatayorvināśotpattī iṣyete, tadā sukhādīnāmanityatāprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10328: tathā hi tat sthaulyaṃ sukhādbhinnamabhinnaṃ vā syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10329: tatra yadi bhinnam, tadā tasmin nivṛtte 'pi pūrvavat sukhasaṃvedanaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10332: na ca satyapi saṃbandhe akāraṇasya nivṛttau anyasya nivṛttiryujyate, gonivṛttāviva tatsvāminaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10333: nāpi sukhasya tat kāraṇam, paṭādereva sukhotpatteḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10338: yadi sthaulyaṃ sukhādanyat bhinnaṃ na bhavati, tadā syāt sukhameva tat / tadā-
SA11bsa054_u:10340: tatsvabhāvatayā sthaulyasya nivṛttau sukhasya vinivṛtteḥ sukhasya anityatā vinaśvaratā sphuṭaṃ niścitam //
SA11bsa054_u:10341: syādetat- yadi sarvathā vināśaḥ syāt, tadā sukhasya punarutpattirna syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10344: yat sarvathā kāraṇātmani avidyamānaṃ tannotpadyate, yathā gaganāmbhoruham /
SA11bsa054_u:10345: tathā ca anyadapi yadi syāt, tadā notpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10348: abhāvāt, iti cenmatam, evaṃ yadi saṃmatam, tadā naitadvaktavyamityāha vyaktasyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10351: anabhilāṣiṇo 'pi te tava sadutpattivādinaḥ sthitā āpannā /
SA11bsa054_u:10352: anyathā prāgapi tasya sadbhāve paścādvat pūrvamapi tadupalabdhiprasaṅgaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10353: yathā vyaktasyāsata utpattiḥ, tathā yadi anyasyāpi syāt, tadā na virudhyate kiṃcit //
SA11bsa054_u:10355: satkāryavādinaḥ kāraṇāvasthāyāṃ kāryasadbhāvāt idamapi dūṣaṇamaparamāśaṅkayate ityāha annāda ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10357: annamattītyannādaḥ annabhakṣakaḥ amedhyabhakṣaḥ syāt aśucibhoktā bhavet / katham?
SA11bsa054_u:10363: kiṃ ca idamapi satkāryavādinaḥ prasaṅgāntaramāsañjayannāha paṭārgheṇetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10366: karpāsabīje kāraṇe bhaviṣyataḥ paṭasya kāryasya sadbhāvāt paṭasyārgheṇa mūlyena karpāsabījaṃ krītvā gṛhītvā nivasyatāṃ paridhīyatām //
SA11bsa054_u:10367: athāpi syāt- yadi nāma paramārthataḥ kāraṇe kāryamasti,
SA11bsa054_u:10368: tathāpi nāyaṃ saṃvṛtyavidyātimiropahatalocanaḥ sāṃvyavahāriko lokaḥ paśyatītyāśaṅkayannāha mohādityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10371: mohādajñānāt sadapi vastutattvaṃ nekṣate na paśyati lokaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10374: yadi nāma na loko 'paśyaṃstathā vyavahāraṃ karoti, tattvajñasya tu yujyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10376: yataḥ tattvajñasyāpi kāraṇe kāryamastīti paramārthavedino 'pi sāṃkhyasya sā sthitiḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:10378: te 'pi dṛśyante annabhakṣaṇādiṣu pravartamānāḥ karpāsabījaṃ paṭārthinaḥ pariharantaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:10384: tathāhi- kāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāraṇe astīti niścayaḥ ubhayorapi tattvajñasya lokasya ca sādhāraṇaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10385: ato lokaḥ kasmāddhetorna paśyati? tatra lokasyādarśanakāraṇaṃ vaktavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:10396: evaṃ ca pariniṣṭhitaḥ kāpilaḥ siddhāntavādino 'pi sādhāraṇadūṣaṇamāsañjayannāha pramāṇamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10398: yadi pramāṇamapi paramārthataḥ pramāṇaṃ na bhavatīti bhavatāṃ pakṣaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:10400: pramāṇasyāprāmāṇye tatpramitaṃ tena pramāṇena paricchinnaṃ mṛṣā alīkaṃ prāpnoti / kimataḥ syāt?
SA11bsa054_u:10403: tadā yeyaṃ bhāvānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tattvataḥ paramārthataḥ śūnyatā sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā tasmāt pramāṇānniścitā,
SA11bsa054_u:10405: sarvapramāṇopadarśitasya mṛṣārthatvāt sāpi sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā tadvicārakapramāṇopadarśitaiva iti samāno nyāyaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:10409: kalpanākalpitaṃ samāropitaṃ bhāvamaspṛṣṭvā kalpanābuddhayā agṛhītvā tadabhāvo na gṛhyate nālambyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10410: tathāhi ghaṭamāropitarūpeṇa parikalpya tatsaṃbandhitayā ghaṭābhāvaṃ pratipadyate lokaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10411: ghaṭasya vicāreṇa lokaprasiddhenaiva yadā na kiṃcit svarūpamavatiṣṭhate,
SA11bsa054_u:10412: tadā tadabhāvaḥ tadviparyayarūpaḥ sutarāṃ na kaścit /
SA11bsa054_u:10414: Bca_9.140 tasmādbhāvo mṛṣā yo hi tasyābhāvaḥ sphuṭaṃ mṛṣā //
SA11bsa054_u:10418: tasya niḥsvabhāvasya bhāvasya abhāvo virahaḥ sphuṭaṃ niścitaṃ mṛṣā asatyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10420: evaṃ ca bhāvābhāvayoḥ parikalpitarūpatve sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvataiva avatiṣṭhate //
SA11bsa054_u:10421: punaridameva upasaṃhāravyājena vispaṣṭayannāha tasmāt svapne ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10422: tasmātsvapne sute naṣṭe sa nāstīti vikalpanā /
SA11bsa054_u:10424: tasmāt svapne middhākrāntacittāvasthāyāmutpannavinaṣṭe sute putre sati sa putro nāstīti vikalpanā tadabhāvavikalpaḥ / kiṃ karoti?
SA11bsa054_u:10426: Bca_9.141 tasya sutasya bhāvaḥ tasyāstitvaṃ tasya kalpanā sattvasamāropaḥ tasyotpādaḥ unmajjanaṃ taṃ ni[vi?]badhnāti /
SA11bsa054_u:10427: niṣedhayati- tathaiva tarhi seti cenna mṛṣā ca sā //
SA11bsa054_u:10428: sā kalpanā tadbhāvakalpanāṃ vibadhnāti api mṛṣā /
SA11bsa054_u:10430: athavā satyābhimate eva sute svapne naṣṭe sarvametadyojanīyam /
SA11bsa054_u:10432: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yathā svapnopalabdhasya vastuno 'nutpannāniruddhasyāpi kalpanopadarśitau bhāvābhāvau na paramārthasantau,
SA11bsa054_u:10434: na ca sā kalpanā asatyārthaviṣayatayā apramāṇam,
SA11bsa054_u:10437: iti tasyā aprāmāṇye 'pi na sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā vighaṭate /
SA11bsa054_u:10444: evamahetubhūtasvabhāveśvarapradhānakartṛtvaṃ jagato nirākṛtya nāpyahetutaḥ ityasyārthaṃ prasādhya upasaṃharannāha tasmādevamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10449: svabhāvāderahetuto 'kāraṇājjātaṃ kiṃcit kāryaṃ nāsti na vidyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10453: nanu yadi nāma svabhāveśvarapradhānāderahetuto na kiṃcidasti,
SA11bsa054_u:10455: tat kathaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatā setsyatīti parāśayamāśaṅkaya na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyām iti koṭitrayaṃ samarthayannāha na ca vyastetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10456: Bca_9.142 na ca vyastasamasteṣu pratyayeṣu vyavasthitam //
SA11bsa054_u:10459: tatra na ca vyasteṣu, ekaikaśaḥ svataḥ parataśceti /
SA11bsa054_u:10463: tatra na tāvat svataḥ svabhāvādbhāvā utpadyante /
SA11bsa054_u:10464: utpādāt pūrvaṃ tasya svabhāvasyāvidyamānatvāt kuta utpadyantām?
SA11bsa054_u:10465: utpanne ca tasmin satyapi svarūpe tasyāpi niṣpannatvāt kimutpadyantām? api ca /
SA11bsa054_u:10466: svata eva janmani jātasyaiva punarjanma syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10469: jātasya punarjanmani bījadīnāmeva āsaṃsāraṃ pravṛtteḥ nāṅkurādayaḥ kadācidutpattumavasaraṃ labheran /
SA11bsa054_u:10470: na ca etadabhyupagacchato 'pi lokata eva bādhāmanubhavat siddhipathamupayāti,
SA11bsa054_u:10473: svasvabhāvajanyatve ca kasyacidutpattireva na syāt, itaretarāśrayatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10474: tathā hi yāvat svabhāvo na bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:10480: parato hi janmani iṣyamāṇe śālibījādapi kodravāṅkurasyotpattiprasaṅgaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10481: śālikodravayorapi ca kodravāṅkurāpekṣayā paratvamaviśiṣṭam, sarvasya vā janma sarvato bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:10484: tathāpi kāryakāraṇayoranyonyajanyajanakabhāvasya niyāmakatvāt na sarvasyotpattiriti cet, na /
SA11bsa054_u:10485: anutpanne hi kārye kasmin punarasya śaktiriti vaktavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:10487: ata eva ekasaṃtatipratiniyamo 'pi na yuktaḥ, kāryakāraṇamantareṇa saṃtaterabhāvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10491: iti na kiṃcit kenacidekasaṃtatipatitaṃ sadṛśaṃ vā janyajanakabhāvaniyataṃ vā asti,
SA11bsa054_u:10498: na hi ekenāndhenādṛṣṭamārgo bahubhirapi draṣṭuṃ śakyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10499: pratyekaṃ vā sikatāstailadānāsamarthā militā api tatsamarthā bhavanti /
SA11bsa054_u:10501: iti svaparobhayajanitamahetujanitaṃ vā tattvato na kiṃcidasti /
SA11bsa054_u:10502: tasmāt paramārthato 'nutpannāniruddhasvabhāvaṃ māyāmarīcipratibimbapratiśrutkāsamaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ svabhāvaśūnyameva sarvaṃ viśvamābhāsate /
SA11bsa054_u:10506_0: ihoktaṃ bhagavatā- ya imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ satatasamitaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvadaviparītamajīvamajātamabhūtamakṛtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanālambanaṃ
SA11bsa054_u:10508: yastu evaṃ satatasamitaṃ nirjīvam- ityādi pūrvavat yāvat- avyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati so 'nuttaradharmaśarīraṃ buddhaṃ paśyati /
SA11bsa054_u:10510: pratītyasamutpāda iti kasmāducyate? sahetukaḥ sapratyayo nāhetuko nāpratyaya ityucyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10512: atha ca punarayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmutpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10524: asati bīje 'ṅkuro na bhavati, yāvadasati puṣpe phalaṃ na bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:10528: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ bījenābhinirvartita iti /
SA11bsa054_u:10529: evaṃ yāvat puṣpasya naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ phalamabhinirvartayāmīti,
SA11bsa054_u:10532: evaṃ yāvat puṣpe sati phalasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10534: kathaṃ bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ? ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10536: yadidaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśaṛtusamavāyāt bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10546: tadā sarveṣāṃ [Bcp_270] samavāyāt bīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:10547: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ bījasya saṃdhāraṇākṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA11bsa054_u:10548: evaṃ yāvadṛtorapi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ bījasya pariṇāmanākṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA11bsa054_u:10549: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanita iti /
SA11bsa054_u:10550: atha punaḥ satsu eteṣu bīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:10551: sa cāyamaṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvaranirmito na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10556: na śāśvatato nocchedato na saṃkrāntitaḥ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ tatsadṛśānuprabandhataśceti /
SA11bsa054_u:10557: kathaṃ na śāśvatat iti? yasmādanyo 'ṅkuro 'nyadvījam, na ca yadeva bījaṃ sa evāṅkuraḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10568: kathaṃ na saṃkrāntitaḥ? visadṛśo bījādaṅkura iti /
SA11bsa054_u:10573: kathaṃ tatsadṛśānuprabandhataḥ? yādṛśaṃ bījamupyate tādṛśaṃ phalamabhinirvartayatīti /
SA11bsa054_u:10575: evaṃ bāhyaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇairdraṣṭavyaḥ // iti /
SA11bsa054_u:10583: pratītyasamutpādo 'pi yathāvadevaṃ saṃgacchate iti traikālyavādimatamāśaṅkayāha anyata ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10584: anyato nāpi cāyātaṃ na tiṣṭhati na gacchati /
SA11bsa054_u:10593: nānityaṃ nāmāsti, sa ca dharmo na ca nityaḥ iti kathametat setsyati?
SA11bsa054_u:10594: atha pūrvāparakālayoḥ kāritraśūnyatayā dharmasya adhvasu viśeṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10595: tathā hi yadā asaṃprāptakāritraḥ kṛtyaṃ na karoti,
SA11bsa054_u:10598: yadā tu kṛtyānnivṛttaḥ tadā atīta iti viśeṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10600: tenaivātmanā tasyaiva [Bcp_271] tadāpi sadbhāvāt kāritramapi kathaṃ na syāditi vaktavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:10603: kāritraṃ vā kathamatītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannaṃ ca ucyate?
SA11bsa054_u:10605: pūrvatra anavasthānam, pāścātye ca dharmasyāpi svayamatītatvādivyavasthāyāṃ na kiṃcit kṣīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10607: yathā vartamānaṃ dravyato 'sti, tathā atītamanāgataṃ cāsti, tadā naivam /
SA11bsa054_u:10615: svabhāvaḥ sarvadā nāsti bhāvo nityaśca neṣyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10623: atītaṃ tu yadabhūtapūrvamutpadya vinaṣṭam, anāgataṃ yat sati hetau bhaviṣyati /
SA11bsa054_u:10624: evaṃ hi hetvādyastītyucyate, astiśabdasya nipātatvāt kālatrayavṛttitvam /
SA11bsa054_u:10626: cakṣurbhikṣava utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchati, nirudhyamānaṃ na kvacit saṃnicayaṃ gacchati /
SA11bsa054_u:10627: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ cakṣurabhūtvā bhavati, bhūtvā ca prativigacchatīti //
SA11bsa054_u:10628: yadi ca anāgataṃ cakṣuḥ syāt, noktaṃ syādabhūtvā bhavatīti /
SA11bsa054_u:10633: pratibhāsamānasya ca pratyutpannasya na rūpaṃ kiṃcidvicāreṇāvatiṣṭhate, tadā-
SA11bsa054_u:10634: Bca_9.143 māyātaḥ ko viśeṣo 'sya yanmūḍhaiḥ satyataḥ kṛtam //
SA11bsa054_u:10635: māyātaḥ aindrajālikanirmitahastyādirūpāyā api niḥsvabhāvatayā viśeṣo naiva kaścit asya hetupratyayopajanitasya vasturūpasya paridṛśyamānasya //
SA11bsa054_u:10636: kathaṃ na viśeṣaḥ? punaridameva vyaktīkurvannāha māyayetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10637: Bca_9.144 māyayā nirmitaṃ yacca hetubhiryacca nirmitam /
SA11bsa054_u:10638: āyāti tatkutaḥ kutra yāti ceti nirūpyatām //
SA11bsa054_u:10641: tayā nirmitam, yacca vasturūpaṃ māyāhetunā māyāsvabhāvena yadviracitamiti yāvat /
SA11bsa054_u:10645: tanmāyānimirtaṃ hetunirmitaṃ vā vasturūpaṃ [Bcp_272] kutaḥ kasmāt?
SA11bsa054_u:10646: kutra yāti ca, vinaṣṭaṃ sat kva punaretad gacchati?
SA11bsa054_u:10648: yadi tasya kutaścidāgacchati kvacid gacchati vā upalabhyate //
SA11bsa054_u:10650: yadi hetupratyayasāmarthyopajanitaṃ vasturūpam, tadā kathamiva alīkaṃ syāt?
SA11bsa054_u:10661: evaṃbhūte vasturūpe kṛtrime parāyattavṛttitayā asvābhāvike satyatā amṛṣārthatā kutaḥ? naiva yujyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10663: hetutaḥ saṃbhavo yeṣāṃ tadabhāvānna santi ye /
SA11bsa054_u:10664: kathaṃ nāma na te spaṣṭaṃ pratibimbasamā matāḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:10667: na ca hetupratyayānāṃ sāmarthyaṃ kvacidapi paramārthataḥ saṃbhavati //
SA11bsa054_u:10668: tathāhi- svaparobhayātmakairhetubhirvidyamāno vā bhāvaḥ kriyeta, avidyamāno vā, ubhayasvabhāvo vā?
SA11bsa054_u:10669: tatra na vidyamānaḥ kriyate ityāha vidyamānasyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10671: vidyamānasya kāraṇavyāpārāt prāgeva satsvabhāvasya hetunā kāraṇena kiṃ prayojanam?
SA11bsa054_u:10678: tadāpi na hetunā kimapi prayojanamasti, tatrāpyasatsvabhāvatvāt hetuvyāpārābhāvāt //
SA11bsa054_u:10679: syādetat- yadi nāma vidyamānasya niṣpannatvāt kartavyābhāvāt na hetunā kimapi prayojanam,
SA11bsa054_u:10680: avidyamānasya tu kiṃ na bhavatītyāha nābhāvasyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10689: mā bhavatu vikāraḥ, bhāvasvabhāvatā kevalamasyāstu cedatrāha tadavastha iti-
SA11bsa054_u:10696: ko vā tarhi abhāvādanyaḥ aparaḥ bhāvatām,
SA11bsa054_u:10698: nānyaḥ kaścit pratīyate, kāraṇasya kāryasvabhāvatāyāḥ pūrvameva pratiṣiddhatvāt //
SA11bsa054_u:10700: kiṃ tarhi prāgabhāvasya bhāvavirodhinaḥ sadbhāvāttadā bhāvo na bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:10703: nābhāvakāle abhāvasattāsamaye na bhāvaścet, yadi bhāvo na bhavati, kadā bhāvo bhaviṣyati?
SA11bsa054_u:10707: tenaivotpadyamānena bhāvena abhāvasya vināśo bhaviṣyatīti cedāha-
SA11bsa054_u:10709: yāvadasau bhāvo na jāyate, tāvadabhāvasya vināśo nāstyeva /
SA11bsa054_u:10711: tasmāt na ajātena anutpannena bhāvena so 'bhāvaḥ prāgabhāvarūpaḥ apagamiṣyati nivartayiṣyate //
SA11bsa054_u:10712: athāpi syāt- mā apagacchatu nāma abhāvaḥ, tasminnanapagate eva bhāva utpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10713: utpanne ca bhāve bhāvābhāvayoḥ parasparaparihārāt paścādabhāvaḥ svayameva apagamiṣyatītyāha na cetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10715: bhavatyeva kramaḥ, yadi pūrvaṃ bhāva eva bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:10718: na caiva anapagate anivṛtte abhāve bhāvasyāvasaraḥ avakāśaḥ, tasya saṃbhavaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10726: na ca kāraṇena tadabhāvasya virodhaḥ, kāraṇakāle 'pi tatprāgabhāvasya bhāvāt sattāvasthānāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10727: tasmādbhāvātmani abhāvātmani vā kārye na kāraṇasya vyāpāro yujyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10728: ubhayānubhayapakṣe ca pratyekapakṣaniṣedhādeva kāraṇavyāpārasya niṣedhaḥ kṛto bhavatīti draṣṭavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:10732: na sannutpadyate bhāvo nāpyasan sadasanna ca /
SA11bsa054_u:10733: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ jāyate katham //
SA11bsa054_u:10735: evaṃ tāvadbhāvasyotpattiḥ paramārthato na kathaṃcidapi saṃgacchate /
SA11bsa054_u:10736: nāpi kathaṃcidutpannasya satsvabhāvasya nivṛttiryujyate ityāha bhāvaścetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10739: yathā abhāvo bhāvatāṃ naiti, tathā bhāvaśca abhāvatāṃ naiti, gacchati /
SA11bsa054_u:10742: tadā ca ekasyaiva vastunaḥ dvayoḥ svabhāvayoḥ prasaṅgaḥ syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:10744: na ca bhāvatāṃ parityajya abhāvarūpatāṃ yātīti vaktumucitam /
SA11bsa054_u:10745: tadā ca bhāvasyaivābhāvāt ko 'bhāvarūpatāṃ yātīti na vidmaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10746: na ca satsvabhāvasya pāramārthikatve nivṛttiryuktā, pāramārthikatvasya abhāvaprasaṅgāt //
SA11bsa054_u:10747: itthaṃ bhāvasyotpādavināśayoḥ paramārthato 'bhāvaṃ prasādhya upasaṃharannāha evamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10748: evaṃ na ca nirodho 'sti na ca bhāvo 'sti sarvadā /
SA11bsa054_u:10751: yasmānna nirodho 'sti, na vināśo 'sti, [na ca bhāvo 'sti,] na vastusattvamasti /
SA11bsa054_u:10754: "utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasamatā dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā dharmadhātuḥ tathatā avitathatā" /
SA11bsa054_u:10761: idaṃ niḥsvabhāvatāsamānādhikaraṇaṃ jagadviścaṃ sattvabhājanalokasaṃjñitaṃ sacarācaraṃ vā /
SA11bsa054_u:10766: sā ca śūnyatā notpadyate na nirudhyate āha- yadi evaṃ sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā uktā bhagavatā,
SA11bsa054_u:10771: āha- yadetaduktaṃ bhagavatā saṃskṛtā dharmā utpadyante nirudhyante ca ityasya tathāgatabhāṣitasya ko 'bhiprāyaḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:10773: tatra tathāgato mahākārūṇiko lokasya trāsapadaparihārārthaṃ vyavahāravaśāduktavān utpadyante nirudhyante ca /
SA11bsa054_u:10774: na cātra kasyaciddharmasya utpādo na nirodhaḥ // iti //
SA11bsa054_u:10777: iti jagato niḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ tadantargatānāṃ narakādigatīnāmapi niḥsvabhāvataivetyupadarśayannāha svapnetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10779: svapnena upamā tulyaṃ yāsāṃ tāḥ tathoktāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10783: tathā anadhigataparamārthatattvasya narakādiṣu veditavyam, na tu tattvataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10786: sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatayā vicāre vimarśe sati yasmāt kadalīsamāḥ kadalīvanniḥsārāḥ gatayaḥ, tasmādityarthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10790: yataśca anutpannāniruddhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ, ata āha nirvṛtetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10791: Bca_9.151 nirvṛtānirvṛtānāṃ na viśeṣo nāsti vastutaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:10794: teṣāmubhayeṣāmapi viśeṣo bhedo nāsti, na saṃbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:10795: kutaḥ? vastutaḥ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatayā prakṛtiparinirvṛtatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10796: saṃvṛtyā punarasti eva viśeṣaḥ, ityanekadhā pratipāditam / ata evāha-
SA11bsa054_u:10798: ātmanaśca pareṣāṃ ca samatā tena te matā //
SA11bsa054_u:10800: iti paramārthatattvāparijñānānmithyābhiniveśādāropitajagajjālamupakalpya ātmanaiva ātmānamākulayati bālajanaḥ ityupadarśayannāha evamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10801: Bca_9.152 evaṃ śūnyeṣu dharmeṣu kiṃ labdhaṃ kiṃ hṛtaṃ bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:10802: satkṛtaḥ paribhūto vā kena kaḥ saṃbhaviṣyati //
SA11bsa054_u:10803: Bca_9.153 kutaḥ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā kiṃ priyaṃ vā kimapriyam /
SA11bsa054_u:10804: kā tṛṣṇā kutra sā tṛṣṇā mṛgyamāṇā svabhāvataḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:10805: Bca_9.154 vicāre jīvalokaḥ kaḥ ko nāmātra mariṣyati /
SA11bsa054_u:10806: ko bhaviṣyati ko bhūtaḥ ko bandhuḥ kasya kaḥ suhṛt //
SA11bsa054_u:10807: evaṃ pratipāditanyāyena śūnyeṣu niḥsvabhāveṣu dharmeṣu kiṃ labdham,
SA11bsa054_u:10809: kiṃ hṛtam, kimapahṛtaṃ kena kasyacit bhavet, yallābhāpahāreṇa prakupyanti?
SA11bsa054_u:10810: [Bcp_276] satkṛtaḥ pūjitaḥ, paribhūtaḥ apakṛto vā kena kaḥ saṃbhaviṣyati?
SA11bsa054_u:10812: kutaḥ sukhahetorabhāvāt sukhaṃ vā, kuto duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhahetorabhāvāt?
SA11bsa054_u:10815: kiṃ priyaṃ vā kiṃ vallabhaṃ vā? priyarūpatāyāḥ kalpitatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10819: kā tṛṣṇā yayā lābhādyarthaṃ tṛṣyati janaḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:10820: kutra sā tṛṣṇā, kva punarāsaṅgasthāne vastuni tṛṣṇā?
SA11bsa054_u:10822: tadviṣayasyābhāvāt nirviṣayatayā tasyā apyabhāvaḥ, yadvaśāt tattat karma samuccīyate //
SA11bsa054_u:10823: vicāre paramārthasvarūpanirūpaṇe sati jīvalokaḥ sattvalokaḥ kaḥ? naiva kaścit /
SA11bsa054_u:10825: jīvalokasya vicāreṇa asatsvabhāvatvāt ko nāmātra jīvaloke mariṣyati,
SA11bsa054_u:10830: ko bandhuḥ, kaḥ svajanaḥ? kasya kaḥ suhṛt, kiṃ mitraṃ kasya? atreti sarvatra yojanīyam /
SA11bsa054_u:10837: parigṛhṇantu avidyamānameva tu svarūpamāropya madvidhā iti granthakāraḥ ātmānameva nidarśanaṃ karoti /
SA11bsa054_u:10841: kaiḥ? kalahotsavahetubhiḥ kalahahetubhiḥ vivādahetubhiḥ, utsavahetubhirānandahetubhiḥ yathāyogam /
SA11bsa054_u:10845: tacca bhagavatā śūnyataḥ sudṛṣṭaṃ suviditaṃ susākṣātkṛtam /
SA11bsa054_u:10851: yāvat na lābho nālābho na duḥkhaṃ na sukhaṃ na yaśo nāyaśaḥ na rūpaṃ nārūpamityādi /
SA11bsa054_u:10852: tatra jinena janasya kṛtena saṃvṛti deśita lokahitāya /
SA11bsa054_u:10855: saṃvṛti prajñapayī narasiṃhaḥ ṣaṅgatayo bhaṇi sattvagaṇānām /
SA11bsa054_u:10856: narakagatīśca tathaiva ca pretān āsurakāya narāṃśca marūṃśca //
SA11bsa054_u:10884: vyathā yeṣvapāyeṣu te tathoktāḥ, teṣu ca /
SA11bsa054_u:10887: Bca_9.157 āgatyāgatya sugatiṃ bhūtvā bhūtvā sukhocitāḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:10889: katham? āgatyāgatya sugatim, śobhanāṃ devamanuṣyagatiṃ prāpya prāpya //
SA11bsa054_u:10893: bhave saṃsāre kāmarūpārūpyasvabhāve bahuprapātaśca bahutara upaghātaśca /
SA11bsa054_u:10895: tatra ca bhave prapāte vā atattvamīdṛśaṃ vyāmohavijṛmbhitametādṛśaṃ sarvajanasādhāraṇaṃ yathāvidhaṃ pratipāditaṃ paridṛśyamānaṃ vā /
SA11bsa054_u:10897: tatra evaṃvidhe atattve sati [Bcp_278] anyonyavirodhaḥ parasparavipratipattiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10904: anantā anavadhikālavipākatayā aparyantā vā duḥkhānāmativipulatayā mahāyānamanadhigamya nistarītumaśakyatvāt, sāgarāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10905: tathāpi kathaṃcit mahatā vīryeṇa kuśalapakṣopacayāt bhūyasā kālena sugatiṃ prāpya kṣapayituṃ śakyante ityata āha tatraivamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10910: tatra tathārūpe samāveśe evaṃ paridṛśyamānarūpā alpabalatā /
SA11bsa054_u:10916: ārogyasya ārogyāya vārogopaśamāya vyāpāraiḥ viśeṣeṇa kaṭutiktabhaiṣajyakaṣāyapānādibhiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10917: kuśalopārjanamantareṇa vṛthā caiva āyurvahatyāśu iti vakṣyamāṇena saṃbandhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10918: tathā kṣutklamaśramaiḥ, kṣut bubhukṣā, klamo glāniḥ, śramo mārgakhedādi, taiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10922: tathā bālasaṃsargairniṣphalaiḥ, tathā bālānāṃ pṛthagjanānāṃ saṃsargaiḥ saṃparkaiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10926: vṛthaiva niṣphalameva kuśalapakṣopacayarahitatvāt āyurvahati yāti āśu śīghram,
SA11bsa054_u:10938: tatrāpi evamavasthāṃ gate 'pi abhyastavikṣepaḥ pariśīlitamauddhatyaṃ tasya nivāraṇaṃ nivartanaṃ tasya gatiranupraveśaḥ kutaḥ? naivāsti /
SA11bsa054_u:10939: tatrāpi evamanarthaparaṃparāyāṃ sthitānāṃ kathaṃcit kuśalapakṣaṃ samīkṣya māro yatate mahāpāyaprapātane,
SA11bsa054_u:10940: kleśamāro devaputramāro vā yatate udyacchate [Bcp_279] mahāpāyaprapātane prapātananimittam /
SA11bsa054_u:10942: evamapi kadācit satyaratnādiṣu abhisaṃpratyayavaśāt kathaṃcit kalyāṇamupajāyate ityāha tatrāsanmārgetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10946: tatra evaṃ daśāṃ prāpnoti- samyagdṛṣṭivipakṣasya asanmārgasya cārvākamīmāṃsakādiparidīpitasya bāhulyāt bhūyastvāt vicikitsā sanmārge vimatiśca durjayā,
SA11bsa054_u:10955: kathaṃcit buddhotpādasaṃbhave 'pi kleśaughaḥ [jātijarāmaraṇā] dīnāmoghaḥ avicchinnaḥ pravāhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10960: duḥkhasya kaṣṭasya paraṃparā, ekasmādduḥkhādvinirgame 'pi aparasmin duḥkhe prapatanāt //
SA11bsa054_u:10961: sāṃpratamevaṃ sattvān suduḥkhitān samīkṣya karuṇāmreḍitahṛdayaḥ paraduḥkhaduḥkhī śāstrakāraḥ sattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ śocayannāha aho bateti-
SA11bsa054_u:10966: ke punaramī sattvāḥ śocanīyā ityāha ye ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10968: ye sattvā avidyāndhīkṛtajñānalocanāḥ nekṣante na paśyanti svadauḥsthityaṃ svasya ātmano duḥkhāvasthitatvam /
SA11bsa054_u:10972: Bca_9.165 snātvā snātvā yathā kaścidviśedvahniṃ muhurmuhuḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10974: snātvā snātvā jalāvagāhanaṃ kṛtvā kṛtvā yathā kaścidupahatabuddhiḥ śītārtaḥ sukhābhilāṣī /
SA11bsa054_u:10981: aho bata atibahulatarājñānāndhakārākramaṇamamīṣāṃ yadātmagatamapi pramādaṃ na paśyantītyāha ajaretyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10984: na vidyate jarā jīrṇatā yeṣāṃ te ajarāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10986: teṣāmajarāṇāmamarāṇāmiva līlā viceṣṭitaṃ yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10987: teṣāmevamanayā līlayā viharatāṃ niścitaṃ vicaratāṃ satām /
SA11bsa054_u:10991: kathamāyāsyanti? kṛtvā maraṇamagrataḥ, maraṇamapratīkāraparihāraṃ mṛtyumagrataḥ purataḥ kṛtvā /
SA11bsa054_u:10993: tadyathā mahārāja catasṛbhyo digbhyaścatvāraḥ parvatā āgaccheyuḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:11001: tebhyo na sukaraṃ javena vā palāyitum, balena vā dravyamantrauṣadhairvā nivartayitum /
SA11bsa054_u:11003: yeṣāṃ na sukaraṃ javena vā palāyitum,
SA11bsa054_u:11011: tadyathā mahārāja siṃho mṛgarājo rūpasaṃpanno javasaṃpannaḥ sujātanakhadaṃṣṭrākarālo mṛgagaṇamanupraviśya mṛgaṃ gṛhītvā yathākāmakaraṇīyaṃ karoti /
SA11bsa054_u:11012: sa ca mṛgarājo 'tibalaṃ vyālamukhamāsādya vivaśo bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:11013_0: evameva mahārāja viddhasya mṛtyuśalyena apagatamadasya atrāṇasya apratiśaraṇasya
SA11bsa054_u:11013_1: aparāyaṇasya marmasu cchidyamāneṣu māṃsaśoṇite pariśuṣyamāṇe parituṣitavihvalavadanasya
SA11bsa054_u:11013_5: imaṃ lokaṃ jahataḥ paralokamākramataḥ mahāpathaṃ vrajataḥ mahākāntāraṃ praviśataḥ
SA11bsa054_u:11013_7: karmavāyunā nīyamānasya nimittīkṛtāṃ diśaṃ vrajato nānyat trāṇaṃ nānyat śaraṇaṃ nānyat
SA11bsa054_u:11014: dharmo hi mahārāja tasmin samaye trāṇaṃ layanaṃ śaraṇaṃ bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:11023: sahāyāḥ sādhavaḥ pratiśaraṇā bhavanti // iti vistaraḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:11026: Bca_9.167 evaṃ duḥkhāgnitaptānāṃ śāntiṃ kuryāmahaṃ kadā /
SA11bsa054_u:11029: duḥkhānyeva agnayaḥ tai saṃtāpitānāṃ sattvānāṃ śāntiṃ jātyādiduḥkhānalatāpapraśamanam /
SA11bsa054_u:11030: kuryāmahaṃ kadā, kasmin kāle kuryāṃ vidadhyām /
SA11bsa054_u:11039: evamabhyudayasaṃpadi pareṣāṃ ceto vidhāya niḥśreyasasaṃpadi pradarśayannāha kadetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11042: kadā kasmin kāle upalambhadṛṣṭibhyo bhāvagrāhābhiniviṣṭebhyo deśayiṣyāmi prakāśayiṣyāmi /
SA11bsa054_u:11048: puṇyasya jñānādeḥ saṃbhāraṃ kadā upalambhadṛṣṭibhyo deśayiṣyāmīti saṃbandhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11057: te santo guṇadoṣayorapi ca taiḥ sāraṃ vimiśrādato
SA11bsa054_u:11058: grāhyaṃ sarvamakalmaṣaṃ viṣamiva tyājyaṃ duruktaṃ yadi //
SA11bsa054_u:11059: na yuktamuktaṃ kimapīha yanmayā paraṃ prajātaṃ skhalitaṃ tadeva me /
SA11bsa054_u:11060: nanu grahīṣyanti mamātra sādhavo matiṃ mayānena kṛtena sāṃpratam //
SA11bsa054_u:11063: yaḥ saṃvṛtyā vrajati manaso gocaratvaṃ kathaṃcit
SA11bsa054_u:11064: tādṛśyarthe skhalati na matiḥ kasya vai mādṛśasya /
SA11bsa054_u:11069: yatpuṇyaṃ samupārjitaṃ hitaphalaṃ tenāśu sarvo jano
SA11bsa054_u:11078: āśu prāptikarī jinasya padavīṃ sādya likhitvā mayā
SA11bsa054_u:11079: prāptaṃ yatkuśalaṃ susaṃpadi padaṃ tenāstu buddho janaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:11090: avatu narapatiḥ prajā vināmrāḥ (?) bhavatu rayanapateḥ sukhātivṛddhiḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:11109: Bca_10.8 so 'ṅgārarāśirmaṇirāśirastu taptā ca bhūḥ sphāṭikakuṭṭimaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:11112: tacchastrayuddhaṃ ca paraspareṇa krīḍārthamadyāstu ca puāpayuddham //
SA11bsa054_u:11118: dhvāntaṃ dhvastaṃ samantātsukharatijananī kasya saumyā prabheyam /

SA11bsa054_u:11136: Bca_10.16 śāmyantu vedanāstīvrā nārakāṇāṃ bhayāni ca /

SA11bsa054_u:11142: Bca_10.19 andhāḥ paśyantu rūpāṇi śṛṇvantu badhirāḥ sadā /

SA11bsa054_u:11150: Bca_10.23 sarvā diśaḥ śivāḥ santu sarveṣāṃ pathivartinām /
SA11bsa054_u:11162: Bca_10.29 alpaujasaśca ye sattvāste bhavantu mahaujasaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11164: Bca_10.30 yāḥ kāścana striyo loke puruṣatvaṃ vrajantu tāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11166: Bca_10.31 anena mama puṇyena sarvasattvā aśeṣataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11172: Bca_10.34 ramyāḥ kalpadrumodyānairdiśaḥ sarvā bhavantu ca /
